1b1(mdo sde): rgyu gar skad du/ loka pradz+nyA ba ta/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten
1b2(mdo sde): bzhag pa/ bam po dang po// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'a
1b3(mdo sde): sdom la/ ri rnams dang ni rgya mtsho dang // ngan song rnams
2a1(mdo sde): #/ dang gling dang shing // klu rgyal dang ni mkhra' lding dang // rgyal chen 'gro dang /
2a2(mdo sde): 'dun sa rnams// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
2a3(mdo sde): yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de
2a4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'jig rten
2b1(mdo sde): gyi khams ni gsum po 'di dag yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang // stong gnyis pa bar
2b2(mdo sde): ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
2b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ ji tsam du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma rnam par snang ba rnams kun tu 'khor zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa'i
2b4(mdo sde): bar yin te/ zla ba stong dang / nyi ma stong dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang / shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / 'dzam bu
2b5(mdo sde): gling stong dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams stong dang / sum
3a1(mdo sde): #// cu rtsa gsum pa stong dang / 'thab bral ba stong dang / dga' ldan stong dang / 'phrul dga' stong dang / gzhan 'phrul
3a2(mdo sde): dang/ nas / du na
3a3(mdo sde): bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i
3a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi
3a5(mdo sde): khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong
3a6(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs su mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing // 'chags
3b1(mdo sde): pa'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas so// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
3b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rnams lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing
3b3(mdo sde): gzhan zhig par gnas te/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas so// dge slong dag dper na/ bar snang las char pa'i 'bru shing rta'i srog shing tsam 'bab ste/ chu'i rgyun
3b4(mdo sde): rnams rab tu 'bab pa na mtshams sam bar chad med pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ shar phyogs su de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong
3b5(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' med cing bu med la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la
3b6(mdo sde): gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nung dang / byang gi phyogs su de snyed kyi steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams mtha' med
3b7(mdo sde): cing mu med la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am/ chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags
4a1(mdo sde): par gnas pa de dag kyang mthong ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang gi nang du gshegs so// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa mo/
4a2(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ji tsam du bcom
4a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis legs par bstan pa dang / ji ltar shing rta'i srog shing gi dpes bstan pa 'di legs te ngo mtshar to// de la stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ri chen po nyis stong yod de/ ri'i
4a4(mdo sde): rgyal po ri rab stong dang / khor yug gi dri stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rgya mtsho chen po nyis stong yod de/ nang gi rgya mtsho chen po stong dang / phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po stong rnams/
4a5(mdo sde): so// stod spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ngan song gsum stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
4a6(mdo sde): na/ gling chen po bzhi stong yod de/ shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / 'dzam bu gling stong dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan steng rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
4a7(mdo sde): na/ shing chen po bzhi stong yod de/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i shing 'dzam bu stong dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram na shal ma ri'i mthon po steng dang / lha ma yin gyi ris tsid tra pa ta li steng dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
4b1(mdo sde): ba'i sa bcol stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong yod de/ klu'i rigs skyong las skye ba stong dang / mngal nas skye bstong dang / drod gsher las skye
4b2(mdo sde): ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// steng spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong yod de/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs sgor las skye ba stong dang / mngal nas skye ba
4b3(mdo sde): stong dang / drod gisher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi spyong yod de/ yul 'khor srung stong dang / 'phags skyes po
4b4(mdo sde): stong dang / mig mi bzang stong dang / rnam thos smos kyi bu stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'gro ba lnga po lnga stong yod de/ sems can dpral ba'i 'gro ba stong dang /
4b5(mdo sde): dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba stong rnams so// steng spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dun sa chen po nyis stong yod de/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang stong dang / lham
4b6(mdo sde): yin gyi 'dun sa nor bzang zhes bya ba stong rnams so// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs dang po'o// / sdom la/ skye gnas ri dang rol mtsho dang // de bzhin sems can dmyal
4b7(mdo sde): brgyad gzhan// sems can gnas dgu rab bshad de// las lam bcu po de bzhin no// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum yod de/ gsum gang zhe
5a1(mdo sde): na/ sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams la/ dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ mi kha cig dang lha
5a2(mdo sde): rnams so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can 'dod pa sprul pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/
5a3(mdo sde): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams so// 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyi sprul pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang
5a4(mdo sde): byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum pa'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bde ba'i skye gnas gsum
5a5(mdo sde): yod de/ sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byed cing / yongs su rlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim por byed cing / yongs
5a6(mdo sde): su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byas shing yongs su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas
5a7(mdo sde): shing / yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg par gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha
5b1(mdo sde): rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la tring nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas rlan par byed cing / yongs su rlan par/
5b2(mdo sde): byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas rlan par byed cing / yongs su
5b3(mdo sde): brnyan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byas shing / yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag 'dre ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/
5b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas rlan par byed cing / yongs su
5b5(mdo sde): rlan par byed/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas brlan par byas shing / yongs su brlan par
5b6(mdo sde): byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing / yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar rig pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas te/
5b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gsum pa'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gser gyi ri chen po bdun stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po
6a1(mdo sde): gnya' shing 'dzin skyong dang / shol mda' 'dzin stong dang / sreng ldeng can stong dang / bstan sdug skyong dang / na 'dzin stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin
6a2(mdo sde): stong dang / ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rol mtsho chen po bdun stong yod de/ gnya' shing 'dzin gyi ril mtsho stong
6a3(mdo sde): dang / gshil mnga' 'dzin gyi stong dang / seng ldeng can gyi stong dang / blta na sdug gi sbyong dang / rta rna ri'i stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin gyi steng dang / rnam par 'dud kyi rol mtsho stong
6a4(mdo sde): rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos stong dang / thig nag stong dang /
6a5(mdo sde): bsdus gzhom skyong dang / ngu 'bod stong dang / ngu 'bod chen po stong dang / tsha ba stong dang / rab tu che ba stong dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa rnams so// stong spyi phud
6a6(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gyi gnas dgu stong yod de/ sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha da cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag sdod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rnams dang
6a7(mdo sde): lha kha cig go// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dang pog/ sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha dad la 'du shes gcig pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang
6b1(mdo sde): byung ba gang yin pa de dag go// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig la 'du shes pa dad pa dag yod de/ 'di la ste/ 'od gsas/
6b2(mdo sde): kyai lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gsum pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig cing 'du shes gcig pa dgra yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
6b3(mdo sde): so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bzhi pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa 'du shes med cing 'du shes dang bral ba dgra yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams
6b4(mdo sde): so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas lnga pa'o// 'di ni sems can gyi gzugs med pa rnam pa thams du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i
6b5(mdo sde): 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mthi' yos so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te
6b6(mdo sde): gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yis skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas drug pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa dang/
6b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'odas te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gan
7a1(mdo sde): pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bdun pa'o// sems can gzugs/
7a2(mdo sde): med pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas
7a3(mdo sde): pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas brgyad pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnams thams cad/
7a4(mdo sde): ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du bras med 'du bya
7a5(mdo sde): med min skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dgu pa'o// stong skye phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod
7a6(mdo sde): de/ srog gcod pa dang // ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dung / bra ma dang / tshigs rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal ba dang / brda
7a7(mdo sde): sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba rnams so// srog gcod pa shes tshor kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan meng du byas pas ni sems can dpral ba chen
7b1(mdo sde): po mar med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rab tu tsha bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang byas ni
7b2(mdo sde): tsha bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / dri bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'a'od chen por ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yung bas ni ngu 'bod du'o//
7b3(mdo sde): de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni bsdus gzhom du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang // de bas ches yang bas ni thig nag tu'o// de bas ches shas chung
7b4(mdo sde): ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du bya ba dang
7b5(mdo sde): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshigro rtsub po dang / tshig 'khrul ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta po shas cher
7b6(mdo sde): kun tu bsten cing bsems te lan mang du byis pa ni sems can dmyal du chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bras rgyas yang bstan
7b7(mdo sde): rab tu che bar ro// de bas chos shas chung ba dang / de bas che yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas che yang bas ni ngu 'bod chen por ro// de bas ches
8a1(mdo sde): shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni bsdus gzhom du'o// de
8a2(mdo sde): bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni thig nag tu'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur
8a3(mdo sde): ro// 'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs gnyis pa'o// / sdom la/ mkha' lding las lam bcu po dang // myong ba dang ni bkres dang zas// bdud rtsi'i phyis char pa
8a4(mdo sde): dang / mu ge bde dang bcu tshan no// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong rgya mtsho chen po na gnas so// nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong shing shal ma
8a5(mdo sde): la'i mthon po la gnas te/ sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang / mngal nas skyes pa stong dang / drod gsher las skyes pa stong dang / rdzus te skyes pa stong rnams so// nam mkhwa'u lding sgo
8a6(mdo sde): nga las skyes pa ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgong la skye ba 'byin par byed do// mngal nas skye ba ma yin/ rjod kau sher las skye ba mi yin/ rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de tsa'i thor na na/
8a7(mdo sde): ci se de yin na de nyid bral ba bzhin du byid par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding ma ngal nas skyel bza' ba'i phyir/ kuswa ri las bye ba dang / mngal nas bye ba/
8b1(mdo sde): par byed de/ drod gsher las skye ba ba srin/ rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ste de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkhu'/
8b2(mdo sde): lding drod gsher las skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal ras skye ba dag 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i
8b3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ ci ste de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang //
8b4(mdo sde): drod gu shar las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba 'byin par byed do// kU la ku chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa dag yod de// de dag kyang grang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i
8b5(mdo sde): rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po rtag rgal dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang
8b6(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po chen po rje dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab rnams tra~M/ 'di drag dang gzhan yang klu chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa nam mdza' lding
8b7(mdo sde): dge nas dbyung bar mi nus pa gang yin pa de dag re/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed cings ser myong bar byed de/ shes shing rab tu shes la kun tu rab tu shes so//
9a1(mdo sde): ji skad du shin tu mthu che ba'i klu dag yod de/ mtha' bsrung zhing chun gnas te/ de dag lha ma yin dag dang g.yul 'gyed pas ga 'di dag brgya byin gyi ni
9a2(mdo sde): 6/ dpung yang yin// stobs kyang che zhing mthu che klu yin te// shin tu drug po dgra thabs sna tshogs can// lha min rnams dang lhar gcig g.yul 'gyed pas// de dag
9a3(mdo sde): brgya byin gyi ni g.yul yang yin zhes kyang bya'o// // dga' bo nye dga' rtag rgyal dang // btang bzung dang ni gzi byin dang // yul 'khor srung dang nag po che//
9a4(mdo sde): e la'i 'dab ma phyi ma yin// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod de/ srog gcod pa spong ba dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod/
9a5(mdo sde): bas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du sba ba dang / bra ba dang / tshig rngub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa spong ba dang / brnab sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang
9a6(mdo sde): dag par lta ba rnams so// srog gcod pa spong ba shas cher kun tu bster rnying bsgoms te lan mang du byas pas nr-i/ gzhan 'bru dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba ma
9a7(mdo sde): bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas chos meng bas ni 'phrul dga' rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas chas yang bas ni dag
9b1(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams su'o// de bas ches dgas chung ba dang / de bas chas yang bas ni 'bru ba bral ba rnams su'o// debus ches gas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang ga'i su du/
9b2(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// de bas che shas chung ba dang / de bas rjes yang bas ni rgyal cher bzhi pa rnams su'o// de bas chis shas chung ba dang / de bas rgyas
9b3(mdo sde): bas ni mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// ma b+hin par le ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rngu /
9b4(mdo sde): dang / tshig 'khyal pa spong ba dang / chags sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pas ni/
9b5(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'phrul dga' rnams su'o//
9b6(mdo sde): de bas ches shes chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni dga' ldan rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'thab bral ba rnams su'o//
9b7(mdo sde): de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rgyal chen ba'i
10a1(mdo sde): pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// ci skye mi rnams dang /
10a2(mdo sde): skal ba mnyam par skye ba na yang / sreg gcod pa spong bas ni tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa spong bas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// 'dod pa log par/
10a3(mdo sde): g.yem pa spong bas ni chung ma dang 'gran zla ma da? par 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra ba s+phong bAs ni skur pa mang bar mi 'ugyur ro// pra ma spong bas mdza' bo dang dbye ba ra mi
10a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// tshig rtsub po spong bas ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur ro// tshig 'khyil pa spong bas ni tshig mnyan par mi 'gyur ro// chags sems med
10a5(mdo sde): pas ni 'dod chags che bar mi 'gyur ro// gnod sems med pas ni zhe sdang che bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag par lta bas ni gti mug che bar mi 'gyur ro// / bar
10a6(mdo sde): sdom ni/ skur pa med dang mdza' mi dbye// de bzhin yid du 'ong ba thos// nyan pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ba ste// yi ge bzhi ni brjod pa yin// sems can dmyal ba myong bar
10a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por tshe'i tshad bskal par len pa 'di mchog son no//
10b1(mdo sde): dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las kyi rnam par smin pas/ sa srungs kyi bus sa srungs kyi bu nyid dang / rab tu brtan pas rab tu brtan pa nyid thob
10b2(mdo sde): pa 'di mchog yin no// yi dwags kyi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ba'i lasra rnams kyi rung ra ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po gra shing rje gashri rje'i 'jig rten gyi
10b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 'di mchog yin no// mi'i skye gnas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/
10b4(mdo sde): nga las nus nga las nu nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po chen po
10b5(mdo sde): bzhi rnams rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 'di mchog yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang ru ri las gang gi rnam par srir pas/ brgya
10b6(mdo sde): byin gyis brgya byin nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// 'thab bral myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang du ri las gang gi rnam par smin pa sa/ rab 'thab bral gyis rab 'thab
10b7(mdo sde): bral nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// dga' lngar myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas dga' ldan gyis yongs su dga' ldan nyid thod
11a1(mdo sde): pa 'di mchog yin no// 'phrul dga' thob pa'i las rnams kyi nang du ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rab sbrul gyis rab sprul nyid thob par 'gyur/
11a2(mdo sde): ba 'dri ni mchog yin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ dbang byed kyis dbang byed myong bar 'gyur
11a3(mdo sde): ba 'di ni mchog yin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la bkres pa dang skem pa yod pa de bzhir ru/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod rnams
11a4(mdo sde): dang rta byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul/
11a5(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// de yan chad la ni bkres pa dang skom pa med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gleng gi mi rnams la kha zas 'di
11a6(mdo sde): lta ste/ 'bras chan dang / zan dang / phye dang / sha dang / 'khur ba rnams yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / nub kyi ba lang skyed pa la yang yod do//
11a7(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ni dri'i zas dang / bdud rtsi'i zas za'o// rgyal
11b1(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan
11b2(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// de yan chad la ni kham gyi zas med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i bdud rtsi ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po
11b3(mdo sde): dang / dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul
11b4(mdo sde): dgra' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams la ni med do// de yan cad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling
11b5(mdo sde): gi mi rnams la yang bshang ba dang graci ba yod pa dri bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi bra lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams
11b6(mdo sde): la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams lnga ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni/ char 'bab mkhas pa dang / char
11b7(mdo sde): 'bab mi mkhas pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / rub kyi ba lang spyad pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal
12a1(mdo sde): chen bzhi pa rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la lo legs pa dang mu ge yod pa bzhin du//
12a2(mdo sde): shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi bra lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi sman pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ni med do// de
12a3(mdo sde): yun chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni 'jigs pa dang bde ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang
12a4(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams pa ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba
12a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ni med do// 8
12a6(mdo sde): yan chad la yang med do// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs gsum pa'o// // sdom la/ nyo tshong bdog dang khang pa dang // gding ba dang ni bzhag gos dang //
12a7(mdo sde): yang ba rdul rab bsgre ba dang / tha dad bag ma len dang bcu// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ nor ram/ 'bru 'am/ gser ram/ dngul gyi nye tshong bya ba yod pa bzhin du/
12b1(mdo sde): shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra bi snyan gyi mi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ri med do// de yang chad la
12b2(mdo sde): snang med do// 'di skad du 'dzab bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni/ nor dang 'bru rnams kyi nye tshong byed do// shar gyi lus 'brags po rnams la ni res dang be'u ras rnams kyis so// nub
12b3(mdo sde): kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyis ni ba lang dang nor bu rnams kyis so zhes zer ba yang yod do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gri mi rnams kyi mdog nag po dung / dkar po dang / sngo bsrangs
12b4(mdo sde): drang / mdog skye sngar rnam pa bzhi yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra pi skyaran gyi mi rnam
12b5(mdo sde): ni mdog gcig pa ste dkar ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi mdog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen
12b6(mdo sde): bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan/
12b7(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi mdog gcig pa ste dkar po'o// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun
13a1(mdo sde): na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung pa rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang 'od gsal ba
13a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras
13a3(mdo sde): bu rje ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams drang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de/
13a4(mdo sde): bzhin no/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa dang / rnams shes mtha' yis skye mched pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa dang 'du shes med 'du she//
13a5(mdo sde): med min skye mched pa rnams la ni khri dog med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khang pa ched du byas pa dang / ched du byas pa ma yin pa dang khang bzung
13a6(mdo sde): dang sA khang rnams yod pa de bzhin du / shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / rub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi skur gyi mi rnams kyi
13a7(mdo sde): khang pa ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa'i sa khang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang ni ched du byas pa dang / ched du byas pa ma yin pa'o// rgyal//
13b1(mdo sde): chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba
13b2(mdo sde): rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa'o// /
13b3(mdo sde): tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang 'od chung ba dang / tshad med 'od
13b4(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams da / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang /
13b5(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gyi nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong
13b6(mdo sde): ba pa rnams dang // 'og min pa rnams kyi gzhal med khyang pa yang ched du ma byas pa yin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni khang pa yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam
13b7(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi rnams la gding ba dang / bgo ba 'di lta ste/ bal ges dang / ba na'i ras dang / gso ras dang / bar ma'i ras dang / ras gos dang / zag
14a1(mdo sde): dar dang / ko tam pa'i ras dang / rtswa du ku la'i gosa? dang / a bA ran ti'i kwa'i gos dang / rus dang / be'u ras yod pa bzhin du shar gyi
14a2(mdo sde): lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod de// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos gyon no// ji ltar byang
14a3(mdo sde): gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos gyon pa bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral/
14a4(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams gos
14a5(mdo sde): gyon bzhin du skye'o// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / bod chud ba rnams
14a6(mdo sde): dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams da // dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang dge rgyas pa rnams dang sprin med pa rnam
14a7(mdo sde): dang bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang shin tu mthong
14b1(mdo sde): ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang gos gyon bzhin du skye'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag ba sams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi shing
14b2(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / srir po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
14b3(mdo sde): dkar po rnams so// dpag bsams kyi shring las byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po drang / dkar po rnams te/ dpag bsams kyi shing
14b4(mdo sde): las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu skyes pa 'am/ bud med dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de la yal ga 'dud par byed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi dpag
14b5(mdo sde): bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi shing rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngor
14b6(mdo sde): bo dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// dpagra bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
14b7(mdo sde): dkar po rnams te/ dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu yal ga 'dud par byed de
15a1(mdo sde): de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta bu bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang /
15a2(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams lA ni/ dpag bsam kyi shing
15a3(mdo sde): las byung ba'i gos med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la yanga? ga ding ba drang / bgro ba lci ba dang / yAng ba yod pa bzhin
15a4(mdo sde): du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod de/ byang gi sgra mi snyad gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung
15a5(mdo sde): ba'i go sra la ni srang gcig yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni srang byed do// sum+ba cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ni srang gi bzhi na gcig go// 'thab bral ba
15a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni srang brgyad cha gcig go/ dga' ldan pa rnams kyi nr-i srang gi bcu drug cha gcig go/ 'phrul dga' bu rnams kyi ri sdang gi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
15a7(mdo sde): gcig go// gzhar 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ni srang gi drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha gcig yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
15b1(mdo sde): kyi ni gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa mdunan 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od drung /
15b2(mdo sde): brnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams
15b3(mdo sde): dang bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mri gdung ba rnams drang // gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang /
15b4(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi yang gzhal du byed pa'i gos yin no// nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gci bra ni rdul phra rab yir ro// rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul
15b5(mdo sde): phra mo gcig gi/ rdul phra mo bdun la nri ti zer gyi rdul gcig go/ nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ri ri bo gri rdul gcig gro/ ri bong gi rdul bdun la nI lug rdul gracig
15b6(mdo sde): lug rngub bdud la ni glang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun lu ni sro mA gcig gi/ sbo ma bdun lnga ni u ba ga nA gcig go// a ba gr-i na bdun la ni ba tI ga~M gcig so// 8
15b7(mdo sde): ga bdun la ni ras 'bru gcig go/ ras 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go/ sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la ni khru gang ngo // 'dzam bu gling ba'i ma rnams ri kha cig ni khru tshad
16a1(mdo sde): ltar brtsis pa'i khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o// kha cig gi ni khru bzhi pa'o// shar gyi lus 'brags po rnams ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub kyi/
16a2(mdo sde): ba lang spyod pa rnams ni khru bcu drug go byang gi skra mi snyan pa rnams ni khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni rgyang grags
16a3(mdo sde): kyi cha bzhi chu gcig go/ sum cu ru gsum pa rnams kyi ri rgyang grags byed do// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni rgyung grags kyi bzhi cha gsum pa'o// dgra' ldan pa
16a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig go/ 'phrul dgra' ba rnams kyi dri rgyang grags gcig dang rgyang grags bzhi cha'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang gra/
16a5(mdo sde): byed dang gnyis so// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad byed do// tshungs pa'i mdun na 'dod pa rnams kyi ni dpagra tshad byed gcig gi/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams kyi na
16a6(mdo sde): dpag tshad phyed drang gnyis so// bor chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so// tshad med 'odra ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi pa'o// bod gsal ba rnams kyi ni
16a7(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgyad do// dge chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bcu drug go// tshad med dge pa rnams kyi mi dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis so// dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni dpas tshan/
16b1(mdo sde): drug cu rtsa bzhi'i// sprin med pa rnams kyi ni dpagra tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// bsod nams skyes pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshwad nyis brtsa lnga 'du'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha
16b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o// mi che ba'i lha'i lus thob pa ni dpag tshad stong ngo // mi gdung ba
16b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni dpag tshad nyis stong ngo // gya nom snang ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi stong ngo // shin tu mthong ba po rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo // bo ga min gyi lha rnam
16b4(mdo sde): kyi lus thob pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad khri drug stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i lha rnams la ni bsngags pa'i lus med do// nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig
16b5(mdo sde): ni rdul phra rab yin no// rdul pra rab bdun la ni rdul pra mo gcig go/ rdul phra mo bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gcigra go/ ny+dzi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig
16b6(mdo sde): go ri bong gi rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go/ lug rdul bdur la ni brang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun la ni sro mA gcig go/ sbo ma bdun la ni a ba ga na gci
16b7(mdo sde): go/ a ba ga na bdun la ni ba ti ka gcig go/ ba ti ka bdun la ni nas 'bru gcig go// nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go/ sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo // 'dza
17a1(mdo sde): bu gling gi mi rnams kha cig ni gos khru tshad 'di lta bur brtsis pa'i khru brgyad pa gon no// kha cig ni khru bcu pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po
17a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni khru nyi shu pa'o// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi nr-i khru bzhi bcu'o// byang gi sgra mi snyar gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gro khru brgyad cu pa gyon no//
17a3(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyang lus la ci ran pa'i gos gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thub bral ba rnams dang
17a4(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams/
17a5(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge
17a6(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / dgra rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / sod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung
17a7(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shI tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gimi rnams la dbang
17b1(mdo sde): po tha dad de/ kha cig la ni po'i dbang po yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi snga mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen banan/
17b2(mdo sde): lha rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang
17b3(mdo sde): yod do// tshangs ris kyis lnga rnams la ni mo'i dbang po yang med po'i dbang po yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang
17b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge
17b5(mdo sde): rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba
17b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la bag ma gtong ba dang / bag ma len pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi
17b7(mdo sde): lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang
18a1(mdo sde): 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris
18a2(mdo sde): kyi lha rnams la ni bag ma gtong ba yang med bag ma len pa yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po pa rnams
18a3(mdo sde): dang 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang dge rgyas pa rnams dang
18a4(mdo sde): sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang shin tu
18a5(mdo sde): mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs bzhi pa'o// / sdom la/ grang dang dus tshigs mtshan mo dang /
18a6(mdo sde): ma dang ni rje khol dang // nor dang 'bru dang mngon par zhen// bcu tshan yongs su brjod pa yin// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la shin tu grang ba dang / shin tu tsha ba yod pa bzhin du shar
18a7(mdo sde): gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la yang med do// de yan chad la yang med do//
18b1(mdo sde): ji wAr 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la dus tshigs 'di lha ste/ dgun dang / dpyid dang / dbyar dang / ston yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa dang nub kyi ba lang sprod/
18b2(mdo sde): pa rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang
18b3(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi sgra rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni dus tshigs med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du / tshangs
18b4(mdo sde): pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang /
18b5(mdo sde): tshad med dge pa rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi
18b6(mdo sde): gdung ba rnams dang / gra nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo
18b7(mdo sde): dang nyin mo yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum
19a1(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab 'bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
19a2(mdo sde): la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mtshan mo med/ nyin mo yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa
19a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang
19a4(mdo sde): sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu
19a5(mdo sde): mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la pa dang ma yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi
19a6(mdo sde): ba lang spyod pa rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang /
19a7(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni ma yang med/ pha yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/
19b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang
19b2(mdo sde): tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams
19b3(mdo sde): dang gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la rje bo dang bran yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi
19b4(mdo sde): lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la ni rje bo yang med/ bran yang med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni rje bo dang bran
19b5(mdo sde): yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan
19b6(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni rje bo yang med/ bran yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dod pa rnams dang
19b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang
20a1(mdo sde): sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang //
20a2(mdo sde): shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ nor dang 'bru yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub
20a3(mdo sde): kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni 'bru ni yod la nor ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni nor ni yod la 'thun med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin
20a4(mdo sde): du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi
20a5(mdo sde): lha rnams la ni nor yang med/ 'bru yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang
20a6(mdo sde): tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang // dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang
20a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar
20b1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la pa 'am/ ma 'am/ bu bo'am/ bu mo 'am/ rje bo 'am/ bran nam/ nor ram/ 'phrul mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams/
20b2(mdo sde): dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni ci yang zhen pa med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni/ 'bru ma gtogs pa gzhan rnams la mngon par zhen pa
20b3(mdo sde): yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dka' ba rnams dang / gzhan
20b4(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni ci la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang
20b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams/
20b6(mdo sde): dang sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin
20b7(mdo sde): mthong ba pa rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bzhag pa tshigs lnga pa'o// // 'jig rten bzhag pa bam po gnyis pa//
21a1(mdo sde): sdom la zla mtshan 'khrig dang khu chu dang // tshe bsgyur dang ni chu klung brag/ sA la rdzing bu glang po dang // srungs ma 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lam// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i
21a2(mdo sde): gling gi mi rnams la bud med zla mtshan can dang / sbrum ma dang / bu bca' ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan
21a3(mdo sde): pa rnams la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u dang / bu mo lo lnga lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo phrag pa 'am phang
21a4(mdo sde): par sems can rdzus te skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du/ 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am/ bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du
21a5(mdo sde): 'di ni bdag cag gi ma 'am/ pa'o snyam du sems so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni lo drug lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni lo bdun lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no//
21a6(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lo brgyad lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u
21a7(mdo sde): dang bu mo lo bcu lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha'am/ lha'i bu mo phrag pa'am/ phang par sems can rdzus te skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo 'di snyam du 'di ni
21b1(mdo sde): bdag gi bu 'am/ bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u dang / bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag cag gi ma'am pha'o snyam du sems so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni thogs nas
21b2(mdo sde): lus kyi yan lag dang cing lag thams cad rdzogs par skye zhing / 'chi ba na de kho na bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang
21b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang
21b4(mdo sde): dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom
21b5(mdo sde): snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni/ lus kyi gzugs med de/ de bas na de bzhi ni skye ba yang /
21b6(mdo sde): mi mngon/ 'chi 'pho ba yang mi mngon no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos sten pa na gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'ja
21b7(mdo sde): bo rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'thab bral ba
22a1(mdo sde): rnams ni 'khrud pa tsam gyis gdung bzhi par 'gyur ro// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyis so// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis ni bgad pa rum
22a2(mdo sde): gyis so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni b.lus pa tsam gyis gzung bzhi par 'gyur ro// tshangs ris pa rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji b+ha ba bzhin du/ tshangs
22a3(mdo sde): pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge
22a4(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dang mchi ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang
22a5(mdo sde): nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la khu chu mi gtsang ba 'byung ba yod pa de bzhin du/
22a6(mdo sde): shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la yang de bzhin no// gargyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni rlung 'byung ngo // rgyal chen ba nin
22a7(mdo sde): rgya rnams ji rtsab bzhi du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gnan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi
22b1(mdo sde): yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams jin pa bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun ma 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pachen po pa rnams dang
22b2(mdo sde): chung ba rnams dang / chad med 'ang ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dkri rung ba rnams dang / chad med dge ba rnams dang / dag thus pa rnams dang / sprin med pa nas sna dru
22b3(mdo sde): nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gzung ba rnams dang / gya ros sdang ba pa rnams dang / shin du mthong bar rnams dang / 'og min gyi ldan
22b4(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskul pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams
22b5(mdo sde): kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni/ yi dgas rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig ste/ nyin zhag de sum cul tha
22b6(mdo sde): ba gcig/ rdza ba badrugacis la lo gcig ste/ yi dgas rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo del bur brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya seMs bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'o ltar brtsis na ni 'o khri lnga
22b7(mdo sde): stong yod do// shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nub kyi ba lang sprod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo lnga
23a1(mdo sde): brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// byang gi sgra mi sman gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba med do// ci'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi
23a2(mdo sde): rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba med ce na// de bdag la bdag gi ba med cing / yongs su 'dzin pa med de/ che nges shing khyad par du 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi me rnams la bar
23a3(mdo sde): mdor 'chi ba med do// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la ni yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa yod de 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur la res 'ga' ni cha lo bcu par
23a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ rgyal
23a5(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lhar brtsis na los ya phrag dgu yod de/ de ni sems can
23a6(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshed
23a7(mdo sde): kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lhar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum drug khri nyis stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo
23b1(mdo sde): brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyim nag de sum tshul tha ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sum curtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi che'i chad
23b2(mdo sde): kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stong ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lhar brtsisan lo bye ba phrag gsum dang sa ya phrag drug mod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po
23b3(mdo sde): thig nag gi cim nag gtsug go// nyi ma na ga de sum rdul zla ba gcig/ thub bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i
23b4(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i lo stong ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lhar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya
23b5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni// 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go// zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni
23b6(mdo sde): lo de lu bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo nyis stong ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i'o ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang / sa ya phrag bzhi yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus
23b7(mdo sde): gzhom gyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom gyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/
24a1(mdo sde): lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo nyes stong ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i khrur brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gcig dang bye ba phrag sum 'bum
24a2(mdo sde): drug khri brgyad stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyi ma nag gcig go// nyi ma na ga de sum dul zla ba gcig/ zlab badrug cis la lo gcig steg dga'
24a3(mdo sde): ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lhar brtses na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang bye ba phrag
24a4(mdo sde): gsum dang lo sa ya phrag drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cul zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems
24a5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ le de lu bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo bzhi stong ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i
24a6(mdo sde): khwar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrags ma gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de ni// 'phrul dka'i
24a7(mdo sde): nams kyi nyim nag gcig go// nyin nag desum rul zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la la gcig ste/ 'phrul dka' ba rnams kyi tshe'i ched kyi mtha' ni/ la de 'u bur brtsis pa'i lo brgyar spong
24b1(mdo sde): rje ba bar mdor 'chi ba na yod do// desa'i ra brtsis na lo bye ba phraganyis brgya sum su dang / las ma phrag pa na ma dang// don sems can dmyal ba chen pa dru bod chen thal ci pa gagacigs gnyid/
24b2(mdo sde): nag de sum cul zlab gcig/ thab bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i cha'i ched kyi mtha' ni / la del bur brtsis pa'i sems can dpral ba'i lo brgyad sdong mod
24b3(mdo sde): de bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i khur ba drisan lo bye ba phrag drug cu drug dang / bye ba phrags la gsum dang / bye ba phrag lnga 'bum lnga bri nyis spong yod do// mi rnams kyil spong drug brgyags
24b4(mdo sde): yin pa de ni// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi cin zhag gcig yin no// nyin zhag de sum rdul zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni
24b5(mdo sde): lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo khri drug spong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lhar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang la sa la phrag drug yod de ka de ni sems can dmyal ba chen/
24b6(mdo sde): po tsha ba'i nyon nag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum rdul zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig sde/ sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'
24b7(mdo sde): nimale de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lhar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag lnga brgya dang / le bye ba phrag sum cu dang lo bye ba brags la
25a1(mdo sde): brgyad dang / ba'i 'bum dang / lo bye ba phrag khri drug stong yod do// / bar gyi sdom la/ dgu dang gsum dang bcu ba zhi dang ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /
25a2(mdo sde): brgya dgu brgya rnams ni mi yi grangs kyis lha tsher bshad// de bzhin cig dang bcu gnyis gcig dang brgya dang drug dru dang // lnga brgya dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa yi cher bshad de// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
25a3(mdo sde): kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa'i phyed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe 'tshid kyi mtha' ni bskal pa'i byed/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa'i
25a4(mdo sde): mdur na 'don pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma/
25a5(mdo sde): dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa chen po pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa phyed dang gnyis te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'od chung ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gnyis te/
25a6(mdo sde): bar mdor 'chi ba rna med do// tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'dzin yod do// 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi che'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad de/ bAr/
25a7(mdo sde): mdor 'chi ba ni med do// dge rlung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bcu drug ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni med do// chad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi che'i ched kyi mtha' ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcis
25b1(mdo sde): tre bar ma dor 'chim na mad // dmargyas kyi rnams kyi che gyid kyi mtha' nabs la badrug drum pa'i sa bar ma'or 'chi ban la dang // sprin med kyis rnams kyi ma dzin gyis pa ni bskus bya /
25b2(mdo sde): ci burtsa lnga sre bar ma dor 'tshatshan mad do// bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i ched kyi mtha' na bskal bac+doMs bsdu lnga bcu ste bar ma dor 'tshong na mo dang/ 'bras bu che ba'i lharnams kyi che'i
25b3(mdo sde): kyi mtha' ni bskal pa lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyang de dang rnga'o// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi
25b4(mdo sde): ba ni yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi stong ste/ bar mdor
25b5(mdo sde): 'chi ba ni yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni med do// 'og mim gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa khri drug rmong ste
25b6(mdo sde): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi
25b7(mdo sde): mtha' ni bskal pa pa ni tshwa ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni mad de// ci yang med pa'i sgo mched pa'i lha rnams kyi cha'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa drug dri rtsen par ma dor 'chib ni med do// 'du shes med 'du shes
26a1(mdo sde): #/ med min skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'di nas byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do// ri rig po
26a2(mdo sde): gsum po dag gi byang phyogs na ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na yang ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gsum po yod pa de dag gi byang phyogs na ri'i/
26a3(mdo sde): rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba yod do// ri'i rgyal po gangs kyi byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba yod do// ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang nas dpag tshad bcu'i tshu rol na mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba
26a4(mdo sde): zhig yod de/ ma dros pa zhes kyang bya'o// mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba de la chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du ni dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ dbyibs legs shing
26a5(mdo sde): blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lha bus gang la/ me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos kun tu khebs par 'dug go// de'i nang nas klung chen po bzhi 'di lha
26a6(mdo sde): ste/ gang+gA dang / sin du dang / si ta dang / paka shu dang / 'di rnams 'bab ste/ gang+gA ni shar phyogs nas glang po che'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/
26a7(mdo sde): klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// sin du ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtshe chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya
26b1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// paka shu ni nub phyogs nas rta'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu
26b2(mdo sde): nub phyogs su rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// si ka ni byang phyogs nas seng ge'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor te/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs kyi
26b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// 'di skad du/ byang phyogs kha dgur 'gyur ba yi// chu mtsho yod de gzhan dag kyang // des na mtsho chen chu zhes bya// tha dad rgyun rnams 'byung gnas yod// chu krung
26b4(mdo sde): gang+gA sin du dpag shu dang / si ha dba' rlabs dbu ba'i 'phreng ba can// 'bab cing thams cad bsil ba'i chu yin te// chus gang khyad par bzhi 'bab ste// phyogs bzhi khor yug dag nas 'byug
26b5(mdo sde): gang+gA sher phyogs rgya mtshar 'gro ba ste// sin du lho phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba'o// pag shu yang ni nub phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro// de yi byang phyogs rgya mtshor si twa 'gro// chu klung rab mchog brda
26b6(mdo sde): po 'di dag ni// mchog tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab ste// re re zhing yang lnga brgya khyer nas ni// chu yi rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro// zhes kyang bya'o// ri spos kyi nged ldang de'i byang
26b7(mdo sde): phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ gser gyi brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu / zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya ga 'phang du dpag
27a1(mdo sde): chad byed dang ba ni yod pa/ dbyings legs shing bsan sdug la mdzes panag yod de/ de'i nang gis gni sang dbyibs legs shing brtan sdug pa/ mdzes pa gser rdzi rjem da/
27a2(mdo sde): cing tsan dan gyi chu'i chag chag btab pa ste/ der yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i khor
27a3(mdo sde): khor yug thug ser gyi brag bya skyibs brgyad spong yod de/ de thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ de dag gi nang gi sa gzhi rnams kyang dbyibs legs shing bldan sdug
27a4(mdo sde): ba la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis
27a5(mdo sde): rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing bltar sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan
27a6(mdo sde): gyi chus chag rag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing dang / gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro//
27a7(mdo sde): brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ shing sA la'i rgyal po chen po rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba sA la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba zhig yod de sA la/
27b1(mdo sde): rgyas par bgyu na lan/ 'das brgyu pa bajug/ sbrul la phreng ba dang rgya ban 'das brdzusasas ra mu/ sa pa na n+d+ha smra
27b2(mdo sde): bcu gcig go// bzhi pa'i ni brgya'o// lnga pa'i ni gu'o// drug pa'i no brgyad do// sA la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dom btsun zur du drug go// sA la'i rgyal po rab tu btar ba de'i ma
27b3(mdo sde): ga dang lo ma dang / yan lag rnams gang yin pa de ni/ sA la'i 'phreng ba dang po la thug go// 'phreng ba dang po'i yil ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag gang yin pa de ni gces pa la'o//
27b4(mdo sde): gnyis pa'i gang yin pa de ni gsum pa la'o// gsum pa'i gang yin pa de ni bzhi pa la'o// bzhi pa'i gang yin pa de ni lnga pa la'o// lnga pa'i gang yin pa de ni drug pa la'o// drug pa'i gang yin pa/
27b5(mdo sde): de ni bdun pa la'o// sA la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i yal ka dang / lo ma dang / yan lag gang yin pa des ni nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go// de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug
27b6(mdo sde): la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ der mi ma yin pa
27b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu zheng du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing bltan sdug la mdzes pa ste/ der yang yid du mi
28a1(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// sA la'i rgyal po rab tu
28a2(mdo sde): brtan pa'i shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba chur dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu swa/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod pa/ dbyibs
28a3(mdo sde): legs shis blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba/ me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dra dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa zhig yod de/ rdzing bu dal
28a4(mdo sde): gyis 'bab kyi nang gi pad+ma'i lo ma rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lha ste/ ba lang yog pa tsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lha ste/ gshol mda' tsam mo//
28a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i birla tsam mo//
28a6(mdo sde): ro mngar zhing mchog tu mngar te/ 'di lha ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go/ rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi kho ra khor yug na/ rdzing bu brgyad stong yod de/
28a7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ngo // de dag gi nang gi pad+mo'i lo ma rnams kyang che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lha ste/
28b1(mdo sde): ba lang g.yog pa tsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol tsam mo// pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog su che ste/ 'di sa ste/ shing sa'i 'bang
28b2(mdo sde): lo lnga tsam mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog pu che ste/ 'di la ste/ skyes bu chen po'i bcu tsam mo// ro ma ngam ning mchog su mngar te/ 'di 'i ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsis skol ba bachi/
28b3(mdo sde): no che bcang na yang 'o ma 'dzag go// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad ci shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal tsang
28b4(mdo sde): tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis/ rlung gi mthus phyi rol du
28b5(mdo sde): 'dor ro// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ me tog ku mu da/
28b6(mdo sde): mdog ltar thal kar 'jug pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de'i mgo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes paste/ sngo zhing srog chags 'dam bu ru/ shel
28b7(mdo sde): gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan po'i srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis
29a1(mdo sde): mtha' slor drung pag car bdun ma dadu// de'i 'khor thang po chu brgyad myong ma du dadag thams cad kya gzugs pabang cing bstan thugs mdzes bya/ seM
29a2(mdo sde): da'i mdog lngar thal kar du 'jug cing / yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de dag gi mgo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa s+ho/ sngo zhing srog chags 'dam
29a3(mdo sde): bu chu shel gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar ba che ba drug yod pa sha stag ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de khor dang bcas pa/ dgun zla ba bzhi ni breg bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang
29a4(mdo sde): na gnas shing 'khod do// dpyid zla bzhi ni shing sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi
29a5(mdo sde): nang na gnas shing 'dug pa'i tshe ni/ glang po che brgyad sdong po rnams 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang / smra ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ brag
29a6(mdo sde): bya skyibs brgyad stong dag gi nang na nye bar gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu bcan pa brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang nas shong sA la'i rgyal po rab
29a7(mdo sde): thub rtan pa'i nang na 'gron/ res 'ga' ni tha mal pa'i tshul gyis 'gro// res 'ga' ni 'di lu ste/ lha'am lha'i rje rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar
29b1(mdo sde): bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo 'am rgyab tu zhon te/ sil sanA dang pheg dob pa dag rgya cher byed ring
29b2(mdo sde): 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shing sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'jug pa de'i tshe ni/ glang po che brgyad stong po de dag kyang 'di lha ste/ glang po che'i rgyal
29b3(mdo sde): po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ shing sA la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun po dag gi nang na kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// shing sA la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i ning
29b4(mdo sde): na 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// gnyis pa'i nang na 'dug pa'i gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lha'o// gsum pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du
29b5(mdo sde): lha'o/ ga bzhi pa'i nang na 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lha'o// lnga pa'i ning na 'dug pa'i gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lha'o// drug pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du
29b6(mdo sde): lha'o// bdun pa'i nang na 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang dub ltas te 'khod do// glang gi che glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shing sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa nas/ rdzing bu dal gyis
29b7(mdo sde): 'bab par 'gro ba na/ res 'ga' ni thi mal pa'i tshul gyis 'gro'o// res 'ga' ni 'di su ste/ lha'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyis mtho
30a1(mdo sde): #/ par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo za 'am/ rgyab tu zhon te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa
30a2(mdo sde): dag kyang rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa/ de'i tshe glang po che brgyang
30a3(mdo sde): stong po dag 'di lha ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de bsrung ba dang / smra ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi mtha' khor khor yug kun nas bskor te/
30a4(mdo sde): kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyad nas phyir 'byung ba de'i tshe de'i nang na glang po che
30a5(mdo sde): dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na zhugs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams blangs te shin tu bkrus shing rab tu bshal nas/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa la
30a6(mdo sde): 'bul ka gi glang sa tshe'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa zos shing 'thungs te/ 'grangs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ glang po che gzhan brgyad sdong po de dag kyang rdzing bu re rer zhugs nas rtse zhing dga' la
30a7(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod de/ pad+ma'i rtsa bdag blangs shing shin tu 'grus shing rab tu bshal te ba'o// sum chus gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po gsul ngor spyad parab tu brtan pa'i
30b1(mdo sde): ni de tsam mo// sems can thams cad ni srungs ma dang bcas shing srung ba dang / slob pa dang / sred pa dang mi 'bral te/ sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing bsod nams rlung la gas/
30b2(mdo sde): brjid chung ba de dag ni/ brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig bsrung ste/ dper na ba lang mang po dang / lug brgya phrag mang po dang / srong phrag mang po la gcig gis bzung
30b3(mdo sde): ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing / bsod nams chung la/ gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig bsrung ngo // sems
30b4(mdo sde): can gang che bar grags shing / bsod nams che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ba ste/ dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/
30b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brgya phrag mang po dang // stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang che bar
30b6(mdo sde): grags shing / bsod nams che la gzi brjid che ba de dag la brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ngo // 'dir smras pa/ rtsi kyi sems can thams cad srungs ma dang
30b7(mdo sde): bcas/ srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang mi 'bral na ci'i phyir 'tshe ba yod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ srungs sa mthu chung bzhig yinan no// de la zil gyis gnon pa lasa'i tshab yong do//
31a1(mdo sde): srungs ma bag med cing bag med pa la gnas pa zhig yin na/ de'i bag med pa'i chu las kyang 'tshe ba rnams yod do// srungs ma gcis ldan cig 'thun par gyur pas kyang zil
31a2(mdo sde): kyis mnan nas 'tshe bar byed do// mi rnams chos ma yin pa la spyod cing mi rigs pa spyod pa yin na/ de dag ni de dag gi chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang / mi rigs pa spyod pa las kyang 'tshe ba yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum
31a3(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma 'di lta ste/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshang ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams
31a4(mdo sde): dang btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams su bkod pa dag yod de/ zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gi g.yog zho shas 'tshe ba
31a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tsheng ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang /
31a6(mdo sde): btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ci ste de dag gis skyen par
31a7(mdo sde): na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do// ci ste de dag gis skyen par ma tsher na ni de dag gnas dma' bal 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gi bu rnams kyis lam po che dang /
31b1(mdo sde): srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tsho ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu
31b2(mdo sde): myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ci ste de dag gis skyen par tsher na ni de dag gnas rnams mthon po la 'god do// ci ste de dag
31b3(mdo sde): gos skyen par mtsher na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la ni rgyal po chen po zazhi po de dag nyid kyis lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / dri 'tshong ba'i gnas/
31b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / me tog gi 'breng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na/
31b5(mdo sde): su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ci ste de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do// ci ste de dag gis sbyin par ma tsher na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do//
31b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la ni rgyal po chen po dag gi g.yog no shas 'tshe ba rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin
