31b7(mdo sde): pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho/
32a1(mdo sde): ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa mang ngam
32a2(mdo sde): zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshe sa bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bu ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /
32a3(mdo sde): bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lhu ba/
32a4(mdo sde): dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshes/
32a5(mdo sde): bco lnga la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag nyid ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri
32a6(mdo sde): mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bu ba byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams byed pa dang / gso sbyong
32a7(mdo sde): la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs gnas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du tshul lo// ci ste mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin pa dang / da/
32b1(mdo sde): skyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rig kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri sor mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod na su mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang che byi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis
32b2(mdo sde): 'jigs par mi lbu ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin ning bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso slong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa dag mang na ni/ rgyal po bzhi po rnams sum cu rtsa gsum
32b3(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grog po dag 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin par 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin pa dang / 8
32b4(mdo sde): sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rig kyi nang nargan rabs la ri mor mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rig pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis
32b5(mdo sde): 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyir zhing / bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad do// de dag las thos nas
32b6(mdo sde): sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yi ma rangs shing mi mgu bar gyur nas/ yi ma rangs pa nyid kyang phyir ldog par byed de// kye ma grog po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin
32b7(mdo sde): pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang nan na rabs la ri mo mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang
33a1(mdo sde): bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi byed pa dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang
33a2(mdo sde): gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa mang ba ni mo rnams kyi chos mdzes pa ma yin no// rkyen du bab pa ma yin no// legs pa ma yin no// dge ba
33a3(mdo sde): ma yin no// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes smos so// ci ste mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig
33a4(mdo sde): rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa
33a5(mdo sde): dang bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang /
33a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ba na nI/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nasa'adi
33a7(mdo sde): skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig can na mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang nargan/
33b1(mdo sde): rabs la ri mi byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag byin/
33b2(mdo sde): zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dgra mang ngo zhes bsnyad na ni// de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
33b3(mdo sde): yi rangs shing mgu bar gyur nas/ yi rings pa nyid kyang zlos par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du
33b4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rarimi byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na
33b5(mdo sde): mtho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams ngag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nges par gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas/ 'dug pa dag
33b6(mdo sde): mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos mdzes so// rkyen du bab bo// legs so// dge'o// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib
33b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro zhes smos so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i 'khor rab tu dka' la bde zhing yid bde ba skyes par rig nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa 'dir ni zla ba byed
34a1(mdo sde): #/ dang tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gnag gnas byed 'dir/
34a2(mdo sde): 1/ nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// dge slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gang 'di skad du// 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso
34a3(mdo sde): sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de ni nyes par smras pa yin gyi/ legs par smras pa ma yin no// /
34a4(mdo sde): nyes par smon pa yin gyi/ legs par ston pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin gyi/ legs par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// lha'i dbang po brgya byin de ni 'dod chags dang /
34a5(mdo sde): bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti mug dang bcas pa ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
34a6(mdo sde): dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol/ sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol lo zhes nga smra'o// de bas na des gang 'di skad du/ 'di ni zla phyed ches brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu ba ni bco lnga dang /
34a7(mdo sde): cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras pa 'di nyes par smras
34b1(mdo sde): pa yin gyig legs par sbas pa sa man/ gnyes par byon pa lan gyi/ legs par smon pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa min gyig legs par brjod pa ma yin no// dge sang dag garjong /
34b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yin zhing gang zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa / khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes
34b3(mdo sde): bas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni rje byed tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla byed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la/
34b4(mdo sde): shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras na legs par smras pa yin te/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par ston pa yin/
34b5(mdo sde): ce nyes par ston pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/
34b6(mdo sde): gti mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams las yongs su grol zhing sdug bsngal/
34b7(mdo sde): las yongs su grol ba'o zhes nga smra ste/ de bas na des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed ches brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla byed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag
35a1(mdo sde): / brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcas pa 'di dag sman legs par smras pa yin te/ nyes par
35a2(mdo sde): smras pa ma yin no// legs par ston pa yin te/ nyes par ston pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so// 'dzam bu gling gi kho ra khor yug
35a3(mdo sde): na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam dpag tshad gcig tu/ gser gyi bye ma bdal te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chus pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khyab bo// gang gi tshe 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig
35a4(mdo sde): rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen por dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du chu skam zhing med par 'gyur te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang nas gling du 'gro ba de ni 'khor lo skur po'i lam yin no//
35a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'khor lo skur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che brtog par 'dod pas nyi ma shar ba'i'o dus kyi tshe/ glang po che rin po che la zhon
35a6(mdo sde): nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa'aji nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do// dge sbyong dag gzhan medang 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyam po sarin pon+de
35a7(mdo sde): bam par rjod pas nyi mgar brjin gyi tsho/ na kyi tsha la 'o rnams chen pa rnam gyi chen pal thug pa 'di nyid bzhir ci// rgyal ba'i bgrang la la ting du ma ngan mi/ khyi bus kyi byam
35b1(mdo sde): sa / ri A ng+ya sa 'angs Ta kA ug+sa g+sa
35b2(mdo sde): pal sa // na pa gapa sa zu seM n+d+he
35b3(mdo sde): rgyu chos babyang chuba'i las dang 'obs dang sbe mos chag// sa gno ni yangs 'das pasdu thung ce rnams// sam mi rnams kyi yang de na pa seMn/ nA sring byi dang
35b4(mdo sde): min gyi grong khyer gyi bar du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma rnam pa lnga bkod pa la 'di lu se/ chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs pa'i rnams dang / lazhan
35b5(mdo sde): gzhong pa thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / 'breng ba thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams so// gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams su maM cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
35b6(mdo sde): rnams dang ldan cig thu g.yul 'gyed par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dpung gi tshogs ma thalag bzhi pa 'di lu ste/ glang po che'i tshigs dang / na pa'i tshigs dang / shing sa'i tshigs dang / dpung bu rung /
35b7(mdo sde): tshogs rnams go cha gyon no// go cha rnam pa bzhi gyon pa 'di lha ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUrma las byas pa rnams dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// go cha rnam
36a1(mdo sde): pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / baiDUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon charnam pa bzhi la 'di
36a2(mdo sde): khru ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang 'phang mdung dang gzurnams so// mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas/ sus rgyun gsum pa'i/
36a3(mdo sde): lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ngo // lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang /
36a4(mdo sde): dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos pa
36a5(mdo sde): nas mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung
36a6(mdo sde): ba de dag/ chun gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas chun gnas pa'i klu rnams kyang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs
36a7(mdo sde): dang shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/ go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be nurma las byas pa dang / shes
36b1(mdo sde): las byas pa bathos nas/ mtshan chanas pa bzhi ras tshwa dang / mngadu dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzunams thangs te/ lam yinan mas dang spyan gyig thugs ma 'byed do//
36b2(mdo sde): blanums rgyas / las na namasalas par ma na ni/ blarnam pakyis snam 'a nasas thub cing drugs par byas te/ phas par byas shing chub kyis thogs par byas nas/ ma na/
36b3(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lnga ma yin rnams rgyal te/ klu rnams pa ma na ni l+h+wam yin rnams kyis sum cu cha gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma dang po klu rnams thub cing rdugs par/
36b4(mdo sde): byas te pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po gang na lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na mel rko
36b5(mdo sde): thogs kyi lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gre'o// de nas lag na yol go thogs kyi rnams dang / lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gnyis
36b6(mdo sde): tu 'dus par gyur nas lA ma yin dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci sde srungs ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams paman ni srungs ma gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/
36b7(mdo sde): bam par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma gnyis phaman ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
37a1(mdo sde): #/ kyi srungs ma gnyis lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ bam par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rib kyi bang rim da
37a2(mdo sde): kho nas bang rim gnyis pa gang na 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas 'breng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa'i klunam
37a3(mdo sde): dang srungs ma gsum po rnams lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste srungs ma gsum po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams bam na na
37a4(mdo sde): srungs ma gsum po dag gis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams
37a5(mdo sde): rgyal te srungs ma gsum po pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gsum po rnams lha ma yin gyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas//
37a6(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gnyis pa nas/ bang rim gsum pa gang na rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams
37a7(mdo sde): dang lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma bzhi po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do//
37b1(mdo sde): der ci sa srungs ma ban pa rnams rgyal te lha ma yin rnams pamanan srungs ma bzhi po rnams kyis lham yin rnams thub cing drugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rtab kyis phrogs par byas
37b2(mdo sde): nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma bzhi po rnams pa ma na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma bzhi po dag lha ma yin rnams
37b3(mdo sde): kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gsum pa nas/ bang rim bzhi pa gang na rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams
37b4(mdo sde): 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / chun
37b5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma lnga po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci rtsi spangs ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams
37b6(mdo sde): pa ma na na srungs ma lnga po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tsa ste
37b7(mdo sde): ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma lnga po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyas
38a1(mdo sde): kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi pa nas/ steng gi gzhi gang na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o//
38a2(mdo sde): nas rgyal po chen po bzhis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang bdag cag srungs ma
38a3(mdo sde): lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir rtses te/ mchis pa mkhyen
38a4(mdo sde): par mdzod cig/ ko'u shi ka da ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pani
38a5(mdo sde): lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag gang srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal
38a6(mdo sde): po ri rab kyi sring gi gni rjes te 'ongs pa shes par gyis shi// grags po dag wAr gang gi dus la bab par sems ni// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang pa brgya byin gyis glang po che rgyal paraH
38a7(mdo sde): brnamal pa men po// nas grang sa tsa'i rnam sa tha can gyis pa'i bang po rgya tshun gyi mi martogs nas/ dpe kyis tha zlabs dang ldan pas lag pa bathus pa las babyung ba ma/
38b1(mdo sde): btung ba las bskum pa bzhizhidu/ klung ba rdza rgyal po rabatu bdun 'jam bu gling nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bram cu gsum pa'i blarnams kyi nang du song ngo // song nas mgro sus du
38b2(mdo sde): gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bum
38b3(mdo sde): bdun bdun lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de
38b4(mdo sde): la lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i mgo bo lhag ma rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i glang po che rnams la ni/ de las gzhan
38b5(mdo sde): pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams zhon no// de shin su mgyogs te/ dper na 'jig pa'i rlung ngam/ chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha'am/ lnga'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'dri ni bdag ni
38b6(mdo sde): mdun du 'gro'o zhe'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer gyi lho phyogs ske nas byung ste/ skyed ro
38b7(mdo sde): chal chub 'gyur tshal du phyin nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang ste/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/
39a1(mdo sde): sum chung gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lngal 'byor cing ldan par gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'dras
39a2(mdo sde): bu nyams su myong ngo // ji tsam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur la/ sems kyang rtsub
39a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur te gde dag lus rtsub pa dang / sems rtsub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos par gyur nas dpung po tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshigs dang //
39a4(mdo sde): rta pa'i tshogs dang shing rta'i tshogs dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs
39a5(mdo sde): dang dpung bu chung gi tshigs rnams kyis go cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos so// /
39a6(mdo sde): go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lha ste/ ral gri dang
39a7(mdo sde): mdung dang 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs so// mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig/
39b1(mdo sde): hu g.yul 'gyed de/ ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas
39b2(mdo sde): shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du sgeg par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag
39b3(mdo sde): bdag cag gi phyi bzhin steg pa las na yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig pu g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste
39b4(mdo sde): lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rgyal te/ lha rnams pha ma nan re/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shing rta
39b5(mdo sde): byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin snyeg par byed na ni de ltar lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di
39b6(mdo sde): dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na yang lan gsum du 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog go// lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lha ma yin
39b7(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te lha rnams pha ma na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas na ni/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go/
40a1(mdo sde): #/ lnga'i grong khyer su zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so//
40a2(mdo sde): 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na 'jug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi
40a3(mdo sde): bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ ci ste lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pha ma na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/
40a4(mdo sde): pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na/
40a5(mdo sde): nider lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha ma yin
40a6(mdo sde): rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par
40a7(mdo sde): byas te pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du sgeg par byed na ni//
40b1(mdo sde): der lA ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams
40b2(mdo sde): phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang ldan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ltar lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin pa man ni lce rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/
40b3(mdo sde): pham par byas shing rgyab kyi sa phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyis mi
40b4(mdo sde): tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi
40b5(mdo sde): grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyis bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis
40b6(mdo sde): kyang 'di skad dudage slong dag sngon byung ba lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pam na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas
40b7(mdo sde): te pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir log go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na ni/ der lha
41a1(mdo sde): / rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lA ma yin 'di dag bdag gi phyi bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/
41a2(mdo sde): lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lA ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing
41a3(mdo sde): rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du
41a4(mdo sde): snyeg par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du sgeg pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes
41a5(mdo sde): nasardzalha rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// dge slong dag ci ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams
41a6(mdo sde): thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go// lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin
41a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin dulha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams
41b1(mdo sde): ni lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong /
41b2(mdo sde): dag 'di ltar snga ma 'das pa'i dus nas/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na/ lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs
41b3(mdo sde): par byas te pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi
41b4(mdo sde): bzhin du sreg par byed na ni/ de ltar lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lAlnga 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do//
41b5(mdo sde): sum du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis
41b6(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas nas/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lde phyogs su lA ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lnga
41b7(mdo sde): ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na ni// der lA ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du sgeg pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dodan
42a1(mdo sde): snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams/
42a2(mdo sde): pa ma na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du
42a3(mdo sde): zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi badz+ra
42a4(mdo sde): bzhin du lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o
42a5(mdo sde): snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na de lta bur gyur to// 'di skad du/ gang che lha dang lha min lhan cig tu gakaganyis ka 'dus shing kayul ni 'gyed pa na// shi
42a6(mdo sde): Na pa ni nyi zla mtshungs med de// lha yi shing rta pa yi mchog yin no// zhes kyang bya'o// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhin sum drurtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba chur dpag tshad
42a7(mdo sde): nyis stong lnga brgya/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ gser gyi ri bas bskor to// ra ba'i
42b1(mdo sde): 'phang du ni dpag chad byed dang gsum yod do// rab de las rtsig skyabs rnam pa pa'i las bus pa yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be n+da pra las byas pa dang
42b2(mdo sde): she la las byas pa rnams so// gyen du 'bang ba'i mda' yab dang / thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang zam pa chud ma rnam pa bani yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngumya las
42b3(mdo sde): byas pa dang / bai nu tra las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang gis gni dbyibs legs shing blda na sdug la mdzes te/ bris shing legs par bris pa/ tshon sna brgya
42b4(mdo sde): rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa brdeg
42b5(mdo sde): na ni bar ces byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying ba rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/
42b6(mdo sde): 'di skad du lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi mthu stobs kyis// lha'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang // me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par
42b7(mdo sde): grems// zhes kyang 'byung ngo // lha'i grong khyer de na sgo stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba yod de/ sgo gcig kyang 'phang du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum zheng du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod do//
43a1(mdo sde): / sgo re re la yang skar ma'i gzugs su byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa
43a2(mdo sde): rnams so// zla ba phyed pa lta bur yongs su grub pa dang / ba lang gi mgo lta bu dang / me long rnams kyang gser las byas pa dang dngul las byas pa dang bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang
43a3(mdo sde): shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yin no// sgo re re la yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsrung ba'i phyir dang / bskyab pa'i phyir/
43a4(mdo sde): dang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir srungs mgo cha bgos shing mda' cha thogs pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam srang srid du dpag tshad nyis sdong lnga brgya yod
43a5(mdo sde): la zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma ba dal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ srang de'i glo g.yas
43a6(mdo sde): g.yon na rdzing bu byas pa'i rdzing bu de dag gser les byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang pa gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzib
43a7(mdo sde): bu de dag gi phyogs pa ni na them skas byas pa yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lha ste/ gser las byas pa dang dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las
43b1(mdo sde): byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai nu rba las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang bzhis kun
43b2(mdo sde): nus bskor te gser gyi lan kan gyi chen ma dang / ga dang bu dang / gzung gzer ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so//
43b3(mdo sde): bai DU R+Ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / kadang bu dang / gzung gzer ni bai DUrba las byas te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa mdzes so// rdzing bu de
43b4(mdo sde): dag kyang chubasil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs te/ de dag na chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan
43b5(mdo sde): tshing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'o gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gicen kor na me ho na gi shing dang
43b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam me
43b7(mdo sde): tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa 'am/ me tog gi rna rgyan legs par brgyus pa bzhin du ste/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa/
44a1(mdo sde): dang skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bskur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de dag gi rten kor na dpag bsams kyi
44a2(mdo sde): shing sngon po dang dmar po dang / ser po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams
44a3(mdo sde): kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos rnam pa bzhi yang de dag bzhi'o// shing las byas pa'i gos rnam pa bzhi yang
44a4(mdo sde): de dag bzhi'o// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing yod do// lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed
44a5(mdo sde): ma thag tu del bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang chud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing
44a6(mdo sde): dag mod de/ lnga'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis jil bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de la bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chung gi
44a7(mdo sde): 'thung bdag kyang meng // mang thog rnams dang / khang pa rtsegs pa rnams dang / khrim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsam khang rnams dang / lhad mo lci ba'i
44b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / zas pa rnams dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing // lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / phe gdob pa dag gis smrasan pa sgronas pa/
44b2(mdo sde): dang ji sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do// de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la
44b3(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi nang na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chur dpag tshad nyis
44b4(mdo sde): brgya lnga bcu / zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag
44b5(mdo sde): chad byed dang lngas gyen du 'phags so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba de'i mang rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa la 'di lnga ste/ se re las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr
44b6(mdo sde): las byas pa dang shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i them pa rnam pa bzhi bkod pa la 'di lnga ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bau rUH
44b7(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i ka ba rnam pa bzhi btsugs pa la 'di lha ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang
45a1(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang shel las byas pa rnams tegaser gyi ka ba'i ni ka rten dang / ka zhu dang / bre phul dang / mdung ma rnams dngul las byas pa'o//
45a2(mdo sde): dngul gyi ni gser las byas pa'o// bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas pa'o// shel gyi ni ka rten dang / ka zhu dang / bre phul dang / gdung ma bai DUR+Ya las byas so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba/
45a3(mdo sde): de'i phyi ma rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzang
45a4(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal ba la phyam stobs dang ldan pa rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lha ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas
45a5(mdo sde): pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la them skas rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag ni 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUrar+ya
45a6(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhi brtsigs so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang /
45a7(mdo sde): shel las byas pa'i rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// be nus
45b1(mdo sde): ni shel las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas so// bar gyi sdom la mang rten them pa ka ba dang / byam rten dang
45b2(mdo sde): no spobs ldan byas// 'khor sa dang ni spang leb khang // ya phubs dag ni tha ma yin// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal bal ba gas brgya mod de/ ba gam re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bdun
45b3(mdo sde): bdun yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re re la gnas khang bdun bdun gnas khang re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la yang sil snyan
45b4(mdo sde): bdun bdun yod do// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i nang na rdzing bu byas pa yod de// rdzing bu de la chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod
45b5(mdo sde): rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUrma las byas pa dang / shel la
45b6(mdo sde): byas pa'i bgru rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhir yang lan kan dag gis kun nas bskor te/ lan kan rnam pa bzhi dag gis snga ma bzhin du/ dbyibs legs shing bstan
45b7(mdo sde): sdug pa la mdzes pa/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lha bus gang s+ye/ me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs
46a1(mdo sde): skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i/
46a2(mdo sde): nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur
46a3(mdo sde): pa ni rtse dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes
46a4(mdo sde): pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzug can rnams sgra skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon
46a5(mdo sde): po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las
46a6(mdo sde): byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing
46a7(mdo sde): dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / skad snyan pa dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams/
46b1(mdo sde): kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de bzhin du de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams
46b2(mdo sde): dang khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / lgang mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes
46b3(mdo sde): par byas shing lnga'i bu mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra sgrogs pa dang / ji sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang /
46b4(mdo sde): ldan pa dag yod de/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dka' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar lho'i mtshams
46b5(mdo sde): na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yod de// chur dpag tshad sum brgya/ zheng du dpag tshad sum brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod de/ lha'i grong khye
46b6(mdo sde): las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhis 'phags so// lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang gi sa gzhi dang / yang thog dang / dgab pa dang / spyi bsdus kyi gdung ma dang / yang thog gi rtse bzhi dang / phya ma gzungs dang /
46b7(mdo sde): bya ma dgu po thams cad shel las byas pa la dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang
47a1(mdo sde): shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi kun nas bskor te/ de la sgo dang / ya phubs dang / g+han da dang / yang thog gi rtse bzhi dang / lun dang / phyam dgu po re re
47a2(mdo sde): la yang ka ba bcu drug bcu drug gis kun nas brten to// rgyu ba'i lam ni rim pa bdun yod de/ de'i dbus na bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i ke ba zur brgyad pa gsal zhing 'phan med la/ rigs dang ldan/
47a3(mdo sde): pa zhig yod de/ skra'i rtse mo tsam gyis khang pa brtsegs pa'i spyi bsdus kyi rten la mi reg go// de'i 'og na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gser gyi khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag
47a4(mdo sde): ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod de/ der sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod nas lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / chos sems shing dpyod de/ yongs su rtog par byed
47a5(mdo sde): dolha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam srid du dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad 'dru gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus
47a6(mdo sde): chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon nas me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes pa'i dbyibs legs la yongs su 'grub pa ste/ me tog
47a7(mdo sde): 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas
47b1(mdo sde): pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang skad mchen pa dang / 'dod dgur bskur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad skur pa 'byin to//
47b2(mdo sde): lha'i zong khyer 'obs bdun rim gyis kun nas bskor te/ 'obs de dag thabs dang / rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod de/ pa ku ga ser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai r+tharba las byas
47b3(mdo sde): pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis brtsigs la/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la
47b4(mdo sde): chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// 'obs de dag na ru
47b5(mdo sde): skra dang / chu mo kun dang / gru sna tshogs rnams byas pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chu'i rtsed mo la rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// 'obs de dag gi rten kor na/ me tog
47b6(mdo sde): gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su 'grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog
47b7(mdo sde): 'breng chung dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brkus pa dang / me tog kaun rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing
48a1(mdo sde): 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
48a2(mdo sde): lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
48a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs
48a4(mdo sde): legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ ra ba de la rtsig skyabs gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas/
48a5(mdo sde): pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// gyen du 'phang ba dang / thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa brgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yod do// gser las
48a6(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bris pa tshor sna brgya
48a7(mdo sde): rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag pa na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg
48b1(mdo sde): nani par shes byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub tsam du yongs su khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di
48b2(mdo sde): skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis ni// shing rta sna tshogs pa na rlung chen ldang // me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems// zhes kyang
48b3(mdo sde): bya'o/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na rdzing bu zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' sgor du dpag tshad nyis bcu yod de/ rdzing bu de yang gser
48b4(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i bgu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa bzhi yod de
48b5(mdo sde): them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUrba las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas
48b6(mdo sde): gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ chu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang zhing me tog ut+pa la dang //
48b7(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs lachu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs kyang skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur
49a1(mdo sde): / pa'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen kor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs pa yongs/
49a2(mdo sde): su 'grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'breng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gul brgyus pa dang / me tog gi
49a3(mdo sde): rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad sran
49a4(mdo sde): pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do//
49a5(mdo sde): dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams
49a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lnga ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha dang /
49a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do//
49b1(mdo sde): yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / lung mo lbu ba'i sa rnams dang / zas pa rnams bud med kyis/
49b2(mdo sde): mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil san dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra sran pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung
49b3(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // de'i glo lam chur dpag tshad ni
49b4(mdo sde): shu zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing bltan sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma mngal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod do// de'i gro g.yas g.yon name/
49b5(mdo sde): tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog
49b6(mdo sde): 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba za gul brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad sran cing
49b7(mdo sde): 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
50a1(mdo sde): / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa pa ni yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po
50a2(mdo sde): dang ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar dza dang / hab shing dag
50a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod/
50a4(mdo sde): par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lha de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang //
50a5(mdo sde): khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu'i bzhon pa la zhon par 'gyur te/ skyen mos tshal shing rta sna
50a6(mdo sde): tshogs can du dong nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal
50a7(mdo sde): shing rta sna tshogs can na/ rdzing bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod/
50b1(mdo sde): la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos chal shing rta sna tshogs can du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe / yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de//
50b2(mdo sde): rang gi las kyi 'bras bu rnams su myong bsan/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gni bzang po sna
50b3(mdo sde): tshogs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga badru/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
50b4(mdo sde): lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang
50b5(mdo sde): gzung gzer ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bai rUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi ni chen ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas so// de'i nang /
50b6(mdo sde): gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing bldan sdug la mdzes pa/ bris shing legs par bris pa/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis legs par bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal
50b7(mdo sde): gyi 'da' ba 'amaras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin/ rkang pa bzhag pa na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni per shes byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te
51a1(mdo sde): de na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me togagasar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams las kyi dbang /
51a2(mdo sde): gi rkyen gyis na// sa ga ni sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang // me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems// zhes kyang bya'o// de'i las sring du pa
51a3(mdo sde): nyi shu/ zheng du dpag chad byed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing bldan sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing can dran gyi chus chag chag btab pa gzhig mos/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon na mo//
51a4(mdo sde): tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog gi 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'dres
51a5(mdo sde): chung ngam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi skyob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gul brkus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bye sna tshogs skad snyan cing
51a6(mdo sde): 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
51a7(mdo sde): dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
51b1(mdo sde): dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byang sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang chud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / rab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag kyang yod do// rgyan sna tshogs/
51b2(mdo sde): lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lnga'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de wA bur de dag gi las
51b3(mdo sde): tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am
51b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bzhon pa ji lta bur 'did par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la zhon nas sa gzhi sna tshogs can du 'dong zhing ci bder gnas pas mngon par dag
51b5(mdo sde): bar byed do// den lha'i drang srong rnams rang dkar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad ci shun/ skyed mos tshal chub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dag
51b6(mdo sde): tshad chos brgya lnga bcu zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i
51b7(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shing rta sna tshogs can na dzi lta bde bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming chub 'gyur zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/
52a1(mdo sde): #/ skyed mos tshal chub 'gyur la/ rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang /
52a2(mdo sde): rgyan rnams rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe
52a3(mdo sde): yang / lus kyang drub par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ g.yul la mos par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming drub 'gyur tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur/
52a4(mdo sde): tshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu / zheng du dpag tshad cis brgya lnga badra/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa
52a5(mdo sde): gzhi bzang po sna tshogs can ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal 'dren pa'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad
52a6(mdo sde): bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga brlu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad spong yod la gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang
52a7(mdo sde): du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa
52b1(mdo sde): snying mos chal 'dres pa'i rnalan/ rdzing bu 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / kos rnams dang / rgyan 'dres pa/
52b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha'i bu mo 'dres pa rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa'i tshe yang tshol bar 'dres te
52b3(mdo sde): shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i chal
52b4(mdo sde): gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po 'dres pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu / mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad
52b5(mdo sde): stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
52b6(mdo sde): tshur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu ga zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu ga mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/
52b7(mdo sde): snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshil na rdzing bu
53a1(mdo sde): dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams dga' ba dang /
53a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dag/
53a3(mdo sde): la dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed/
53a4(mdo sde): mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcug zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha'
53a5(mdo sde): skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o//
53a6(mdo sde): bam po bzhi pa// / lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi mtshams na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ yongs 'dus brtol
53a7(mdo sde): gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu thur du zug go// 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do// yal ga phyir gyes pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// yongs 'dus brtol gyi yal ga lnga yod de/ yal ga gcig ni/
53b1(mdo sde): shar phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// sal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'arung ngo // yal ga brdi/
53b2(mdo sde): pa ni byang phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga steng ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur steng gi nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go// yongs 'dus brtol gyi chur dpag tshad lnga bcur yod do// sboms
53b3(mdo sde): su yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad sum brgya lnga brgya yod do// yongs 'dus brtol gyi rdo rje phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par dpag chud
53b4(mdo sde): lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang / kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i
53b5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas
53b6(mdo sde): gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
53b7(mdo sde): lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa
54a1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod lade'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi sbal mig 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum/
54a2(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal mig bye bar 'gyur ro zhes kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa/
54a3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi sbal mig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma
54a4(mdo sde): yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod
54a5(mdo sde): la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di/
54a6(mdo sde): me tog kha 'bus pa las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang
54a7(mdo sde): yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog kha 'bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na/
54b1(mdo sde): da ni ring po mo thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang /
54b2(mdo sde): yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i
54b3(mdo sde): rdo rje phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nge 'dug go// bcom ldan
54b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs 'dus brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcur thur du zug go// 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do// yal ka dang /
54b5(mdo sde): lo ma dang / yal ga rnams ni dpag tshad lnga bcur gyes so// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
54b6(mdo sde): kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ da ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do//
54b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa
55a1(mdo sde): las na/ da ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes / kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong
55a2(mdo sde): dgasum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus bcol 'di spel mig 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na
55a3(mdo sde): da ring po mi thogs par sbal mig dbye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shi
55a4(mdo sde): yongs 'dus brtol gyi sbal mig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di spel mig bye ba las na/ da ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/
55a5(mdo sde): kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu
55a6(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na/ da ring po mo thogs par me tog kha dbye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang
55a7(mdo sde): yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do zhes nas/ dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus
55b1(mdo sde): bsob 'di me tog kha 'bye ba las na da ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i/
55b2(mdo sde): dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs 'dus bcol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams
55b3(mdo sde): cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rje phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dad ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang
55b4(mdo sde): nge 'dug go// shing yongs 'dus brtol thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'og na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te
55b5(mdo sde): rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi mthu ni de tsam mo zhes gsungs
55b6(mdo sde): so// / bar gyi sdom la/ dang po lo ma ser ba dang // de nas 'dab ljags sbal mig 'thon// sbal mig bye dang me tog 'bus// me tog kha bye thams cad rgyas// shing yongs 'du
55b7(mdo sde): sa brdol gyi drung na/ sum dru rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo le ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga badru/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ 'phang du
56a1(mdo sde): / dpag tshad byed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bris shing legs par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa
56a2(mdo sde): gcig gis bris te/ 'jam zhing shing tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes
56a3(mdo sde): byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi seng ge'i khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi
56a4(mdo sde): khri bshams pa yod do// de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur byed de/ rang gi las
56a5(mdo sde): kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ar mo ni ge lu bu'i rdo leb kyi kho ra khor yug na/ me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs
56a6(mdo sde): legs la yongs su grub pa te/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyu ra pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la
56a7(mdo sde): brgyas pa 'am/ me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur
56b1(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de banyen kor na dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon pa/
56b2(mdo sde): dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol
56b3(mdo sde): mo'o cha byad sna tshogs 'di la ste/ bi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi lang rgyud gsum pa dang / la bar dza dang / hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang /
56b4(mdo sde): rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'brub pa'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi/
56b5(mdo sde): rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag yod do// yang thogs rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil
56b6(mdo sde): khang rnams dang / lhad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / steng khang rnams dang / khyer du 'dug pa rnams dang / so so na 'dug pa rnams dang / rgyud ma rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par
56b7(mdo sde): byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bston pa dang / sil snyaran dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra sman par spogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bskos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan
57a1(mdo sde): te/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // sum cu rtsa
57a2(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pas srungs kyi bu zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du
57a3(mdo sde): 'dug la yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i mgo bos dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la
57a4(mdo sde): mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu'i srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum// zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod do//
57a5(mdo sde): glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu 'khor glang po che'i brgyad srong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog lur thal kar du 'dug cing /
57a6(mdo sde): yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas pa ste/ de dag gi mgo bo dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu sher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug
57a7(mdo sde): yod pa sha stag ste/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bus mgo bo sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sprus
57b1(mdo sde): mgo bo re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lnga'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu
57b2(mdo sde): mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun// g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na/ khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha rnams kyi dbang po
57b3(mdo sde): brgya byin zhon no// mgo bo lhags rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no// glang po che lhag ma rnams la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams zhon no// de shin tu mgyogs
57b4(mdo sde): tedaper na 'jigs pa'i rlung ngam/ chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lnga 'am/ lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'di dag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhe 'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do//
57b5(mdo sde): de nas glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so sor grong khyer gyi sgo nas 'thon to// bton nas so sor skyed mos tshal du phyin par byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed
57b6(mdo sde): bde btang nas/ 'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ lha'i 'dod pa lnga dgal 'byor tsong ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse
57b7(mdo sde): zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ ji ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris
58a1(mdo sde): lA ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor grong khyer blta na sdug ji lta ba de bzhin du
58a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yang grong khyer gser ldan zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags
58a3(mdo sde): bzangs ris kyi khang bzangs kyang gdams pa can zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi 'dun sa
58a4(mdo sde): yang nor bzangs zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi 'di lha ste/ shing rta sna tshogs can dang / rtsub 'gyur tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / dga' ba'i tshi la ji lta ba de
58a5(mdo sde): bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi yang 'di lta ste/ kun tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba rnams yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
58a6(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs dang / rtsub 'gyur dang / 'dres pa dang / dga' ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gzhi bzangs po bzhi yang kun tu dga' ba ma dang /
58a7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ma dang / dga' ma'i kun dga' ra ba ma rnams so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i shing yongs 'dus brtol ji lta ba de bzhin duka lha ma yin rnams kyi shing yang tsi tra pa ta la zhes bya'o//
58b1(mdo sde): sum dru rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi yang lha ma yin gyi rdo leb ces bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i
58b2(mdo sde): rgyal po skyed mos chal du sprad pas srungs kyi bu ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa yang te se'i gangs brtsegs zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
58b3(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab tu brtan pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lA ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa yang bzod par dka' ba zhes bya'o// sum
58b4(mdo sde): du rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po yang brag rdzing zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i grong
58b5(mdo sde): khyer ji ltar 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi yang grong khyer yang 'khor dang ldan pa yin no// lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji
58b6(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du/ rgyas par brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshogs bdun pa'o// / sdom la/ phyed dang drug dang thang cig mtha'// thung dang grang dang 'bri ba dang /
58b7(mdo sde): rnyog pa dang ni bsdu ba dang // phyogs dang shar phyogs 'du shes pa// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad bco brgyad cha gcig
59a1(mdo sde): / tu 'jam bu gling las yol te/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag chad byed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug tu nyim byang phyogs su 'gro ste/
59a2(mdo sde): byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig tu rgya mtsho chen po las yol te/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha
59a3(mdo sde): gcig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ nyin mo las thang cig re re 'grib cing / mtshan mo las thang cig re re skye'o// zla ba drug tu nyi ma
59a4(mdo sde): byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ mtshan mo las thang cig re re 'grib cing // nyin mo las thang cig re re skye'o// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/
59a5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling gi mtha' myur du spong ngo // zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'dzam bu gling gi dbus yun ring mo zhig gis spong ngo // ci'i phyir dgun mtshan mo ring la nyin
59a6(mdo sde): mo thung zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'dzam bu gling gi mtha' myur du spong bas na/ de'i phyir ni dgun mtshan mo ring la nyin mo thung ngo // ci'i phyir dpyid
59a7(mdo sde): dang dbyar nyin mo ring la mtshan mo thung zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi mi byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'dzam bu gling gi dbus yun ring po zhig gis spong bas/ de'i phyir na dpyid dang dbyar na nyin mo ring la
59b1(mdo sde): mtshan mo thung ngo // ci'i phyir dgun grang bar gyur ce na ka spras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba naka dpag chad bani khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba rnams rgya
59b2(mdo sde): mtsho chen por bab pas gling rnams su grang bar gyur te/ de'i phyi'i dgun grang ngo // ci'i phyir dpyid dang dbyar dro bar gyur ce na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ byang
