334b6(mdo sde): yang dag shes 'khor khri phrag bcu dang / lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor stong dang / nam mkha'i spyan 'khor brgyad stong dang / lha'i bu gser 'phreng 'khor lnga brgya dang / lha'i klu'i rgyal po gnas
334b7(mdo sde): rjes po 'khor stong dang / lha mo lcags kyu can 'khor stong phrag bcu dang / lha mo gnas ldan ma 'khor lde stong dang / rigs kyi bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab
335a1(mdo sde): brtan dang / lha mo 'phrog ma 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dam tshig bcas nas/ li sul bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes te/ ding sang gi bar
335a2(mdo sde): du'ang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' 'di brgya dang / rnam thos kyi sras mgon po dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha mo rnams thog ma sangs rgyas ko'u te shan du gshegs te/ 'khor mang pos bskor/
335a3(mdo sde): nas bzhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams dang / mgon po dang / wa klu rnams ga la bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas dang / dam tshig blangs pa'i sar da dung yang yul bsrung zhing byin gyis
335a4(mdo sde): rlob/ mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung // de nas sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/ dgung lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po dar ma a sho ka zhes bgyi bzhig/
335a5(mdo sde): gis sngon sems can mang po zhig bkum pa las/ slad kyis 'phags pa dgra bcom yang sha zhes bgyi ba zhig gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas/ sngar sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa mthol
335a6(mdo sde): zhing bshags/ slad kyis mi bgyi bar yang yid ma bcas/ 'dzam bu'i gling nas sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten bzhugs pa rnams su mchod pa
335a7(mdo sde): bgyid cing / dogs byin can gnyen po byin gyis brlabs pa mchis so 'tshal du gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong brtsig tu mchis pa las/ mtsho bskams nas li yul yang yul
335b1(mdo sde): spong bar mchis pa'i che/ da ltar 'u zin gyi sku mkhar mchis pa'i dog sar kus po yin du shul byung nas/ rdo dgongs gcig btab pa'i nub mo rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las khye'u mtshan dang ldan
335b2(mdo sde): ba bzang po gcig btsas nas/ sngon rgyal po'i btsun mo de kun dga'i ra ba'i skyed mos tshal du mchis pa las/ rdzing bu'i nang du khrus bgyid cing mchis pa'i dus na/ rnam thos kyi sras 'khor dang bcas
335b3(mdo sde): ma rnams nam mkha' la gshegs pas kyang yas gzigs/ rgyal po'i btsun sos kyang rnam thos kyi sras byad bzhin bzang po mthong bas/ sems kyis bur chags pa/ kus po yin du
335b4(mdo sde): btsas nas/ rgyal po dar ma a sho kas ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste/ bu 'di che ring ngam thung / mtshan ma bzang ngan dang / dbang za ci yod ces brtags na/ lhas mkhan rnams kyi mchid
335b5(mdo sde): nas/ bu 'di mtshan ma'ang bzang / dbang zang yang rab tu che ste/ mi tha mal pa ma lags pas/ rgyal po yab sku che ma 'phos par rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur ro zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po dar ma/
335b6(mdo sde): a sho ka'ang phrag dog skyes te zos nas/ kho bo de ltar dbang thang che na/ kho ba dga'atshe zhing srid 'dzim zang / 'ding la mi dgos kyis bor cig ces maminas/ mas kyang bu de mi bor du ni kargyal/
335b7(mdo sde): po khro zhing drag shul dag che bas bu bkum ste dogs nas/ mas bu de bor ba las/ slad kyis sa las nu ma byung nas/ de 'tshal ba las mgum nas ming yang phyis sa nur btags so// de'i rjes
336a1(mdo sde): na rgya rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po bu stong dbang ba zhig byung ste/ bu dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu ni mchis na/ stong du bu gcig ma tshang ba rnam thos kyi sras la gsol ba
336a2(mdo sde): btab ste bslangs nas rnam thos kyi sras kyis bltas na/ khye'us nu bsod nams can bor ba mthong nas blangs te/ rgya rje'u'i bu skal du stsal/ de nas rgya rjes bu de gsos nas skad kyis khye'u chen/
336a3(mdo sde): por skyes nas/ rgya rje'u bu spun dang byis pa rtse rtse ba las 'thabs nas/ khyod rgya rje'i bu ma yin no zhes bgyis pa dang / khye'u de gle ba mi dga' nas mi gzhan dag la'ang lo rgyus smras na'ang / de ltar
336a4(mdo sde): gyur nas rgya rjel bdag thog ma skyes pa'i yul tshol sa tshol du mchis par cig nang zhes gsol ba las/ rgya rje'i zhal nas khyod nga'i bu yin te/ yul sa'ang 'di yin na/ mi dgar ma byed cig ces lan
336a5(mdo sde): du ma bsgo ba la mnyan nas/ rgya rje rgyal bu sa nu rgyal po'i thabs stsal te/ dmag stong phrag bcu dang bsgrogs te/ nub phyogs su yul tshol sa tshol du btang ba las/ li yul gyi me skar du phyin te/
336a6(mdo sde): nas mchis pa las rgya gar yul nas kyang rgyal po dar ma a sho ka'i blon po ya sha zhes bgyi ba la dku dar nas/ rgyal po ya sha spang spun rje khol 'khor yan chad/ rgyal po la mi dga' ba bdun stong yus
336a7(mdo sde): nas phyung ste/ nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su yul tshol sa tshel du mchi mchi ba las/ 'u then gyi shel chab gong ma'i yul phyogs su mchis pa dang / rgyal bu sa nu'i 'khor gyis tshong pa sher bgyi
336b1(mdo sde): ba dang / zang bgyi ba gnyis la ba sdum thun mong gcig mchis pa las/ ba 'u nad langs nas me skar nas zhugs ngam zad kar brtol te/ to lar zos pa las mi re gnyis kyis rjes bzhin du bdas
336b2(mdo sde): ba las ka to lar bslebs te ba be'u 'brangs pa las yul de'i ming yang be'u 'brangs pa'i sa 'bras so lo tsa zhes btags/ to la'i zhugs ngam gyi ming yang 'di skad du shes zang shes btags/
336b3(mdo sde): de nas mi gnyis kyis bltas na/ yul gzhongs stong pa bzang po zhig gda' nas/ 'di bdag cag gi rgyal bu sa nu'i yul sar rung ngo zhes mchid gros su 'tshal nas/ yul sa de ltar yang mchi
336b4(mdo sde): mchi ba dang / 'u then gyi shas chab geng mar mchis pa dang / blon po ya sha'i 'khor dang mjal nas/ khyed su'i mi/ ga las mchis zhes rmas pa dang / mi de gnyis kyis kyang rgyal bu sa nu'i lo
336b5(mdo sde): rgyus zhib tu bshad pa dang / ya shas kyang rgyal bu sa nu mas skar na mchis pa'i steng du/ pho nyas 'phrin pa las khyod ni rgyal rigs/ bdag ni blon po'i rigs na/ chu srid gcig tu 'jam ste/ khyod
336b6(mdo sde): ni rgyal po byas la/ bdag gis blon po byas te/ 'u zin gyi gzhongs 'dir yul sar btsug na rung ngo zhes mchi nas/ de nas rgyal bu sa nu'ang 'khor dang bcas te/ 'u then gyi shel chu gong mar/
336b7(mdo sde): mchis nas/ tshar 'ban 'di ko nya'i mgo yul hang gu rdzo zhes bgyi bar mjal te/ rgyal bu dang blon po ya sha gnyis yul sa la ma dum ste/ dmag bkye ste 'thabs pa las/ nam mkha' las
337a1(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi sras dang / dpal gyi lha mo byung nas bzhugs te/ 'thab tu ma stsal nas/ dogs de nyid du nam thos kyi sras dang / dpal gyi lha mo bzhugs pa'i rten khang re/
337a2(mdo sde): re zhig brtsigs pa'ang ring sang gi bar du mchis te/ yul srungs mar gtso bor rnam zos kyi sras dang / dpal gyi lha mo mchod pa'ang lags/ de nas rgyal bu sa nu dang / blon po ya sha ya dus nas/
337a3(mdo sde): sa nus ni rgyal po bgyis/ ya shas ni blon po bgyis nas/ rgyal bu sa nu'i 'khor rgya rnams ni 'u zen gyi shel chu 'og ma man chad mdo lo mes kar dang / kam sheng yan chad du bkod/ blon po sa
337a4(mdo sde): sha'i rgya gar rnams ni shel chu gong ma yan chad du rgyu dang kong sheng man chad du bkod/ shel chu dbus ni rgya gar dang / rgya'i thon po dang / 'bangs stod rims 'dres par bkod nas yul btsugs/
337a5(mdo sde): mkhar brtsigs te/ rgya gar dang rgya phrad pa'i bu ni li lags te/ skad ni rgya gar dang mi mthun/ yi ge ni rgya gar dang bags kyis 'thun/ 'jig rten pa'i lugs ni rgya dang phal cher 'thun/ chos
337a6(mdo sde): kyi lugs dang chos skad ni rgya gar dang phal cher 'thun/ li'i 'phral skad ni thog ma byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal nyan thos kyi dge slong gi tshul du sprul te/ mtshan bai ro tsa na zhes bgyi bas
337a7(mdo sde): byis pa phyugs rdzi khye'u 'jos dang / mu le 'dzi zhes bgyi ba gnyis la sogs pa la/ yul tsarma bgyi bar li skad phung ste kun la brlabs nas/ khye'u de gnyis kyang gar mchis pa'i sa su la'ang /
337b1(mdo sde): ma mchis te/ li skad kyang thogs 'phags pa rnams kyis bstan cing bslabs pa lags/ thog ma li yul byung nas dgung lo du lon pa/ go'u rdo shan gyi mkhan po mo rku bde shi la sogs pas/
337b2(mdo sde): mkhan po bkres rims kyis mkhan po snga rabs la bka' mching thos pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa dang / l-i rje'i rgyal rabs kyi yi ge dang zhib tu gzugs na gna' thog ma rgyagar
337b3(mdo sde): yul du/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po bgyis pa nas brtsis na/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras spyir dgung lo sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyal po bgyis pa las rgyal srid bzung ste dgung lo lnga lags pa las/
337b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das de tshun chad dgung lo nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyal po bgyis te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgu nas rgyal po dar ma a sho ka'i bar du/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po rabs bcus rgyal srid bzung /
337b5(mdo sde): ste/ dar ma a sho kas spyir rgyal po dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga bgyis pa las/ rgyal por zhugs nas dgung lo sum cu lags pa'i 'og tu rgyal po sa nu btsas te/ sa nu dgung lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i
337b6(mdo sde): tshe rgya rjes rgyal thabs phul nas/ thog pa'i yul tshol sa tshol du mchis pa las/ rgyal bu sa nu dgung lo bcu dgu lon pa'i tshe/ sul li yul btsugs te/ tho gis re li rjer zhugs pa san chan
337b7(mdo sde): zhib tu brtsis na/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dgung lo ces brgya sum cu rtsa bani lags nas/ li yul yang gdod byung bar gyur/ rgyal bu sa nus thog sar li rjer zhugs nas/ rgyal
338a1(mdo sde): srid bzung tshun chad dang / li rje btsan bzang btsan la brtan/ thog mar li rjer bskos nas/ li rje rabs lnga bcu rtsa drug dang / chag tsha ba gcig byung / gna' dang po mtsho
338a2(mdo sde): bskams nas rgyal bu sa nu dang / blon po ya sha la sogs pas thog ma zhig bzung ste yul brtsigs nas/ rgyal bu sa nu'i bu rgyal po le'u zhes bgyi bas/ ru then gyi dngar ldan gyi grong khyer brtsigs/
338a3(mdo sde): he li yul byung nas dgung lo brgya drug cu rtsa lnga 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rgyal po ye'u la'i bu rgyal po bi rdza ya sam b+ha ba zhes bgyi bas rgyal por zhugs nas/ dgung lo lnga lags nas li yul du thog ma chos
338a4(mdo sde): byung ste/ 'jam dpal dang byams pa gnyis kyis li yul 'di dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khung pa lags par thugs su chud nas/ byams pa ni mir skye ba blangs te/ rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba zhes
338a5(mdo sde): sprul/ 'jam dpal ni dge slong 'phags pa bai ro tsa na'i gzugs su sprul nas/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i mthar phyin pa'i gnas/ yul tsarma bcu le'i tshal du gshegs te/ li yul na mchis pa'i
338a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing / li'i skad kyang byis pa phrugs rdzi rnams la bcos shing bstan/ li'i mi ge yang bslabs nas/ de'i 'og tu chos byung ngo // de nas rgyal po
338a7(mdo sde): le'u la'i bu rgyal po bi dz+ri la sam b+ha bas yon bdag bgyis nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa bai ro tsa na'i slad du// thog mar li yul du tsarma'i gtsug lag khang pa brtsigs par bgyis pa las/
338b1(mdo sde): rde bi dza ya sam zla ba'i blon po dang / 'bangs 'khor dang bcas pa kun gyis kyang / tsarmar gtsug lag khab re re brtsig par gsol nas brtsigs na mad so tsam zhig byung ba las rgyal pos bsams/
338b2(mdo sde): pad+ma gtsug lag khang rtsig tu ma srul na ni/ bdag la dngos sdig tu 'gyur/ de snyed cig brtsigs na ni/ slad kyis zhig ral du gyur na'ang mi slongs su grob chung bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags
338b3(mdo sde): pa bai ro tsa na la zhus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri ram su la bzhugs pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rtsigs shig ces bsgo na/ sdig tu mi 'gyur zhes byung nas
338b4(mdo sde): rgyal pos kyang blon po dang 'bangs rnams la de bzhin du bsgo nas/ tsarmi'i gtsug lag khang chen po rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha bas brtsigs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / 'bangs
338b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis tsarmar gtsug lag khang chung ngu dang / mchod rten brtsigs so 'tshal gyi nang na sha ri ram ma stsal ba gcig kyang ma mchis te/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs lags na/ 'phags pa
338b6(mdo sde): bai ro tsa nas rgyal po bai rdza ya sam b+ha ba la rgyal pos gaN+DI brdungs la/ 'phags pa rnams spyan drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang / rgyal po'i mchid nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du 'dir
338b7(mdo sde): gshegs te/ bdag gi lag tu gaN+DI ma stsal gyi bar du bdag gaN+DI mi rdung ngo zhes smon lam btab pa dang / de ma thag tu 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa dge slong bai ro tsa na nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs par
339a1(mdo sde): sprul te/ nyan thos chen po bcu drug dang thabs cig tu tsarmar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas/ rgyal po bi dza sa sam b+ha ba'i lag tu gaN+DI stsal nas/ rgyal po cha
339a2(mdo sde): gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / dgung bdun gyi bar du gaN+DI'i sgra ma chad par byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon sum du gshegs pa'i ngan rtags su go ma la zhabs kyis bcags pa'i rjes da dung
339a3(mdo sde): gi bair du tsarma na mchis/ 'phags pa nyan thos chen po bcu drug la mchod pa'i rin po che sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i bshos cha bcu drug rgyal pos phul ba'ang tsama'i gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'phags
339a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis gter du stsal te/ phyis dus dmus shing dge 'dun la yon bdag sa mchis te/ 'tsho ba mi 'thor ba'i dus na rin po rje'i bshos cha 'di rnams de'i tshe sa'i 'og nas 'thung shes 'phags
339a5(mdo sde): pa'i lung bstan pa dag las kyang byung / dge slong 'phags pa bai ro tsa n+da'i mchod pa'i cha rkyen du klu'i rgyal po cu lor zhes bgyi bas kha che'i yul nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sku gdung bzhugs
339a6(mdo sde): pa'i mchod rten gcig spyan drangs nas/ nam mkha' las gshegs te da ltar tsarman bzhugs te/ mchod rten 'di dri gtsang khang gi nang na bzhugs te/ grib ma slad rol du gsal bar 'byung / rgyal
339a7(mdo sde): po bi dzi ya sing ha zhes bgyi ba tsarma'i gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du mchis pa las/ sku gzugs bder song bgyis pa'i gcig 'chag cing gshegs par mthong nas/ mtshams med pa
339b1(mdo sde): lnga byung ngo zhes bgyi mchi ba'ang da ltar bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang de'i srungs mar zhal gyis bzhes pa'ang lha nam mkha'i spyan dang / nor bu bzang po zhes bgyi ba lags te/ ding sang gi bar du
339b2(mdo sde): mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung / 'phags pa'i lung bstan pa dag dang sbyar na'ang / thog ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams brtsigs pa'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / yon bdag 'phags pa/
339b3(mdo sde): sha stag gis mdzad la/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten bzhugs so 'tshal gyi nang na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi/
339b4(mdo sde): sku gdung bzhugs pas/ gnyen zhing byin che rab ste/ thog ma la yul du gtsug lag khang byung ba'ang 'di las snga ba ma mchis/ de nas tsarmar 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa dge slong 'phags pa bai ro tsa nas
339b5(mdo sde): chos phyung / rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha bas gtsug lag khang brtsigs tshun chad rgyal po li rje rabs bdun gyi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs// de nas de'i 'og tu rgya gar yul nas 'phags pa
339b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa bud 'dud ta dang / kha 'ga' sta dang / kha ga ro yang dang / kha ga drod dang bzhi byung ste/ go'u to shan gyi Ar+ya sta nar bzhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'ang l-i rje ba'i
339b7(mdo sde): dza bi dza ru bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po del srog mkhar gyi steng nas bltas na/ mkhar gyi phyi rol du ga ser dang dngul lta bur snang ba zhig mthong nas bsnyegs pa dang / da ltar 'gum tir gyi mchod rten chen
340a1(mdo sde): por bzhugs pa bslab nas bltas na/ sha ba ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes su gyur te/ rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po khyod sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan pa
340a2(mdo sde): bzhin/ 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa'i rigs so zhes bgyis pa dang su'i phyir rtsig ces rgyal pos zhus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya zhes bgyi ba 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bu da 'du ta la sogs
340a3(mdo sde): pa bzhi/ khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'ongs pa 'di dag gi phyir rtsigs shig ces bsgo ba dang / 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag kyang rgyal po bi dza ya bi r+ya'i drung du byon nas chos bshad pas/ rgyal
340a4(mdo sde): po'ang che snga ma'i smon lam dran nas/ de ma thag tu dog sa brtags pa'i phur bu der btab ste/ gtsug lag khang 'gum tir brtsigs so// de nas rgyal po bi dzi sa bor 'gum tir gyi gtsug lag khang du
340a5(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyid du mchis pa'i tshe/ bu chung ngu zhig stor nas rjes bcad de btsal na/ 'go'u jo shan gyi lung bu'i nang na/ da ltar su mi ra zhes bgyi ba gtsug lag khang gi nang na/ sangs rgyas 'od srungs
340a6(mdo sde): kyi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bu rnyed de/ de nas rgyal pos mchod rten 'di gang gi dus na sus brtsigs zhes rmas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dag gi zhal nas/ mchod
340a7(mdo sde): rten sangs rgyas 'od srungs mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe brtsigs te/ sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi sku gdung bzhugs so// li yul sngon mtshor gyur pa'i dus na/ mchod rten 'di ris g.yogs te chus ma zhig
340b1(mdo sde): gyis kyang yul 'di mtshor 'gyur te/ yang mchod rten 'dir sa log nas chus mi 'jig ste/ sangs rgyas byams pa 'brub pa'i che'ang mtshe bskams nas/ yul du gyur pa'i dus na mchod rten 'di 'byung ste/
340b2(mdo sde): gnas 'drin dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khud pa'i nang na'ang / ke'u to shan 'di po brang gcig yin te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyang kun
340b3(mdo sde): 'dir gshegs shing lung ston/ sems can gyi don mdzad do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shu'ang dus gsum du glang mgo ri 'di la mched pa
340b4(mdo sde): mdzad du byon nas slar gshegs so zhes bstan/ de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bir+ye dad pa'i shugs chen pos glang mgo ri'i steng du 'ge'u te shan gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas bu chung ngu de'ang /
340b5(mdo sde): thar par btang ste/ phyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ li yul du dgra bcom par 'gyur ba 'di las snga ba ma byung bas/ 'di ni lam skyon pa'o zhes me chu bde shi bya bar btags te
340b6(mdo sde): thog ma mo rku bde shi'i ming ni de nas byung ste/ dang sang gi bar du'ang thub ldan dang / dka' thub kyang mchog las btus te/ mo rku bde shir bsgo ba lags ka 'ge'u to shan dang / 'gum ti
340b7(mdo sde): gyi gtsug lag khang 'di gnyis bzhugs pa'i dog sa'ang dus gsum gyi de mazhin gshegs pa rims kyis 'byung ngo 'tshal gyi zhabs kyis bcags byin gyis rlob pa'i steng du 'phags
341a1(mdo sde): pa'i lung bstan pa dag dang sbyar na'ang thog ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams brtsig pa'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yon pa dag 'phags pa sha stag gis mdzad la
341a2(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten bzhugs so 'tshal gyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung ba zhugs
341a3(mdo sde): pas gnyan cing byin tshe rab ste/ gtsug lag khang gi srungs mar zhal gyis bzhes pa'ang rnam thos kyi sras dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes dang / klu'i rgyal po gnas drug po lags/
341a4(mdo sde): ta/ ding sang gi bar du'ang mngon rtags dang / mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung ba'i phyir/ li yul gyi gtsug lag khang bzhugs so 'tshal gyi nang na gtso bor bgyi ba lags/ rgyal po bi dza bir+yas
341a5(mdo sde): 'gum tir gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs tshun chad rgyal po rabs gnyis gyi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal be bi dza ya dza sa zhes bgyi bas rgya rje'i bu mo pu
341a6(mdo sde): shwa ra zhes bgyi ba mchis brang du blangs nas/ rgya rje'i bu mo des li yul du srin bu'i sa bon zhig 'tshal te mchis nas/ yul ma zha bgyi bar srin bu gsos pa dang / srin bu ma tshar ba'i skabs su glen pa/
341a7(mdo sde): rgyus mi 'tshal ba kha cig gis/ rgyal po bi dza ya dza sa rgyal po'i mo btsun mo bgyid pa des sbrul gdug pa mang po ma zhar ba gso zhing mchis te chen por gyur pa dang / yul phyogs su gnod par glo ba chung nas ji
341b1(mdo sde): ltar bgyi zhes blon po dag gis zhus pa dang / sbrul gso ba'i khang par ma thong la kun sregs shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal mos de zos nas 'phral du ni rgyal po la chus kyis bshad pa'i rngom thogs nas/
341b2(mdo sde): srin bu shis shig brkus te/ gsang thabs su gsos te/ slad kyis kha ces dar dang srin ba la phyung nas ka dar dang men tri ba tags te rgyal po la bstan nas/ rgyus kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang / rgyal
341b3(mdo sde): po'ang 'gyod pa skyes te/ rgya gar yul nas dge slong 'phags pa sang ga go sha zhes bgyi ba li yul du byon nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du spyan drangs te/ srin bu phal mo che bkum pa'i dngos sdig
341b4(mdo sde): bshags srungs bgyis nas/ bo star+ya dang / mga'i mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang chen po brtsigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri ram mang mo tsam zhig stsal te/ de'i slad du dpying zla ra
341b5(mdo sde): ba'i de theg thag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs par na mazho bo star+ya zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs so// zhes 'phags pa dag gis lung bstan pas/ ding sang gi bar
341b6(mdo sde): du'ang li yul gyi dge 'dun sde gnyis dang / rgyal po dang / blon po man chad/ 'bangs yan chad lo re zhing dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo la mchod pa bgyid cing / ril gyis po ltar+ya'i gtsug lag 'ang
341b7(mdo sde): du mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyan zhing byin che rab ste/ lha rat+na ba la dang / rat+na shur gnyis srungs mar zhal gyis bzhes pa lags te/ ding sang gi bar
342a1(mdo sde): du'ang mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung ngo // de nas rgyal po bi dza ya dz+wa ya zhes bgyi ba la bu spun gsum mchis te/ bu pho rab don 'das zhes
342a2(mdo sde): bgyi ba ni rgyal srid ma 'tshal te/ bsod nams bgyid cing rgya gar yul du mchis/ de'i nu bo bar ma ngang rgyal srid ma 'tshal nas ban ner zhugs te/ ming la dur ma nan da zhes btags
342a3(mdo sde): nas/ rgya gar yul du chos slob tu mchis/ nu bo tha chung rgyal sar zhugs te/ ming ri dza ya dar mar btags/ rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma ded pa'i zhing rtsa la che bas gsod sbyin dag la dga'
342a4(mdo sde): nas phu bo ban de dar ma nan da rgya gar yul na mchis pa chos mnyan bslabs bsgoms pas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyur te/ 'phags pa dang mnan das rgya gar yul nas bltan/ nu'o
342a5(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dza ya dang ma gsod skyen 'gyid cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la zhen par mthong nas/ glo ba rje ste/ dge ba'i ngoshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du rgya gar yul nas li yul du mchis te//
342a6(mdo sde): nyon bgyir gyi ri rtsa shel chab 'og ma/ shel chab dang nye ba zhig tu spyil du bgyis te/ de na sgom zhing bzhugs pa las// nyin cig gcig 'phags pa de sha gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba gcig tu/
342a7(mdo sde): sbrul te/ ru zen gyi sku mkhar gyi slad rol shar phyogs logs na/ 'gus no zhes bgyi ba'i skad bu zhig mchis pa'i khar byung ba dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dang mas srog mkhar gyi steng nas mthong /
342b1(mdo sde): nas/ mda' gcig 'phangs pa dang / sha ba'i brlar 'og nas sha ba ni bros/ rgyal pos ni slad bzhin du bsnyegs pa dang / sha ba de 'phags pa dar ma nan da'i spyil bu'i nang du mchis nga rgyal po//
342b2(mdo sde): blad bzhin du mchis pas bltas na/ spyil bu'i nang na sha ba ni cang ma mchis/ dge slong gcig brla la mdos phog pa 'byin cing mchis pa mthong nas/ phu bo lags par na ngo ma 'tshal/ phu bo dge slong dar
342b3(mdo sde): ma nanadas byin gyis brlabs nas/ phu bo legs par gdong ngo tshar te/ rgyal pos btsun pa ci nongs zhes bgyis pa dang / khyod kyis bdag la mdas 'phangs te ci bya zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos
342b4(mdo sde): kyang sha ba ma lags par tshor nas/ bdag gis nongs na khri lan zhes bgyis pa dang / dge slong de'i mchis nas/ gcig tu nang khyod kyi phu bo yin// gnyis su nang 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyur/
342b5(mdo sde): pas rgyal po khyod kyis mtshar gyi sdig pa thob ste/ mtshams med pa dang 'dra ba'i las byas par gyur te/ bshags sbyangs nang bsod nams cher ma byas na mi rung ngo zhes bgyis 'dang / rgyal po de'ang 'gyod pa
342b6(mdo sde): skyes te ras tu mi dga' nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de'i zhabs la 'jus te bzod par gsol/ bshags spangs bgyis nas bdag gi sdig pa 'di ji ltar byang zhes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa dar ma
342b7(mdo sde): nan da'i zhal nas/ ra 'phral du gzhan byar med kyis/ yul 'dre tir zhes bya ba'i gzhongs pa 'i na/ sngon mongs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems pa'i spyan pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rgya ngo rje
343a1(mdo sde): 'od bgyid pa'i dus na/ bram zes mgo byas sa te/ rgyal po nyid kyis bgro bcad nus byam ze la stsal ba'i 'dzin las dka' ba rnam pa gaN+DIg mdzad pa'i sa di yin9/
343a2(mdo sde): sun bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rgyal po'i khab bya rgong phung po nas l-i yul byin gyis rlob cing // 'ge'u to shan du gshegs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang pos bskor banas/
343a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / rik+Sha ta ko sha zhes bya ba 'di byin gyis brlabs te 'dri na bzhugs bzhugs/ rings gi bar du'ang gzugs brnyan 'di na bzhugs/ rnam pa gsum dun 'dodaH/
343a4(mdo sde): long zhes bya ba'i tshul chung ba bi nA 'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi sku bcags nas/ phyis 'phags pa 'byung ba rnams kyi sgo sar byin gyis brlabs te// gnas 'di rnams srung bar lha 'dzin ri sha/
343a5(mdo sde): dang / lha mo a sho ga ka dang / klu'i rgyal po tag sha ka dang gsum gyis dam tshig blangs te/ ding sang gi bar du'ang gnas 'di srung zhing rgyal pos 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs na/ snga phyi'i sdig pa ming /
343a6(mdo sde): ba'i las ci bgyis pa 'byang ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma'ang dad pa skyes nas// slad chad gsod sbyin mi bgyid par dam bcas// rgyal po zla 'od kyis bram ze la mgo sbyin gtong du bgyis pa'i sar de
343a7(mdo sde): ma thag tu dog sa brtags pa'i phur bu btab nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dang ma nan da'i slad du 'dro tir gyi mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang chen po brtsigs/ sku mkhar gyi nang du'ang lce sgo'i sge'u chung
343b1(mdo sde): mchis pa'i nang logs na/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru na'i gnas kyi steng na/ ba ri tha zhes bkyi ba'i mchod rten gnyen po bzhugs pa'i drung na nang gi gtsug lag khang gcig dang / mchod rten chen po brtsig/
343b2(mdo sde): te/ mchod rten gyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sku gdung stsal/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi thog ma'i sku gdung ma zhig pa zhig spyan drangs te/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di'i nang na bzhun
343b3(mdo sde): 'gro tir gyi gtsug lag 'ang 'di'ang gnyan zhing byin che rab ste/ ding sang gi bar du'ang mngon rtags dang mtshan ma byung / li yul thog ma mas sho si ka'i sde'ang dge slong 'phags pa dar mnan dpes
343b4(mdo sde): byung nas/ 'u then na 'dro tir gtogs par gtsug lag khang brgyad dang / kam shing gtsug lag khang brgyad kyi dge 'dun yang ma hi shwa si ka'i sder gtogs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza las
343b5(mdo sde): dza la'i bu chen po rgyal bu 'don 'dros sang ting gi gtsug ldag khang rtsig par dogs 'jal te brtsams pA las/ lo byang rgyud rkyen gyis ma 'tshal nas/ rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyis bsams pa/ gzhan
343b6(mdo sde): nas ma 'phrogs pa/ ma brkus pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la ma 'bags la gtsang ma bdag nyid kyis rkang gis btsugs te btsal la/ gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ thog ma rgya grar yu' du
343b7(mdo sde): mchis te/ mkhan po 'phags pa sa man ta si di mkhan por spur drangs te phyogs thog thag tu'ang mchis nas/ nor gtsang ma btsal// de nas slar log nas rgya yul du mchis pa dang / rgya rje'i blon pa/
344a1(mdo sde): / gcig gyod la chags te dgum par bgyis pa las/ 'don 'dros kyis rgya rje la blon po 'di'i basbyin par bdag dgum par ci gnang zhes gsol ba las/ rgya rjes kyang gnang ste/
344a2(mdo sde): gshed mas rgyal bu la ral gris btab na bcad 'phro nas 'o ma byung ste/ ma gum nas rgya rje la sogs pas ngo mtshar mad du gyur te/ mchod pa bgyis/ yon yang mang po zhig phul/ blon po des kyang srog rin
344a3(mdo sde): gyi yon phal cher phul blangs nas/ slar li yul gyi 'dab nye ba zhig tu 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu mchis pa dang / rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyi nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya dang ma rgyal srid 'dzin cing mchis
344a4(mdo sde): pa las/ blon po kha cig gi mchis nas/ rgyal bu'i gcer rgyal bu 'don 'dros rgya rjes li yul gyi rgyal por bskos te/ rgyal po'i rgyal srid 'phrog tu 'ongs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po bo dz+ra
344a5(mdo sde): ya dar ma'ang phu bo 'don 'dros la mi dga' nas/ sku mkhar gyi nang du'ang ma btang / phrad du'ang ma btub nas/ sang tir gtsug lag 'ang brtsigs pa'i sa gzhir mchi zhig ces bsgo nas/ phu'o
344a6(mdo sde): rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyang sang ting du mchis te nu 'os kyang chu dang rlung shing la'ang dbang bskur te/ lo bdag gi rin gyis 'jal te yo byad sbyor zhing mchis pa las/ thog ma rgya gar yul du mngan po 'phags/
344a7(mdo sde): pas man tu si 'di dge ba'i bshes gshin gyi phyogs su bltas nas/ phyag 'tshal te mchod pa bgyis nas smon lam btab/ spyan drangs po dang / mkhan po'ang rgya gar yul nas nam mkha' las ldings /
344b1(mdo sde): li yul dus na 'angs gi drung dug shegs nas/ btsug lag 'ang ji kar brtsigs pa'i bshes gnyen yang bgyis/ rgyal po spun gnyis byang du ma spangs pa'i bkrugs partsi ba'i slang du/ ra skye
344b2(mdo sde): gsum gnam du gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya bub pas byang chub sems pa'i spyad ba spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi yan lag dang bu smad la sogs la sbyin gtong bgyi se shing 'dren las dka' ba
344b3(mdo sde): ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ no lo zhes bgyi ba dang / zlos chos li yul du mi bgyir mi rung zhes lha rnams la gsol nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams mu
344b4(mdo sde): sang tir bgyi bar gshegs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'phrin las dka' ba ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ lha rnams zlos chos bgyis pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dz+wa la dar mas blon po dang 'bangs
344b5(mdo sde): rnams la gcig kyang der mchir mi gnang ngo zhes bgyis pa las/ lha'i rol mo bzang po snga na ma byung ba de thos nas mig gcig gis gcig spun te ma bzod nas der mchis/ slad kyis rgyal po'i
344b6(mdo sde): 'khor kun gar mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa dang / blon po dag gis rgyus kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang / rgyal po bi dzi ma dar ma'ang ma bzod de/ sang tid gyi gtsug lag khang gi 'dab tu mchis pa dang / khu'o//
344b7(mdo sde): rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyis bsus nas/ spun der mjal ba dang / nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya dang mas phu bo la phyag 'gyis nas/ pus mo btsugs/ thal mo sbyar te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod kyi mthu
345a1(mdo sde): stobs ma rig nas// nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur nas/ bdag gis rab tu rmongs te bzod pa gsol zhing mchis na/ bdag la dngos sdig tu mi 'gyur bar bzod pa bzhes
345a2(mdo sde): par ci gnang zhes bgyis pa dang / phu bos kyang bzod pa blangs pa dang / de slar nu bo la bzod pa gsol nas/ lag spel te gtsug lag khang du mchis nas mchod pa bgyis/ lha klus no le bgyis padang /
345a3(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang rtsigs pa las rjes su yi rang nas yon phul// gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i ngan grogs bgyis te/ rkyen ris bkum ste phul// thog ma sngan mjal te bzod pa gsol ba'i sar 'adz+ra/
345a4(mdo sde): mo ka ka rong zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs nas// thog ma li yul du sarba sti pad kyi sde theg pa chung ngu pa'ang / mkhan po 'phags pas mnad so 'di las byung / btsug lag khang gi srungs
345a5(mdo sde): ma'ang lha ka byi la zhes bgyi bas zhal gyis bzhes te bsrung / ding sang gi bar du lo cig gcig yang / rtag tu ston zla ra ba tshes bdun dang brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pas 'phrin las dka'
345a6(mdo sde): nga mdzad pa'i zlos chos mo le bgyid de/ yul mi ril gyis chos nyan cing der mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gzhan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ de'i 'og tu rgyal po bo dza la dang ma'i bu rgyal po bi dza la sing
345a7(mdo sde): has rgyal po 'byir ba'i tshe/ ga 'dag gi rgyal pos li yul du dbag mang po drangs te/ rgyal gri ma jamal bab dang 'thabs pa las/ ga 'dzag gi mga'apham ste/ ka 'ja rgyal po 'angam rjes gags pas
345b1(mdo sde): rin nas dgums par bgyis pa las/ thar par gsol nas rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha'i mchid nas/ rgyal po khyod bdag gis mi dgum par thar par gtang gis/ nam khyod 'gra choms pa'i dus na/ bdagag
345b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing / slar spyon cig ces bgyis nas thar par stsal te/ ming yang a nand sen rabatags te/ slar shu lig tu btAng / de nas dge slong a nan da sen dang / slad kyis dgra
345b3(mdo sde): choms nas thog ma li rje dang dam bcas po bzhin/ nam mkha' la ldings te li yul du gshegs nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dgyi ba'i slad du/ l-i rje yang dad pa skyes nas
345b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgra bcom pa a nan das na'i slad du/ som ti'i gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brtsigs te gtsug lag gi srungs ma ni rnam thos kyi sras dang / lha ka byi bzhugs te/ gtsug lag 'ang
345b5(mdo sde): 'di'ang mnyan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra tis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa/ kam shing du chos spel ba'i dgra bcom pa s+ya pr-i zhes bgyi bas dge ba'i bshes
345b6(mdo sde): gnyen bgyis nas/ dad pa skyes pa'i slad du bru nyo'i gtsug lag 'ang brtsigs te/ thog ma ka ne ska'i rgyal po dang / bu zan gyi rgyal po dang / li rje'i rgyal po bi dza ya kir ti la sogs pas rgya gar yul du dmag
345b7(mdo sde): drangs nas/ se ked ces bgyi ba'i grong khyer phab pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dza ya kir tis sha ri ram mang mo zhig rnyed pa'ang bru nye'i mchod rten de'i nang du stsal ma thog ma dog sa rtog pa'i phur bu 'debs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po/
346a1(mdo sde): bi dza la king ti dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa rgya gro'i zhal nas/ phur bu 'di la rgyal pos lag pasams yar lan lnga byabs na/ mngon rtags 'byung ngo zhes bgyis pa/
346a2(mdo sde): dang / rgyal pos kyang dogs brtags pa'i shug pa'i phur bu la lag pas lan lnga byangs pa dang / phur bu de la shug pa'i yal ga khru gang pa lnga de ma thag tu da'i nyin par skyes nas/ slad kyis shug pa de'i
346a3(mdo sde): drung du ban+da dag gis dang ma 'aklags pa dang / shug pa de las chos bshad pa'i sgra dag byung nas/ slad kyis ban+de gzhon nu dag dar ma thogs te/ chos nyan du mchis na'ang / de bzhin du chos 'chad pa'i/
346a4(mdo sde): sgra dag byung ba las/ slad kyis ban+de gcig gis dar ma log par bklags nas/ 'di ltar ma yin no zhes lhas bsgo ba dang mnyan nas/ de tshun chad chos bshad pa'i sgra'ang ma byung / slad kyis gtsug lag
346a5(mdo sde): khang 'di'i che ba dka' chab kyis 'tshal te/ rab ma phyin nas/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nye ba las/ dge slong btsun pa sum pon zhes bgyi 'a dgra choms su nyehe ba zhig gis gtsug lag khang de mi zhig par bgyi ra
346a6(mdo sde): slad du/ dgra bcom par 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des klur skye bar smon lam btab nas/ de ma thag tu lus las chab phyung nas/ mi'i lus ma 'phos par shes chu chung ngu'i klur gyur te/ dog sa'i 'og tu nus
346a7(mdo sde): nas/ ding sang gi bar du gtsug lag khang de'i chab/ shel chab chung ngu las drangs// gtsug lag khang 'di'ang ding sang gi bar du ma zhig ste/ gzhan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ srungs ma'ang lha su dza la dang / phyag brnyan sing /
346b1(mdo sde): hA mu ka dang / shel chab chung ngu'i klu sum bon gyis srung / de'i tshe de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza la kir ti'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza'ang sang gra ma zhes bgyi ba dpa' zhing rtsal che ba zhig byung nas/
346b2(mdo sde): phyi dgra mang po zhig la bsngos nas/ sems can phul cher bkum/ de'i 'og tu seng ge mi la rgol ba zhig byung ste/ dmag gis btab na'ang ma khums te/ rgyal po gcig pus seng ge la nga rgal te
346b3(mdo sde): zin nas bkum/ de nas rgyal po de'i ming yang seng ger btags/ rgyal po de'ang ri dgas gshor du mchis pa las/ shel chab chung ngu'i 'gram tshal zhig tu dgongs btab pa las/ de'i nub mo tshal
346b4(mdo sde): de'i nang na zhugs mar 'dra ba zhig rgyang nas gda' nas/ smad de nang par bltas na/ dge slong 'phags pa dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya sha de na bzhugs pa las/ 'od byung ba mthong nas dad pa skyes te bachod
346b5(mdo sde): pa bgyis nas/ 'phags pa 'di na ci mdzad ces zhus pa dang / dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya sha'i zhal nas/ sa 'di'ang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa lags te/ rgyal pos
346b6(mdo sde): 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa'i rigs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang 'phags pa de la dad pa skyes pa'i slad du/ bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan nas sdig pa bshags/ gtsug
346b7(mdo sde): lag khang gi dogs brtag pa'i phur bu btab nas/ gser gyi gzhong pa gcig spyi bo la bzung ste/ da bdag gis brtsigs pa'i gtsug lag khang 'di yun du tshugs shing brtan par 'gyur na/ phyogs
347a1(mdo sde): bcu na bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlab cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bdag gi gzhod pa 'di'i nang du sprul bar ci gnang zhes smon/
347a2(mdo sde): lam btab pa dang / nam mkha' las sha ri ram mang po tsam zhig gzhong pa'i nang du gshegs nas/ rgyal po sngar bas lhag par dad pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ya sha'i slad du/ dar/
347a3(mdo sde): ma tir gyi gtsug lag khang mchod rten chen po brtsigs te/ nang du sha ri ram mang po tsam zhig stsal bas/ btsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyen zhing byin che bas/ srungs ma rnam thos kyi sras po dang / lhaka
347a4(mdo sde): byi las srung / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya da mas rgyal srid bzung ba man chad/ bi dza ya kir tis rgyal po bgyis pa yan chad/ rgyal po rabs bcu bzhi'i bar du ris 'ga' ni yul du phyi dgra gzhan gyis
347a5(mdo sde): dmag drangs te gtses/ res 'ga' ni li rje dag gis yul gzhan du dmag drangs nas 'bangs kyi tshogs su gyur/ de'i 'og tu dru gu a mno shod kyis li yul du dmag drangs nas 'ge'u to shan man
347a6(mdo sde): tshad kyi gtsug lag khang phal cher mes bsregs te yul dmas// 'bangs 'gribs nas gtsug lag khang gsar pa rtsig pa'i rngo ma thogs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza la kir ti'i bu/ rgyal po 'i/
347a7(mdo sde): dza ya sang tha ma zhes bgyi bas dgung lo bdun lo bdun lon pa zhig rgyal por zhugs nas/ slad kyis mi mthar son pa dang / yul 'di sus bshig/ ci'i skad du dpas zhes dge 'dun rgan rabs dang / sngon po da//
347b1(mdo sde): la rmas pa las/ dge 'dun dang blon po rnams kyang / dru gu a mno shod la sogs pas sngon yul ji ltar bshig pa'i lo rgyus zhib tu bshad pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra mas blon po dag la
347b2(mdo sde): dmag tshogs ci mchis pa sdus shig ces bsgo nas/ sngon gtses shing yul bshig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi yul du dmag drangs te lan blan nas yul ba shig/ sems can phal cher bkum/ de
347b3(mdo sde): nas slar log nas/ shel chab 'og ma'i 'gram du mchis pa dang / dge slong bdun zhig chab kyi nang du khrus bgyid cing rtsed mo sna tshogs bgyid par mthong nas/ dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa byed ces byas pa
347b4(mdo sde): ba dang / dge slong de bdun yang de ma thag tu nam mkha' las ldings nas/ rgyal po de la rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bcu drug bstan pa dang / rgyal po de'i yid la bdag gis sngar yang sems can mang po zhig srog
347b5(mdo sde): bcad de bkum/ da'ang 'phags pa de rnams la ngan sems bskyed pa rab tu nyes so snyam pa'i 'gyod pa cher skyes/ 'phags pa de dag gis rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas/ dad pa'ang
347b6(mdo sde): cher skyes te/ 'phags pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa'i drung du bsnyen nas/ mchod pa dang bshags sbyangs bgyis/ bzod pa gsol nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa po nyan re sta la sogs pa 'phags pa bdun gyi phyir
347b7(mdo sde): 'gu zhan gyi gtsug lag 'ang brtsigs te/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bdun gyis kyang dog sa de byin gyis brlabs nas/ zhi ba'i sa dgu zhan te zhes bgyi bar gtsug lag khang gi mtshan yang btags te/ gtsug lag 'ang 'di'ang
348a1(mdo sde): gnyen zhing byin ched ba ste/ lha 'dzin ri shi ba dang nor bu bzang po gnyis kyis srung // de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po badza la sang gra ma'i ru/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhes/
348a2(mdo sde): bas/ rgyal por zhugs nas dge ba'i bshes banyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang ma ba la/ 'phags pa khyod rdzu 'phrul ci mnga' ba bdag la bstan par ci gnang zhes gsol pas/ 'phags pa/
348a3(mdo sde): des rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po bi dza la sing ha dga' ldan du khrid de/ 'phags pa byams pa bzhugs pa'i gnas dang / zhal bstan nas slar mchis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza la sing ha sa gzhi'i ser ma'i/
348a4(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ dga' ldan byams pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa ji ltar bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs bgyis/ slad kyis byams pa la mchod pa'i slad du/ mgon po dang / lha klu gshegs pa
348a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshul ci 'dra ba mgon po'i rten khang gcig brtsigs nas/ mgon po dang lha klu'i gzugs bgyis pad dung bzhugs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyam zhing byin che bar bgyi/ lha gangs can dang/
348a6(mdo sde): 'brog gnas zhes bgyi bas srung / di sang gi bar du mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung / de nas de'i 'og tu'ang rgyal po bai dza ya ba la man chad rgyal po rabs drug gi bar du gtsug lag 'ang
348a7(mdo sde): gzhan ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya ba la zhes bya ba'i ru/ rgyal po bi dza ye sa gra ma zhes bgyi ba rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe/ nu gu ban nas tshe'u ba na'i sku gzugs nam mkha' las
348b1(mdo sde): ldings te/ li yul du gshegs pa rgyal pos mthong nas dad pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas de bzhugs pa'i dri gtsang khang brtsigs/ de nas slad kyis rgyal po de'u then gyi sku mkhar gyi steng gi byang sgo'i 'ang /
348b2(mdo sde): na mchis pa zhig gi tshe ra/ bltas na sku mkhar gyi slad rol na dge slong gcig khyim pa skye bo la phyag 'tshal te/ bka' mchid mching mthong nas ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ rgyal po des blon po gcig mags
348b3(mdo sde): nas/ zhib tu rtog tu ba'ang ba las/ blon po des dge slong dang skya'o so sor rmas na// dge slong de'i mchid nas khyim pa skya bo 'di ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa lags zhes mchi/ khyim pa
348b4(mdo sde): skya bo de'i mchis nas dge slong 'di 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i sprul pa lags zhes mchi ba dang / blon po des kyang rgyal po la de bzhin du slar gsol ba dang / rgyal po bi dza las tha ma'ang de mthag/
348b5(mdo sde): par 'phags pa de dag gi drung du bsnyen nas phyag 'tshal// mchod pa bgyis mas/ 'phags pa dag ga las gshegs zhes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa gnyis kyi zhal nas/ bdag drag gnyis kyang shar phyogs
348b6(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sems can gyi don la 'dir 'ongs so zhes byung ba dang / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang tha ma'i mchid nas 'phags pa thugs rje/
348b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dag la bsten par ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang / de bzhin du gnang nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi
349a1(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa'i zhal dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang bstan pa dang / rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong / nam mkha' las shing rta'i/
349a2(mdo sde): nang nas sangs rgyas mang po zhig gshegs nas/ de dag gis 'od zer btang ba rgyal po'i spyi bor reg par mthong ste/ dad pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du//
349a3(mdo sde): gzugs su'ang bgyis te/ shing rta'i nang du byang sang du'ang drangs nas/ mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ ding sang gi bar du'ang dbyar zla ra ba yar gyi ngo la byad srang du sku gzugs chen po 'dren pa dang /
349a4(mdo sde): 'dum sde gnyis rdzun drangasanas byang rung 'byung gnas blagra shes bsil ba'i tshul du mchod te gsol zhing / mi tshor ra marjod pa chen po kyis 'ang rgyal bangs kyis nas dge ba'i 'a /
349a5(mdo sde): gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa mo dgu 'de shi oM ba la rdang gi slad du/ bzha' sang gre ro ma'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ rnam thos kyi sras dang / yang dag shes bgyi bas yang bsrung / de nas rgyal po ji
349a6(mdo sde): dza lA sha s+tha man chad/ rgyal po rabs bzhi'i bar du gtsug lag khang gsar pa gzhan mang brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya kir ti zhes bgyi ba/ 'gum ting du mchis pa las da ltar b+ha
349a7(mdo sde): ba'i gtsug lag khang bzhugs pa'i sar mchis pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zhig der byung nas/ rgyal po bi dza la kir ti la smras pa/ sdom sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi tshe/ dogs 'di byoran gyis brlabs nas/ tsun
349b1(mdo sde): lag khang brtsigs pa'i sa 'di yin te/ da'ang rgyal po khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gcig brtsig pa'i rigs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po smon lam btab pa da ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'phags
349b2(mdo sde): padag gis byin gyis brlabs te 'dir gshegs par gnang na/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang gcig brtsig par 'tshal lo zhes smon lam btab pa dang / de ma thag tu nam mkha' las 'phags pa
349b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa bcu bdun gshegs nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya kir ti'ang dad pa'i shugs chen por skyes te/ rgyal po dang btsun mo lag dar te/ b+ha ba nya'i sgom sa dang / gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/
349b4(mdo sde): gtsug lag khapa 'di'ang byin che zhing gzhan par bgyi/ lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / nor bu bzang pos bsrung / gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gna' bod kyi mnga' ris su gtogs pa'i tshe/ mgar blon
349b5(mdo sde): btsan gnyen gung rton li yul gyi dbang po bgyid pa'i tshe brtsigs lags/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang gram dang / bu rgyal po bi dza ya gra ma spang rgya yul du mchis nas/ slar li yul du/
349b6(mdo sde): mchi ba'i bar du/ dru gu'i dmag gis shul khungs pa las/ pa ni rgya yul du gum// bu chung ste slar mchis pa'i rngo ma thogs pa'i skabs su li blon po a ma tsa'i meg ces bgyi bas dgung lo bcu gnyis
349b7(mdo sde): kyi bar du rgyal tshab bgyis nas/ rgyal srid bzung ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dge slong 'phags pa ba ru na tsa zhes bgyi ba'i slad du/ a ma na 'di'i mchod rten dang gtsug lag lang brtsigs te/ de bzhin gshegs
350a1(mdo sde): pa wA gdu pa dum ma du sprul te/ du lar gsu lag yang 'di snyanam du 'di smra dang / nod spyad ni sbeng byod yang drug shes bsgri bas srung // de nas rgyal pong thA/
350a2(mdo sde): sang gra ma'i bu rgyal po bo dza ya'i gra ma zhis bgyi bas slar li yul ma chos nas/ dge ba'i bshegs gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bde ngan 'dra tshong gi skad du/ gtsug lag 'ang byi
350a3(mdo sde): zha gre rma brtsigs te/ da ltar lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / nor bu bzang pos bsrung // de nas de'i 'og tu rgya'i blon pos ser the shi dang / rgyal po bi dza yad ra ma gnyis kyis dge bo'i bshes gnyen
350a4(mdo sde): 'gum tir gyi bar mog 'dzin zhes bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'ong mkhar gyi byams pa me tra'i gtsug lag 'ang brtsigs te/ da ltar gtsug lag 'ang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyis srung // de nas de'i 'og tu rgyar
350a5(mdo sde): blon po ka the shi dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sam d+ha ba zhes dkyi ba gnyis kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen u den 'dra rong ci dang / dar mnan da gnyis kyi slad du// le kun tse'i gtsug lag lang brtsigs te ltar
350a6(mdo sde): gtsug lag 'ang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyis srung / 'og ma dge slong 'phags pa de ro tsan tsamra'i tshul du gshegs la phyugs rdzi la sogs pa mi 'og ma dag gis mthong nas/ rgyal po ba dza yas mtha ba la/
350a7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis snga na ma mthong ba'i mi 'di lta bu zhig tsad+ha'i tshal na mchis so zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sa ma b+ha ba'ang de ma thag tu tsarmar mchis nas// 'phags pa bai ro tsa na mthong ba dang / dad pa/
350b1(mdo sde): skyes nas phyag 'tshal mchod pa bgyis nas/ 'phags pa des kyang rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nas legs nyes gnyis kyi 'bras bu ston te/ chos bshad/ #/
350b2(mdo sde): sbyangs bgyid du stsal ba dang / rgyal po de'ang chos kyi mig bye nas/ lhag par yang dad pa skyes nas/ rgyal po slar sku mkhar du mchis nas/ thog ma 'phags pa bai ro tsa na gshegs so zhes bka' mchid bsnyed/
350b3(mdo sde): ba thos pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig brtsigags te ming yangasu stong par btags/ slad kyis mchod rten de'ang yun rings pas zhig nas/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po'i dza'ang bo han chen po dang / rgya yul
350b4(mdo sde): nas mchis pa'i dge slong 'ba' la shi zhes bgyi ba mchis pas/ tsarma'i dge 'dun dge ba'i bshes gnyen du spun drangs nas/ su sto nya'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos kyi sras kyis bsrung /
350b5(mdo sde): dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang rnams kyi gtan tshigs dang / snga phyi'i go rims la/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhes bgyi ba zhig chung ngu nas rgyal por zhugs te/ chung ba'i skabs su blon po kha cig gis rngan
350b6(mdo sde): chan bgyis te/ rgyal mo dang / mchis brang sras dang / nang kor ma rnams dag dang mi rigs pa bgyis nas/ slad kyis rgyal po de chen por gyur te/ sngar blon po de dag gis rngan char bgyis shing brnyas pa de dran nas
350b7(mdo sde): khor par gyur te/ srad kyis rgyal po des blon po rnams ri dgas gshong ba ltar thabs kyis bring nas/ 'u then gyi shel chab gong ma'i yul ba rol bya zhes bgyi bar blon po bdun cu rtsa lnga 'akum nas/ slad kyis
351a1(mdo sde): der gtsug lag khang gcig kyang brtsigs/ de nas sku mkhar du mchis nas/ rgyal po mchis pa'i gnas na/ rgyal mo dang / sras dang / nang kor ma mchis pa'i khang pa byi sgo
351a2(mdo sde): bkum nas 'grul bcad/ de bzhin du dgum par bgyis pa las/ rgyas po de'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas 'phongs te/ nyam thag nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nas brjod/ mchod/
351a3(mdo sde): pa bgyid de/ lha khang bskor/ dar ma bklags/ bsod nams cher bgyis pa'i mjus rgya gar yul nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom ma ya sha prad nya dang / s+tha shu ta dang / song ha na ta la sogs nam mkha' las
351a4(mdo sde): ldings te/ rgyal mo mog sha ko sha dang / sa lu rtsa la sogs pa 'khor mchis pa'i drung du gshegs nas/ rgyal mo de dag la chos bshad de rab tu byung ba las/ dad pa'i shugs kyis de ma thag tu rgyal mo de dag gi
351a5(mdo sde): 'khor las brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dgra choms par gyur nas/ nam mkha' las ldings te/ bsod snyoms len du gshegs nas rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha sa mthong nas/ de mthag tu gnas der mchis te bltas na/ rgyal mo
351a6(mdo sde): mog sha dang das lu tsa la sogs pa'i 'khor rol rab tu byung ste/ phal chem dgra choms par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas/ rgyal po'ang rab tu dga' nas/ dad pa'i shugs kyis gnas de nyir
351a7(mdo sde): du gtsug lag khang brtsigs te dran zhing dang / nor phyugs la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad mang po sa ma zhig phul nas/ gtsug 'gakhang de'i ming yang du bo ba zhes btags te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gtan zhing
351b1(mdo sde): byir che bar bgyi/ da ltar lha bur ba'i lag pa zhes bgyi bas bsrung / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po don 'dros kyi btsun mo t+ya rje'i sras mo sho r+ya zhes bgyi ba'i bu mo/ dge slong ma sho'i dza ya zhes bgyi bas dgra roms
351b2(mdo sde): ras/ ru mo sho r+ya'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgya yul nasa'u then du mchi ba'i phyir/ nu mo rgyal mo sho'i rus yo ze dze'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar klu'i rgyal po da tsi dang / da ra ci gnyis kyis bsrung /
351b3(mdo sde): de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza la sha sta'i nu ngo a ma tsa za re'i mchis drang bu su hA tsho hA zhes bgyi ba khyim thab grub pa dang / bud med de la rgyal po'i mchid nas/ bdag dang po brang du pi rung ngo zhes bgyi ba dang / bud med
351b4(mdo sde): de'i mchid nas/ bdag dgung bdun zhig khyim thab kyi mdun bgyid cing / slad rol du mi mchi bar ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang nas de ma thag tu bud med de'ang gsang ste rab tu byung nas/ dgung
351b5(mdo sde): bdun gyi bar du sems rtse gcig sangs rgyas rjes su dran ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal yang mngon sum du mthong nas/ dgra choms te ming yang bu tar btags/ de nas dpung bdun lags pa dang //
351b6(mdo sde): rgyal pos bud med de 'gugs pa zhig btang ba de'i mching nas mo rab tu byung ste/ 'phags ma dgra choms mar gyur nas/ da ltar 'on kyang 'byung zhing mchis so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po der mchis na 'phags ma de la
351b7(mdo sde): 'od kyang 'byung / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa'ang mthong nas/ dad pa skyes nas 'phags mthur nan da'i slad du ze ro ngo'i gtsun la gakhang brtsigs te/ gnyan zhing kyi mcher bgyi// da ltang lha dga' ba'i dbang grub ces byabs
352a1(mdo sde): / bsrung // de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya nan da zhes bgyi ba rtse gnan gyi rgyal po hu mang bya ba'i mchis brang dang mjal ba'i bu mo cig gcig mchis pa rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom par/
352a2(mdo sde): gyur pas bltas na/ bdag ma mi li dze bi ya ma ta'i bu mo lags par thugs su chung nas/ 'phags mdang ma 'bal la de dang / dge slong ma 'phags ma nyi shu shu lig nas nam mkha' la ldings te/ li yul du gshegs nas
352a3(mdo sde): rgyal po yab la thog ma'i lo rdug kyang bshad/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bstan pas/ rgyal po ban pa skyes nas bu mo 'phags ma dgra choms ma dang ma 'ba' la'i slang du/ bo len do'i gtsug lag
352a4(mdo sde): brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos kyi sras dang / klu'i rgyal po hu lor bgyi bas bsrung / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang gram se ge zhes bgyi ba'i ma/ rgyal mo dar ma zhes bgyi ba rab tu byung nas// dgra bcom pa'i/
352a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu thob nas/ skyil bu'i nang du sgom zhing mchis pa las/ nub mo 'od byung ste// rgyal pos mtshan ma gzugs pa'i phyir/ mdang gcig 'phangs pa nang par mda' tshol du btang ba'i sa de na rgyal mo dar mden bzhugs/
352a6(mdo sde): pa mthong nas/ rgyal po 'ang dad pa skyes te/ ma 'phags ma dgra bcom pa dang ma zhes bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal pos 'phro mo 'dza' zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltang lnga ser skyas bsrung / de nas rgya
352a7(mdo sde): bo'i dza la sang tha ma'i nu bo nr-i s+ya sku la ga ces bgyi bzhig gis rgyal mo drug gu mo zhig rab tu byung nas ming yang a nu ka su ma zhes bgyi bar btags te/ dpra coms pa'i slad du dad pa skyes nas/ trag 'jo zhes kyi/
352b1(mdo sde): ba'i gtsug lag 'ang brtsigs te/ da ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis bsrung // de nas gtsug lag khang 'bru zhan brtsigs pa'i rgyal po badz+ra la sang tha ba'i mchis drang / rgyal po khrom ko sar gyi bu/
352b2(mdo sde): mo'u rong ka zhes bgyi ba'i bu mo gnyis rab tu byung nas dgra tshoms te/ 'phags ma de gcig gi mtshan ni shi lam te zhes bgyi/ gcig gi mtshan ni go'u sha ra zhes bgyi ste/ 'phags ma de gnyis kha ne'i
352b3(mdo sde): yul nas nam mkha' la ldings te/ nu mo rgyal mo'u rong ka'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ 'phags ma de gnyis kyi slad du rgyal pos spro bon 'dze'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar klu'i rgyal po hu lor bgyi ba dang /
352b4(mdo sde): gser gyi skra zhes bgyi ba gnyis kyis bsrung / de nas rgyal po bi dza la ki ra ti'i bu mo bi zha dza yas/ bu mo 'phags pa dgra bcom ma byi ta she tsa'i slad du/ po long 'jo'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/
352b5(mdo sde): da ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis bsrung / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya'i bu mo gu zan gyi rgyal po'i mchis drang dkying pa/ byi zha pra ba zhes bgyi bas phu mo dge slong ma 'phags ma dgra bcom pa'i
352b6(mdo sde): zha dza ya'i slad du/ er mo no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha ser skyas bsrung / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bal zhes bgyi bas/ sngar slad du sems can bang po zhig bkum nas 'gyod pa skyes te//
352b7(mdo sde): bsod nams pal cher bgyis/ mchis thang yang thar bar btang / 'phags ma dgra bcom mar gyur pa'i slad du dang pa skyes nas rdo rngo na na 'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos kyi sras
353a1(mdo sde): kyis bsrung / de nas li rje'i blon po a ma tsa le meg ces bgyi ba phu bo spun gsum gdugs gcig tu bkum nas/ ma'ang thar par zhugs nas/ de nyid du a ma tsa kha mas/
353a2(mdo sde): gi gus sde re ma'i gtsub lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha nam mkha'i spyan dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dngon yang dag shes kyis bsrung / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya dza ma zhes bgyi bas oM sku'i rgyal po'i bu
353a3(mdo sde): mo mchis brang du blangs te/ rgyal mo des dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma dgra bcom ma gzhi ma'i slad du/ oM sko no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha che ma zhes bgyi bas bsrung / de nas
353a4(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dza ya grams kus byi od nyong nag gi gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ nang kor ma mang zhig thar par bkye nas/ da ltar rgyal po kun srung ma lha mo gser gyi me tog dang / lha mo dung can
353a5(mdo sde): gnyis kyis bsrung / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya ba las cu gum phan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo shu to ka zhes bgyi ba mchis brang du blangs pa'i bu mo dge slong ma dgra bcom ma a sho ka shi la'i slad du/ tse'u/
353a6(mdo sde): no'u gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha a pa la dang / lha 'jam pa ki'u ta zhes bgyi ba gnyis kyis bsrung / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha'i mchis brang ka 'dzag gi rgyal mo a lcong 'ja'/
353a7(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba'i bshes gnyen du shu'i gnas/ dge slong ma 'phags ma dgra bcom ma bdur gshegs pa'i slad du/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing has khye'u sho no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha
353b1(mdo sde): ser skyas bsrung / rgyal po di dza ya sang tha ma rgyal mo dgyid pa'i tshe kha che'i yul nas/ dge slong ma 'phags pa dgra bcom ma shil ta dang / 'gi'u shur+ya zhes dgyi nga gnyis nam mkha' las
353b2(mdo sde): ldings te gshegs nas/ srad kyis khyim bdag na mo bdod gyi ba'i khyim drung du zhugs nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po dogs 'di ni sngon sangs rgyas shAkya thung
353b3(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sra shing zhes dgyi bar gyur pa na/ bram ze la du ming sring gnyis yon du phul te/ 'phrin las dka' ba rnam pa gcig
353b4(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i sa 'di lags pas/ 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa'i rigs so zhes bgyis pa dang / khyim bdag na mo bode ces bgyi ba de'ang dad pa skyes nas khang khyim dang se de'ang yul
353b5(mdo sde): du phul nas/ rgyal pos kyang gtsug lag khang gcig gartsigs/ yon bdag las kyang ming dras nas/ gtsug lag 'ang gi mtshan yang na mod 'bu 'dod zhes bya bar btags da ltar
353b6(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po hu lor dang / lha gser gyi skra zhes bgyi bas bsrung / de nas li rje'i blon po 'da' no zhes bgyi ba zhig gis tshong dus bar mar sku gzugs chen po bgyis pa las/ slad kyis yang
353b7(mdo sde): li blon po a ma tsi bya nad kyis/ sku gzugs chen po'i lha zhig ral du gyur pa'ang gsos/ kong sheng gi dge slong ma'i slad du 'da' no yo no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos
354a1(mdo sde): kyi sras kyis bsrung / 'u then na dge 'dun sde gnyis bzhugs pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por brtsi ba/ sku mkhar gyi nang slad rol na drug cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs// gtsug
354a2(mdo sde): lag khang 'bying du bgyi ba ni/ dgu bcu rtsa lnga lags/ gtsug ljang chung ngur bgyi ba ni / brgya bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bzhugs/ sgo sgo'i mchod pa'i lha khang chung ngu dang / yon bdag ma mchis pa'i lha khang
354a3(mdo sde): dang / mchod rten ni sku mthar gyi nang dang / skad rol gyi tshar yan chad na/ sum stong drug brgya brgyad du rtsa brgyad bzhugs/ 'u then na dge 'dun sgos 'tsho yan chad/ byi ba lo la brtsis rga khri tsam
354a4(mdo sde): zhig zhugs/ mdo 'o dang / mes kar phyogs na gtsug lag khang chen po ni bzhi zhig bzhugs/ sgo sgo'i lha khang dang / yon bdag ma mchis pa'i lha khang chung ngu ni brgya lhag tsam bzhugs/ dge 'dun nyi shu
354a5(mdo sde): tsam zhig bzhugs/ kAm sheng dang / pha ba dang / be rga 'drangang / oM sku yan chad/ ci la man chadasku mkhar gyi nang dang / srad rol gyi tshar yan chad na gtsug lag khang chen po ri nyi shu rtsa gsum bzhugs/
354a6(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang 'bring nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang chung ngu ni nyi shu rtsa gsum tsam bzhugs/ sgo sgo mchod pa'i lha 'ang chung ngu dang / mchod rten chung ngu spyir brgyad sum cu rtswa dgu bzhugs
354a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun sde gnyis las rkyen pa dang / skos 'tsho yan chad spyir bzhi brgya sum cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs kyis kyang man chad/ ko sheng dang / dur+ya yan chad/ sku mkhar gyi ma dang / slad rol gyi tshar yan
354b1(mdo sde): rmang na/ gtsug lug 'ang chen po bco lnga tsam bzhugs/ sgo sko'i lha 'ang chung ngu dang / yon bdag ma mchis pa'i lha 'ang rlung ngu dang / mchod rten yang chad bzhugs/ dge 'dun sde gnyis la rkyen
354b2(mdo sde): pas/ skos 'tsho yan chad spyir dgu brgya drug cu rtsa gsub bzhugs/ rgyal nos nu'i tsha ngo rgyal po bi dza la sang b+ha ba zhes bgyi ba'i tshe/ thog ma li yul du chos byung steng rtsis nas/ khyi 'o'o shol
354b3(mdo sde): bor ba'i ston zla tha chung yan chad/ dkrung lo stong nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug tsam pa lags// rgya kar skad du/ ar+ya na nang mi tra ad d+hAr
354b4(mdo sde): Nam nA ma/ dod skad du/ 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshul lo// 'di skad bdag cag gis
354b5(mdo sde): thos te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo ngargyang brgya lon par gyur pa na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yul shi ba ga zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po rigs
354b6(mdo sde): ba'i sde zhes bya'i gnas so// de'i tshe rgyal po rigs pa'i sde'i yul na dge slong dga' ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/
354b7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu re ba/ dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma pa sems can rnams las tha na grog ma dang / ku ta yi yang sems can spyod pa shes pa zhig gnas te/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
355a1(mdo sde): byu bya/ dus kyi tshe/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa bshad de/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas dris pa/ gnas brtan yun/
355a2(mdo sde): ji snyed cig gi bar du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur/ des smras pa/ gzhin bzang dag dogos pa med kyis mya ngan dang smre sngags ma 'don cig/ ci'i phyir zhe
355a3(mdo sde): nabacom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnas brtan chen po bcu drug gi lag tu dam pa'i chos gtad par gyur te/ sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po'i sbyin pa yongs su dag par
355a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la/ dge slong dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brta no de dag gi mtshan yang
355a5(mdo sde): mi 'tshal lo// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas brtan dang po'i mtshan ni ba ra dwa tsA bsod snyoms len zhes bya'o// gnas brtan gnyis pa'i mtshan ni gser bu zhes bya'o//
355a6(mdo sde): gnas brtan gsum pa'i mtshan ni ba ra dA tsa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bzhi pa'i mtshan ni mi byed pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan lnga pa'i mtshan ni shing shun can zhes bya'o// gnas brtan
355a7(mdo sde): drug pa'i mtshan ni bzang po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bdun pa'i mtshan ni nag po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan brgyad pa'i mtshan ni 'ad sa'i bu zhes bya'o// gnas brtan dgu pa'i mtshan ni ba lang
355b1(mdo sde): skyong zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu pa'i mtshan ni lam pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gcig pa'i mtshan ni sgra ga can 'dzin ces bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gnyis pa'i mtshan ni klu'i sde
355b2(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gsum pa'i mtshan ni zur gyis shes zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan ni nags na gnas pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bco lnga pa'i mtshan
355b3(mdo sde): ni ma 'am pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu drug pa'i mtshan ni gtsug gi lam zhes bya'o// gnas brtan de dag ni rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ sde snod gsum pa/ khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang
355b4(mdo sde): bral ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe byin gyis brlabs te bsrungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnas pa yin no// sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// de skad
355b5(mdo sde): ces smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis/ gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan bdag drug gis gang na bzhugs pa'ang mi 'tshal lo// gnas brtan gyis
355b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan dang po ba ra dA tsa bsod snyoms len zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu bslang spyod kyi gling na gnas so// gnas brtan gser bu zhes
355b7(mdo sde): bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga stong dang lhan cig byang phyogs kyi kha che'i yul na gnas so// gnas brtan pa ra dA tsa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor 'gra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig
356a1(mdo sde): shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na gnas so// gnas brtan mi phyed pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa bdun stong dang lhan cig 'dzam bu'i gling na
356a2(mdo sde): gnas so// gnas brtan shing shun zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na gnas so// gnas brtan bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor
356a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa dgu stong dang lhan cig zangs gleng na gnas so// gnas brtan dag po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig sing ga'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtam pa/
356a4(mdo sde): sa'i bu zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa khri chig stong dang lhan cig pa ni sa'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan pa lang skyong zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa brgyad stong dang lhan cig ri bo
356a5(mdo sde): spos kyi ngad ldan na gnas so// gnas brtan lam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig lha rnams kyi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas so// gnas brtan sgra gcan
356a6(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu pri yaM ku'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan klu'i sde zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gnyis dang lhan cig ri s+ya 'o
356a7(mdo sde): na gnas so// gnas brtam zur gyis shes zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig rim ngos yangs na gnas so// gnas brtan chags gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor
356b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu bzhi dang lhan cig lus 'phags kyi ri la gnas so// gnas brtan mi pham pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bco lnga dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi
356b2(mdo sde): phung po'i ri la gnas so// gnas brtan gtsug gi lam zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu drug dang lhan cig ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin na gnas so// gnas brtan de dag gis mi shes pa
356b3(mdo sde): 'am ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma byas pa cung zad kyang med do// dge 'dun gyi bzhes pa 'am/ spyan drangs pa 'am/ bco lnga ston nam/ gtsug lag khang dbul ba
356b4(mdo sde): 'am/ gaN+DI'i rab gnas sam/ gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa med de/ de dag tu gnas brtan bcu drug po de dag dang / 'khor du bcas pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis der byon zhing gnas te/ de ltar sbyin pa
356b5(mdo sde): yongs su rig par byed de/ ma 'ongs pa na mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba 'das nas/ mi rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan pas tshe slar 'phel te/ de ltar lo brgya thub pa ni ston pa nyan thos de dag yang phyir la 'dzam bu
356b6(mdo sde): gling du byon nas/ dam pa'i chos yang dag par ston par byed cing rab tu 'byin par byed de/ de srid skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo drug brgya par gyur pa de srid du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos
356b7(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur te/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo bdun brgya par gyur pa na/ nyan thos de dag gis sa'i steng 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa de gcig tu bsdus nas rin po che sna
357a1(mdo sde): tshogs kyi mchod rten gcig byas te/ kun nas bskor nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
357a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la 'dud pas phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de phyag 'tshal nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//
357a3(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de'ang nub nas/ 'og gi gser gyi sa gzhi gang yin pa de la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bsten pa dam pa'i chos nub par gyur to//
357a4(mdo sde): de nas de'i rjes la rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de nas mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
357a5(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi dang / skye bo mang pos
357a6(mdo sde): yongs su gang zhing bya bag 'phur ba tsam na/ grong khyer dang / grong dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang yod par 'gyur ro// lan cig sa bon btab
357a7(mdo sde): bas lan bdun gyi bar du 'bru rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i nyan thos 'dus pa lan gsum du 'gyur te/ 'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
357b1(mdo sde): 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni nyar thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa gsum pA la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'dus pa chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
357b2(mdo sde): gang 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag yin te/ yang de dag gis gzhan du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la sangs rgyas las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing bya ba byas par gyur pa yin te
357b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rang bzhin dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin dang / shel gyi rang bzhin dang / rin po che'i rang bzhin dang / ra gan gyi rang bzhin dang / 'khor ba'i dngos
357b4(mdo sde): po dang / mu tig dang / lcags kyi rang bzhin dang / zangs kyi dngos po dang / tsan dan gyi dngos po dang / a ka ru'i rang bzhin dang / dung gi rang bzhin dang / ba so'i rang bzhin dang / rA'i
357b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang / rtswa'i rang bzhin dang / sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang / rus pa'i rang bzhin rnams las sku gzugs sam/ mchod rten bzhengs su gsol zhing / tha na sor mo tsam gyi sku 'am
357b6(mdo sde): mchod rten bzhengs su gsol zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i gsung rab la mi'i
357b7(mdo sde): lus thob par rab tu thob nas/ 'dus pa dang po la ni dad pa dang ldan pas khyim nas byung nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos ni bgos nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ sngon
358a1(mdo sde): lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan 'da' 'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag ni re zhig sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin no// yang gang dag snang ba chos kyi/
358a2(mdo sde): phung po brgyad khri po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur cing / bskyed du bcug cing bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / bklags pa
358a3(mdo sde): dang / klog tu bcug pa dang / gang zhig theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab par gyur pa/ stong pa nyid dang ldan po 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma/
358a4(mdo sde): dkar po dang / rgya cher rol pa dang / gser 'od dam pa dang / yon tan 'od mchog dang / stong pa nyid kyi 'od mchog dang / phyag na rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge
358a5(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / cho 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jigs pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma shes kyi ting
358a6(mdo sde): 'dzir dang / gzi brjid ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub bsdus pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / glang po'i rtsal dang / sprin chen
358a7(mdo sde): dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba dang / lang+kar gshegs pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i sku
358b1(mdo sde): dang / byams pas zhus pa dang / tshangs pas zhus pa dang / legs pa'i 'tshams kyis zhus pa dang / drug shul can gyis zhus pa dang / dra ba can gyis zhus pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/
358b2(mdo sde): zhus pa dang / rgyas pas zhus pa dang / brgya byin gyis zhus pa dang / lag na rin chen gyis zhus pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa dang / dpa' bo'i nam mkhas zhus pa dang / bu mo
358b3(mdo sde): 'od dang bas zhus pa dang / bu mo rin chen ldan gyis zhus pa dang / bu mo gser gyi 'od mchog gis zhus pa dang / bang sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos zhus pa
358b4(mdo sde): dang / gzugs can snying pos zhus pa dang / dge ba bzang pos gang gis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu legs pa'i 'tshams kyis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu tsan dan gyis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu rang gi rgya
358b5(mdo sde): gyis zhus pa dang / lag bzangs kyis zhus pa dang / seng ges zhus pa dang / seng ge rnam par rol pas zhus pa dang / dpa' sbyin gyis zhus pa dang / gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa dang / zung
358b6(mdo sde): gi mdo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i zlos gar dang / stag rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang / las rnam par bshad pa dang / blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa dang / blo gros rgya mtshos bstan pa dang / dri/
358b7(mdo sde): ma med par grags pas bstan pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / ma skyes dgra mi 'gyur ba dang / sreng med kyi 'gyur ba dang / spong bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu gling 'gyur ba dang / 'dus
359a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / lag na ut+pal dang / sangs rgyas bcu pa dang / chos bcu pa dang / sa bcu pa dang / 'od dpag
359a2(mdo sde): med kyi bkod pa dang / bde ba can gyi bkod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / tshogs kyi bkod pa dang / rnam dag me tog bsdus pa dang / 'jig rten dag pas bsdus pa dang / byang
359a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dag par bsdus pa dang / thams cad stegs las babs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las babs pa dang / rin po che'i tog dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin
359a4(mdo sde): po che'i za mchog dang / mdzes pa brtsegs pa dang / rin cher skar mnga' dang / rin chen sprin dang / rin chen ltod pa dang / rin chen gtsug dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / cod pan
359a5(mdo sde): dra ba can dang / sdong po bkod pa dang / 'di dag la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgya ni theg pa chen po'i sde snod yin no// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi sde snod de/ mngon pa'i sde snod dang / 'dul ba'i/
359a6(mdo sde): sde snod dang / mdo sde'i sde snod ngo // mdo sde'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lung ring po dang / gcig las 'phros pa'i lung dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang / phra mo'i lung da
359a7(mdo sde): de dag la ni mdo sde'i sde sdod ces bya'o// chos mngon pa'i sde sdong gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ba drug pa dang / yang dag par sbyar ba bsdus pa la ni mngon pa'i sde snod ces bya'o// de la
359b1(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi 'dul ba dang / dge slong ma'i 'dul ba dang / ma mo'i phung po dang / 'dul ba'i ma mo'i ste/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag la 'dul ba'i/
359b2(mdo sde): sde snod ces bya'o// 'di dag ni skyes pa'i rabs te/ rtogs par brjod pa'i rabs dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rabs dang / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa dang / bya ba
359b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpas bstan pa dang / nyan thos kyis bstan pa dang / lhas bstan pa dang / 'byung ba bsdus pa dang / chos nye bar bsdus pa dang / tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig
359b4(mdo sde): gsungs par gyur pa'ang / bklags par gyur pa dang / bzung bar gyur pa dang / glegs bam bris par gyur pa dang / chos smra ba la mchod par gyur pa dang / de dag dang rang sangs rgyas
359b5(mdo sde): la mchod par gyur pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / mar me dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / glegs bam la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos rnams
359b6(mdo sde): g.yogs shing dkris pa dang / glegs shing mchog byas par gyur pa dang / grogs bam kha dog sna tshogs pas bregs bam bcings par gyur pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas de dag thams cad ni
359b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la mi thob pa rab tu thob nas dad pas khyim spangs te/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas chos gos bgos te/ khyim nas khyim med par
360a1(mdo sde): 'dus pa gnyis pa la rab tu byung ste/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa de dag ni re zhig chos la dge ba'i
360a2(mdo sde): rtsa ba bskur pa yin no// 'di ltar 'di dag sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag yin te/ dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskyed du bcug pa yin te/ 'di ltar spyan 'dren pa bsgrags pa dang
360a3(mdo sde): dge ba la 'dzud pa dang / brgyad ston byed pa dang / gso sbyong byed pa dang / rab tu mgron du 'bod pa dang / dge 'dun la chos ston gsol ba dang / sbyar 'dren pa dang / blo 'bur du 'dren pa dang /
360a4(mdo sde): zla ston byed pa dang / rtag re skor byed pa dang / chos sgrogs pa spyan 'dren pa dang / lo lnga ston byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang 'bul ba dang / mal stan 'dings pa dang chos gos 'dul
360a5(mdo sde): ba dang / gar+t+ti'i rab gnas byed pa dang / sman 'bul ba dang / yo byad phul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung
360a6(mdo sde): rab la mi thob pa thob nas/ 'dus pa gsum pa la dad pas khyim spangs te/ skra dang kha spu phyi nas chos gos bgos te/ yang dag pa'i ngang pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/
360a7(mdo sde): smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa de dag ni re zhig dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// de nas gnas brtan dga' ba'i
360b1(mdo sde): ba shes gnyen gyi rnam pa de dag rgya cher bshad nas/ shing ta la bdun srid cam nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas dge slong de dag gi mdun du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mo 'phrul yam zug
360b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas/ tshe'i 'du byed dang / srog gi 'du byed btang ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas dge slong de dag gis gnas
360b3(mdo sde): brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyeran gyi lus bsregs nas mchod rten byas te/ dri dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byas
360b4(mdo sde): so// rnam pa 'di dag 'phags pa nas 'phags par brgyud nas bshad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab yun ring
360b5(mdo sde): du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes dga' ba rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bshang ngo // 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyer gyi rtogs pa
360b6(mdo sde): brjod pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong A dzi ta shI ra b+ha tra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur/ rgya gar skad
360b7(mdo sde): du/ rA dza kA ny+dza bA hu dri pa s+ya pra Ni d+ha sU tra/ bod skad durgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i lo rgyus dang smon lam gyi mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon sangs rgyas
361a1(mdo sde): mar me mdzad kyis ston pa mdzad pa'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa khyod sngon
361a2(mdo sde): gyi dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig spyad na/ da ltar mtshan dang dpe byang du ldan te/ sku las 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
361a3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po nyon cig/ ngas so so skye bo'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lus la ras bal gyi ye'u til mar/
361a4(mdo sde): gyi nang du btsos pa stong btsugs te/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la gtan pa med pa'i mchod par phul bas/ da ltar nga nyid sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya bar gyur
361a5(mdo sde): pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de la rgyal po cher po shin tu yi rang ste/ de nas rgyal po des rang gi lag pa g.yas pa ras bal mar gyis bcos pas dkris te me btang nas/ lag/
361a6(mdo sde): pa g.yon pa bar snang la brkyang ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bdag gi stor pa bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad dgongs su gsol/ 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis
361a7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du dmigs te/ gtar pa med pa'i mchod par bsngos nas sngon lam 'debs te 'di skad // mar me'i sdod ni stong
361b1(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gyur cig/ snying po ri ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du gyur cig/ 'od kyis ni srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas mnar med pa'i sems/
361b2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba yan chad nas gzhan yang lcags ri chen po'i phyi rgyab na/ sems can rang gi las kyis sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i mun nag chen po'i nang na/ rang gi lag
361b3(mdo sde): pa brkyang bskum yang mi mthong ba'i gnas tshun chad snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ yun ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ji srid bzhugs la de srid du gnas par gyur cig/ grangs ni
361b4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa re re'i sbyar lam du gsal bar gyur cig/ mar me 'di gzugs med pa'i gnas su snang zhing
361b5(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur cig/ de ltar gsal ba'i mong la gzugs med pa'i lha rnams mar me'i 'od kyis bskul ma thag tu mtshan dang dpe byang du ldan nas snyoms par 'jug pa'i skye mched
361b6(mdo sde): bzhi las grol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa 'jug pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su gsol bar
361b7(mdo sde): gyur cig gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' bde rtse gcig pa nyams su myong nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig/ mar me 'di 'dod khams kyi lha
362a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ 'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyang / lha'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod la sems ma chags shing rang gi
362a2(mdo sde): sems la lha zhing bsam gtan ba ni la rims kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lta ma yin rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig
362a3(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi nga rgyal dang / khro gtum dang / sems kyi gdug pa zhi nas tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan nas/ zhi gnas kyi sems yid la byed pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di
362a4(mdo sde): gling bzhi'i mi rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gling bzhi'i mi rnams kyang sdug bsngal brgyad las thar nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/
362a5(mdo sde): mar me 'di byol song rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ byol song de dag gcig la gcig za ba dang / brdeg brdung dang / bsad pa dang / bkol ba'i sdug bsngal
