362a6(mdo sde): dngu zur rmongs las thar nas/ shes rab rnam pa gsum dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di gshin rje'i 'jig rten du snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gshin rje'i rnams gsod
362a7(mdo sde): gcod byed pa dang / brdeg brdung las thar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad gtong ba'i sems 'byung bar
362b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ mAr me 'di pre ta'i gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ pre ta rnams kyang bkres skom gyi sdug bsngal las thar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thugs rje chen po'i/
362b2(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyis/ zas dang skom gyis 'phongs pa'i longs spyod zad me shes pa dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di na rag rnams kyi
362b3(mdo sde): gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ na rag ni sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas tsha grang gi sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba nyams su myong ba las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
362b4(mdo sde): phyag gi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa las thar nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dis 'dzam bu gling gi phyi rol na mun nag gi/
362b5(mdo sde): nang na 'thoms pa'i sems can rang gi nang na 'thoms pa'i sems can rang gi lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'ang mi mthong ba'i gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ de dag sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam
362b6(mdo sde): par smin pas zas dang skom 'dod pa las/ nam mkha' la rang gi lcags kyi sen mo yod pas brnyogs pas zas dang skom ma rnyed nas/ rang gi lus zin pa dang sha bcad de za ba de dag re
362b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mun nag chen por 'thoms pa las thar nas/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar gyur cig/ gzhan yang mar me 'di na
363a1(mdo sde): gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de rnams gti mug dang ser sna'i mdud pa bkrol te gtong ba'i bro dang ldan zhing / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa
363a2(mdo sde): dang / mtshan bye tshan la sogs te 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar nas/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing / srog 'tsho ba'i zhi gnas kyi chu'i
363a3(mdo sde): thig le snying la gnas nas klu rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar mo 'di lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ des lto 'phye chen po'i sdug bsngal
363a4(mdo sde): zhi nas dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phrul pa'i shugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dis 'dzam bu gling gi spyir gnas pa'i sa bdag dang / lha dang / klu dang / sa bdag gi rgyal po pa ti li dang
363a5(mdo sde): sa'i rgyal chen mo dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / mtsho bran dang / rdzing dang / khron pa la gnas pa dang / klung chen po dang / klung phra mo dang / chu mig dang / lu ma la gnas pa dang / gangs
363a6(mdo sde): mthon po'i rgyud la gnas pa dang / ri nag po dang / g.ya' dang / sha srang dang / spang ri dang / nags chen po dang / shing gcig pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten dang / grong
363a7(mdo sde): khyer dang / ljongs na gnas pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de dag so so'i 'khrul pa'i rtog pa thams cad byang nas/ dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa'i ngad pa dang ldan te/ byang
363b1(mdo sde): chub kyi sems dang ldan nas thar pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ de ltar deng mar me 'di'i yon bdag gis kyang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod pa 'di phul bas/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i
363b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mar mi mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dpal mgon du gyur cig/ rgyal po
363b3(mdo sde): gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i smon lam gyi mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra tsar+ya pra ni d+ha na rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bzang
363b4(mdo sde): po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun// bdag
363b5(mdo sde): gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o// bzang por spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal ba thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du// zhing gi
363b6(mdo sde): rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// rdul gcig steng ma rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/ de ltar chos
363b7(mdo sde): dbyings rnams ma lus par// thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos// de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab
364a1(mdo sde): brjod cig/ ba pa gshegs pa thams cang bdag gis bcwo/ ma tog das pa 'greng ba dam pa dang // sam kun rnams dang rgyan pa gdugs rlo /
364a2(mdo sde): mar me mchog dang bdug spos dam pa yis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi// na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang // bye ba'i zur ma ri rang mnyam pa dang // bkod pa
364a3(mdo sde): khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis// rgyal ba de dag kun la mchod par bgyi// mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos// bzang po spyod la dad
364a4(mdo sde): pa'i stobs dag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // sdig po bdag
364a5(mdo sde): gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras// rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang /
364a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang // de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma
364a7(mdo sde): chags brnyes// mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la// 'khor lo bla na med par bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la// 'gro ba kun lo phan zhing /
364b1(mdo sde): bde ba'i phyir// bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyeng bzhugs par yang // bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang /
364b2(mdo sde): bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa// thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs
364b3(mdo sde): brtse yi// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur// gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar// bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon// phyogs bcu pad+ma'i zhing
364b4(mdo sde): rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang // sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems
364b5(mdo sde): can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni// 'thun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog byang chub spyod pa dag
364b6(mdo sde): ni bdag spyod cing // 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur// tshe rangs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob
364b7(mdo sde): gyur te// bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par// rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog/ lha yi skad dang
365a1(mdo sde): klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grulta dum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ji tsam par// thams cad skad du bdag
365a2(mdo sde): gis chos bstan to// des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te// byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur// sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dang // de dag ma lus
365a3(mdo sde): yongs su byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang // ji ltar pad+mo chus mi chags pa bzhin// nyi zla nam mkhar thogs
365a4(mdo sde): pa med lharo spyad// zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par// ngan song sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun bkod cing // 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad//
365a5(mdo sde): byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // sems can dag gi spyod dang 'thun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par gyur// bdag
365a6(mdo sde): gi spyod dngango mtshungs par gang spyod pa// de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogos par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang // spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyod// bdag la
365a7(mdo sde): par por 'dod pa'i grogs po dog/ bzang po spyod pa rab tu stor pa rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrang ba la shog/ de dag bdag gis rnams kyang ming mi 'byung // sangs rgyas sras kyis
365b1(mdo sde): bskor ba'i mgon byo rnams// mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal bar bsdu// ma 'ongs bskul pa kun tumi skyo byar/ de dag la yang mchod pa na bgyi// rtul ba rnams kyi/
365b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dzin cing // byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed// bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba yang // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi// srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor
365b3(mdo sde): ba na/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs ni mi zad rnyed// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang // yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyeng zhing rnams
365b4(mdo sde): te// zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang //
365b5(mdo sde): skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshang snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis/
365b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad
365b7(mdo sde): dag ga 'khor mo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zang la// blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal par thams cad 'jug par
366a1(mdo sde): u/ yang drug gas sa kya la// gang srung m+b+ha rgyas cad da stsa smra smra/
366a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi yi seng ge ga/ de dag skang cig gcig la bdag gis pas// rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul lo// sgyu mar gyur ba'i rnam par stobs kyis 'jug/ di sang du
366a3(mdo sde): ngag gi zhing gi rgyan// de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug/ gang yang ma byo 'jig rten sgron ma
366a4(mdo sde): rnams// de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor bskor// mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o// kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun
366a5(mdo sde): nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs ngag dang // kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang // kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang //
366a6(mdo sde): chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs// shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis// byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed// las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed
366a7(mdo sde): ci// nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing // bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par
366b1(mdo sde): ngag byed cing // sems cad rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par sgrol/ chos rnams rgyam tho rab tu mthong byas nas// ma shes rgya ma no rab tu rtogs par byed// spyod pa rgya martsornam pa du gabyed cig/
366b2(mdo sde): smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchodang byed cing // bskal po rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi// gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi// byang chub
366b3(mdo sde): spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams// bzang por spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// de kun bdag gis ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa// gang gi ming ni kun tu
366b4(mdo sde): bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir// dge ba de dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing // spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs
366b5(mdo sde): dag pa// bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra bar// de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi/
366b6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs bskal pa rnams su mi skyo bar// de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// spyod pa dag ni tshang yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa
366b7(mdo sde): la gnas nas kyang // de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi// nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam pa// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te// ji tsam las dang nyon
367a1(mdo sde): mongs mthar gyur pa// bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsas so// gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phrul/
367a2(mdo sde): lnga dang mi yi bde ba'i mchog rnams kyang // zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas// gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing
367a3(mdo sde): lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pas ni// bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab byas// des ni ngan song thams cad sbyangs par
367a4(mdo sde): 'gyur// des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas de yang nges myur mthong // de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho// mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ongs//
367a5(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhir 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag/ de yis bza
367a6(mdo sde): spyod smon lam 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur// ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu
367a7(mdo sde): stegs mang pos de mi thub// 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung du de myar 'gro// song nas sems can phan phyir de 'dug ste// byang chub sangs rgyas
367b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul// gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yi// de yi rnam par smin pa
367b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som nyim byed cig/ 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang // kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te// de dag gi ri rjes su bdag slob cing /
367b3(mdo sde): dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bsngo ba grang la mchog tu bsngags pa des// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun yang / bzang
367b4(mdo sde): po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te// mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas// bde ba can gyi/
367b5(mdo sde): zhing der rab tu 'gro// der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang // thams cad ma lus mngon sum 'gyur bar shog/ de dag mi lus bdag gi yongs su bskang // 'jig rten
367b6(mdo sde): ji srid sems can phan par bgyi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes// snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du//
367b7(mdo sde): lung bsrur ba yang bdag gis der rdzob shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas/ sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis/ blo yi bas kyis phyogs bcurnams su/
368a1(mdo sde): yang / sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam ton pa yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ des ni 'gro/
368a2(mdo sde): ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams// skad cig gcig la thams cad 'byor par shog/ gang yang bzang spyod smon lam ton pa yi// bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des//
368a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams// 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab thob par shog/ 'phags po bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs so// /
368a4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tri pra Ni d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// kun dga' bo 'di la byang
368a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dus
368a6(mdo sde): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong
368a7(mdo sde): lha mig ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang // nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan 'gro thams cad zlog bgyid cing // mtho ris lam ni rab ston la// rga shi med
368b1(mdo sde): par 'dren mdzad pa/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas
368b2(mdo sde): su// de dag bdag gis bshags par bgyi// bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis// bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa de// bdag ni kun mkhyen sa bon te// bdag gis
368b3(mdo sde): byang chub mi zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yi rang bas// de la bdag kyang yi rang ngo // sdig pa thams
368b4(mdo sde): cad bshags par bgyi// bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na/
368b5(mdo sde): sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog/ 'tshang rgya bgyid par bskul ma 'debs// byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing // sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul
368b6(mdo sde): nas/ srog chags kun la sman slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo skor gyur cig/ chos rnga chen po'i sgra yis ni// sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/
368b7(mdo sde): chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam bu bying gyur pa'i// sred pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa// 'ching ba kun gyis bcings dag la// rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs
369a1(mdo sde): su gsol// sems kyis dri mar bgyis pa la// sangs rgyas rnams ni spong mi mdzad// sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/
369a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs par// gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa// de dag rjes su bdag slob cing // byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas/
369a3(mdo sde): 'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog/ mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas// bla med byang chub reg gyur cig/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang // rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis//
369a4(mdo sde): rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis// stong pa'i chos rnams rtogs par shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar// sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag ma mchis gsob ma
369a5(mdo sde): mchis// bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa yi// dngos po kun la mi gnas par// sems can kun la bde slad du// ser sna
369a6(mdo sde): ma mchis sbyin gtong shog/ dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas// bdag gi longs spyod lhun grub shog/ dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs
369a7(mdo sde): shog/ khrims kyis tshul khrims skyon med cing // tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog
369b1(mdo sde): sa 'am yang rname 'am nu/ rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing // bzod pa khro ba ma mchis par// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtsor 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus/
369b2(mdo sde): kyi/ bsan sgrol lo mi mchis shing // stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis// brtsor 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sgyu mas bu'i ting 'dzin dang // dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting/
369b3(mdo sde): 'dzin dang // rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang // rig gsum mngon sum
369b4(mdo sde): bgyis pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang // 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis//
369b5(mdo sde): bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/ de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing // byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis// pha rol phyir drug rdzogs bgyis nas// sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas/
369b6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gang la gnas nas thabs la mkhas pas theg pa bde ba/ 'jug pa bde ba bla na med pa yang dag par
369b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yin no// 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam rdzogs so// bod skad du
370a1(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa'i rjes su mos pa'i smon lam phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams na dus gsum gyi// ye shes yon tan thugs rje tshad med cing // dpag med lnga
370a2(mdo sde): dung rdzogs te bla med pas/ bdud kyi sde bcom legs pa drug dang ldan// mkhyen pas ji bzhin gsung bzhir de bzhin gshegs// nyon mongs dgra bcom skye dgus mchod par 'os//
370a3(mdo sde): yang dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// rig pa'i blo gsal khyad par zhabs dang bcas// bgrod mchog gnas su bde gshegs legs pa brnyes// 'jig rten 'di dag
370a4(mdo sde): dngos po ji bzhir gzigs// skyes bu cis 'dul thabs kyis kha lo sgyur// srid pa'i mthar phyin lha mi ston pa'i gtso// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'di// gzhal yas
370a5(mdo sde): tshogs kyi yon tan mchog brnyes nas// don dam dbyings la mnga' mdzad chos kyi rje// srid gsum rmongs las 'khor ba'i skyon sel phyir// dbang gyur gzhan gyis rnyed min thos par dka'/
370a6(mdo sde): dka' las rnyed pa bla med dkon mchog ste// de bas sangs rgyas mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// dgongs pa lhad med snying po mdo yi sde// bkri ba'i don phyir tshig bzang dbyangs kyis bsnyad//
370a7(mdo sde): spro ba bskyed ces lung bstan 'phags pa'i gsung // don gsal bslab bder 'dra bsdebs tshigs su bcad// yul gyi dgongs pa gzigs te ched du gzigs// gleng gzhis rgyus byas bslab
370b1(mdo sde): ba'i dbyibs rnams bstan// bshad pa go sla dpes mtshon rtogs pas brjod// yon tan mchog dang nyes pa'i sbyor bstan phyir// sngon byung gtam dang thub pas mdzad pa'i rabs/
370b2(mdo sde): rgyas par gsung dang mkhyeran pas cho 'phrul rmad// ji bzhin gtan la phab cing bstan pa'i sde// rnam grol khyad par bsgrubs pa lam gyi chos// mi mo zhi ba dag ma dor dam dbyings/
370b3(mdo sde): bstan pas tshang mar bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid 'di// zab mo brtag dka' thub pas ched du gsungs// sgrib sel yang dag don shes chags med blos// bla med gnas su 'degs pa'i theg
370b4(mdo sde): chen phyir// shes rlom gzhan gyi gzhung la yod mi srid// mi srid yod pa bla med dkon mchog ste// de bas chos nyid mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// ston pa mchog gi gsung
370b5(mdo sde): las skyes pa ste// ma skyes chos nyid ston pa'i ye shes zab// bzang por spyod la brtson pa'i yon tan che// gnyis min byer med mthong zhes ma chags blo// gzhan don gtso bor bsgrub
370b6(mdo sde): ces snying rje'i bdag/ 'phongs la yid bzhin gtong ba'i rin chen gter// sdug bsngal nad rnams gso ba'i sman pa mchog/ rgyal sras gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' dang // shes rab
370b7(mdo sde): gsum gyi bden pa'i phyogs bsgoms te// bden mthong rims kyis nyon mongs mtha' spangs nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir// rtogs pa'i ye shes 'jig rten
371a1(mdo sde): gsum las 'das// dbang po rab zhi dul ba'i spyod lam mdzes// lus dang ngag yid skyon med rnam dag ces// lha min yon tan khyad du mi 'khor ba'i// slob
371a2(mdo sde): dang mi slob 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad// bla ma'i khyad par mthong mthu gzhan dag kyang // dam pa'i sa la 'jug pa spro ba che// dang mos dge bas 'tsho ba'i dka' thub can// so sor thar
371a3(mdo sde): pa'i sdom la tshul bzhin gnas// blo zab grol gnas tshul chen dge 'dun 'di// shes gsal dge bas bsgrub pa'i spyod pa zab// dad mos btul bar zhugs pa'i dka' thub brtan /
371a4(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas zhes 'dus pa'i mchog/ rnam dag spyod pas bdag gzhan don bsgrub phyir// sgrub byed gzhan gyi tshul gyis 'di ma bskrad// bsnyad min nges par 'phags
371a5(mdo sde): pa'i dkon mchog ste// de bas dge 'dun mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// bsod nams gter chen legs pa bsam yas kyang // rnam dag sems kyis dad de 'ol phyogs su// bstod
371a6(mdo sde): pa'i cha tsam brjod cing phyag 'tshal nas// 'dus ma byas pa'i mchod pa rnam dag pas// ma byung ma skyes stong ma'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis min dbyer med rang rig snyoms pa'i yul//
371a7(mdo sde): chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rab 'brel cing // mtshan ma med pa'i stobs kyis grub pa yi// ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyi longs spyod kyang // thos pa'i rjes tsam yid kyis der mos te// yang dag
371b1(mdo sde): nyid kyi snying po drag pas mcho// byang chub dam pa'i spyod pa da kyayas pas/ nyon mongs ma 'das 'jig rter gsum la 'dren/ rices dbyibs bkod nam par dgra pa'i zhing // 'byong /
371b2(mdo sde): rlung meng lhun gyis brus pa'i rdzas/ kun du bzang bu spyod pas thob pa yi// bsong rnams kyang par can gyi mangs spyod kyang / ngang pa'i shugs kyis yang dag 'dir dmigs te/ zang po
371b3(mdo sde): yid bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mchod// 'jig rten dge ba'i mchod pa mngon sum pa// me tog byug pa bye ma smos chus mchod// dri bsring mar me rol mo sil snyan dang // rgyal mtshan
371b4(mdo sde): ba dan 'phreng ba bla re gdugs// rgyan dang na bza' gding ba rin cheran dkor// sman dang zhal zas yo byad mi zad pas// mdzes par brgyan pa'i gnas dang sa gzhir bcas// skye bo
371b5(mdo sde): bzhon pa khyu mchog rkang gnyis ldan// legs par spyad pa'i tshogs kyis bskyed pa yi// bde 'gro skyid pas 'tsho ba'i longs spyod kyang // gus pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum 'dir
371b6(mdo sde): dmigs te// dgos pa sna tshogs mi yul 'byor pas mchod// mchod gnas gsum la 'os pas mchod bgyis te// snying rje byams ldan chags med snyoms pa'i blos// sbyin par 'os dang 'phong
371b7(mdo sde): dang mngon sum gyi// 'brel ba'i sems can kun la sbyin pa bsngags// dngos po chung yang dmigs pa cher bskyed de// gus pa'i tshul gyis yang dag mchod bgyis nas// brtse ldan
372a1(mdo sde): mgon med skyabs kyi mngon sum du// sngon gyi nyes pa ma lus bshags pa ni// thog ma med pa'i srid pa ji tsam nas// dngos med dngos por brtag pa yid bslab
372a2(mdo sde): de rnam nor bde ba rnams kyi lam mi mthong // dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan tshul ma shes// rgyu dang 'bras bur ma rtogs don nor te// lus kyi spyod pa ma dag sdig to bgyis/
372a3(mdo sde): ngag gis tshig 'tshal smras pas ngan du brjod// sems kyis blo nor log par bsams pa yi// bde 'gro mtho ris gnas dang skye gzhan gyi/ kha las ngan sdig pa mi 'cha ba 'dir bshags
372a4(mdo sde): so/ yang dag rig pa'i skal dang ldan bzhin du// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ring du bral gyur te// sdig pa'i grogs kyis rtag tu nyer bstan pas// le lo rang nyam dbang du bdag spyod/
372a5(mdo sde): cing // 'dod pa'i yon tan lta la g.yengs pas na// ma gus nyan sems bsgom la brtson zhan te// bla med dam pa'i lam la grib pa yis// gnan tan nyams pa mi 'chab 'dir
372a6(mdo sde): bshags so// mtshan ma mang pos rig pa'i blo g.yengs nas// dngos med dngos por rtog cing gnyis la 'jug/ don dam yang dag mtha' la blo zhan te// mi gnas dbyings la/
372a7(mdo sde): ye shes rmugs pas na/ kha 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sdug bsngal mi bzad ces// gzhan don gtso bor bsgrub la g.yel gyur pas// bla med sangs rgyas sa la sgrib pa yi// shes rab zhan pa'i
372b1(mdo sde): mi 'cha ba 'dir bshags so// ji ltar sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsor 'gyur ltar// thog mar byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// pha rol phyin bcu rnam par rdzogs mdzad cing // bsod nams ye/
372b2(mdo sde): shes dpag tu med par bsgrub// ma 'dres stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi brnyes nas// mngon par byang chub bdud kyi sde rnams btul// chos kyi 'khor lo gsung gi tshul bzhin bskor// mtha' gnyis
372b3(mdo sde): spang phyir mi gnas mya ngan 'das// bcabs pa med bzhin phun sum tshogs la sogs// bla med sangs rgyas yon tan dpag yas kyis// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa ji snyed pa// de dag yongs su
372b4(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ngo // bla ma mchod byed thos pas mi ngoms shing // shes rab gsal bas ma skyes chos nyid mthong // mtha' la mi gnas sdug bsngal bzod bya ste/ brtser ldan snyoms
372b5(mdo sde): pas 'gro ba'i skyabs la brtson// sa dang pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs mdzad cing // bsod nams ye shes dpag tu med pa bsgrubs// bla med dam pa'i lam la spro ba che/ rgyal ba'i
372b6(mdo sde): gdung 'tsho ba byang chub sems dpa' dang // blo zhib gsal bas rten 'brel rgyud bsgoms te// bskal pa brgya snyed yon tan tshogs bsags pa'i// cho 'phrul spyod lam tshul
372b7(mdo sde): gyis sgrol byed cing // ma bstan rkyen las rig pa'i nga rgyal dang // dang phyir bla ma'i lung bsgrubs thos 'dzin ces/ gang zag chos dang dngos pos rnam brtags pas/ 'khor
373a1(mdo sde): ba'i zug rngu skyon dag spang rigs la// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas mchog bgrod 'os zhes// shes rab ting 'dzir blos dpyad rab bsgrubs pas// sdug
373a2(mdo sde): bsngal ji bzhin brtags de kun 'byung spangs// 'gog pa'i legs pa mthong ste lam rnams bsgoms// de tshul goms byas bden mthong khyad par lam// mthong dang bsgoms pa'i
373a3(mdo sde): legs pa rim bzhin du// 'khor ba'i zug rngu skyon dag yang rig la// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde gnas rab bsgrubs pas// dgra bcom la sogs skyes bu chen po brgyad// byang chub nyan thos rang
373a4(mdo sde): rgyal 'phags pa'i rnams// yon tan sna tshogs brjod par dka' ba yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs par ji snyed pa// de dag yongs la rjes su yi rang ngo // so so'i skye bo dge sbyong ji snyed pa// dgye
373a5(mdo sde): bcu spyad pa'i tshul bzhin nan tan gyis// mtho ris gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa bsgrubs pas// rab tu byung zhing tshangs par spyod la sogs// 'jig rten dge ba'i skye do grangs med kyis// yon tan
373a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs brjod par dka' ba yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa ji snyed pa// de dag yongs la rjes su yi rang ngo // nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra tshad bzung dka' ba yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu mchog
373a7(mdo sde): la yi rang nas// legs pa'i tshogs la rjes su rab mos te// dad pas sems bskyed yi dam bcas pa ni// ji ltar sangs rgyas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// sngon gyi rgyal ba sras dang
373b1(mdo sde): bcas rnams la// dang de tshul bzhin phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod// rnam dag sems kyis dam pa'i rgyu byas nas// gzhal yas tshogs kyi dbyings la khyab pa'i sems// 'jig
373b2(mdo sde): rten rab 'byam kun la 'jug pa'i blos// sems can yongs la snyoms par khyab pa'i yid/ bsod nams dpe mi bsgrub kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ ye shes dpag yas mngon sum grub
373b3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyus// ston pa rdul snyed shin tu mnyes 'gyur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis dam pa'i sems bskyed de// dang dang snying rje brtson 'grus rab brtul nas// tshul khrims rnam dag
373b4(mdo sde): shes rab thogs med blos// bzang po spyod pa bsgrubs te bsod nams bskang // chos kyi dbyings dngo mnyam ste ye shes 'jug/ nam mkha'i tshad kyis gzhal te sems can bsgral
373b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i mthas gtugs 'jig rten bskyabs la sogs/ byang chub chen por bya bar rigs pa dang // ma lus bdag gis bya bar dam bca'o// bla med sems bskyed dpag yas dam bcas/
373b6(mdo sde): nas// dge ba ji snyed mchog tu bsngo ba ni// mchod 'os bsod nams zhing dag ma lus la// dad de mchod cing phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod// brtser ldan ma chags sems kyis sbyin
373b7(mdo sde): gsum gtong // sdig bshags yi rang sems bskyed dam bcas nas// dge ba ji snyed byang chub snying por bsngo// ji snyed legs par spyod pa sdud pa'i rkyen// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus kun bsngos nas/
374a1(mdo sde): rtse gcig sems kyis dmigs te smon pa ni// 'dir spyang brjod pa'i bsod nams 'di nyid kyis// legs par khyad par grub pa'i rgyu byas te// rgyal po sa bdag
374a2(mdo sde): chos kyis skyong ba dang // bdag cag 'khor bcas 'thun spyod ma lus kun// de ltar gnas pa'i lus gnas 'di la sogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud na nam bdag gnas kyi tshe// chos dang lugs kyi/
374a3(mdo sde): don rnams ci la yang // skyon dang bar chad gtsol ba gnod med cing // lus dang sems bde 'byor pa yid bzhin te// snying rje byams pas gzhan la par byed cing // ma skyes ma gos tshang du
374a4(mdo sde): skye min pa'i// ngan song gsum dang spang ba'i mi lus rnams// mtho ris skyon dang bgegs kyis sa la sogs/ sdug bsngal gsungs pa'i gnas rigs gang du yang // mi skye mi myong
374a5(mdo sde): spyod par mi 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas sku gsung rgyun du mthong thos te// dang las tshul bzhir sdom las rig pa gsal// chos dang zang zing tshogs ldan ma chags blos// brtse phyir
374a6(mdo sde): sbyor gsum lhur byed pan 'dogs shing // mgon dang skyabs med rter du bdag gyur te// lha mo'i tshul du 'tsho ba gzhan las len// byang chub dam pa'i thabs dang blo rdzogs te// sku gsum
374a7(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub ste sangs rgyas nas// sngoran gyi dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi// sems bskyed rgya chen sngon lam btab pa'i mthus// 'jig rten bde ba can gyi gnas mchog 'dir/
374b1(mdo sde): 'byor pa dpag yas tshad med longs spyod cing // 'od 'bar sku mchog mi g.yo bzhugs zhing du// mtshan tsam thos pas bde gnas thob la sogs// 'jig rten khyad par phan/
374b2(mdo sde): dgu skyabs mdzad pa'i// ye shes 'od dpag med par gyur pa bzhin/ khams gsum rnam par grags pa'i don grub ste// 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du grub par smon
374b3(mdo sde): de bzhin rgyud drug lam la gnas pa yi// nyon mongs dbang gyur sems can ji snyed kur// 'khor ba'i ris na so so'i rkyen bzhin du// gtse med lus sems rtag tu bde bzhin gnas//
374b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu bsnyen gyur te// chos nyid dbyings la rig pa'i blo rdzogs shing // byang chub dam pa'i sems bskyed mchog grub ste// bde gshegs yang dag sa la
374b5(mdo sde): gnas par smon// lugs bzhin dngos bdun bdag gis 'dir smras pas// skyon med rtse gcig dam pas rab bstan pa'i// bla ma gsung gi cha tsam 'ol phyogs su// ne tso ji bzhin
374b6(mdo sde): tshig bzlas brjod mod kyis// rgyal ba'i yon tan la sogs dpag yas la// bdag 'dra'i blos dpags tshigs 'di 'khrul srid kyis// gang nongs bla ma yongs la bzod par gsol/
374b7(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa'i rjes su mos pa'i smon lam rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ a gra tsid+ya pra ni d+ha nA na/ maung mang du/ mchog gi spyod pa'i
375a1(mdo sde): smon lam/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// skye dgu kun la sman dang bde slad du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs
375a2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams la 'dud// de dag la ni rjod cing mchod par bgyi// 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reb gyur cig/ byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal mnga' bdag rtog/ chos kyi blo gros dpa'
375a3(mdo sde): po bdud rtsi gsung // dpa' bo de dag phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la 'dud// thugs rjer ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa'i// rgyal ba mi mkhyen
375a4(mdo sde): mi gzigs mi mnga' ba// mi dbang thugs brtse byams la gnas pa yi// rgyal ba de kur bdag la dgongs su gsol// sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis// sdig pa'i las rnams
375a5(mdo sde): gang bgyis bdag gis bshags// de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// shAkya thub dang mi 'khrugs 'od dpag med// de
375a6(mdo sde): ngag gis ni 'phrin las yongs spangs dang // 'chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing bshags gyur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi// thams cad dga' mdzad skyes
375a7(mdo sde): bu dam pa gang // byang chub zhugs pa kun la gsol ba 'tshal// ngan song bzhi po myur du zhi gyur cig/ mi khom 'joms par bgyid cing rgyu bar shog/ sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med mnga'
375b1(mdo sde): bdag dang // de bzhin lhun po'i dpal dang nyi ma sgron// de dag bsod nams yi rang mkhyen pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang // phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa
375b2(mdo sde): spyod pa gang // de bzhin tshul khrims ting 'dzin spyod rnams dang // shes rab sgom dang bsod nams stobs kun la// byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo // rgyal ba kuran gyi yon tan mtha'
375b3(mdo sde): yas dang // chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyid thams cad la/ byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo // 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ 'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs
375b4(mdo sde): kun la bskul// phyogs bcu dag na byang chub rnyed pa gang // de dag tshangs brgyas ji ltar gsol ba ltar// rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig/ rgyal kun bskal pa mang
375b5(mdo sde): por bzhugs par shog/ 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ mi rnams thams cad mchog dang bla med pa// 'jig rten sgron ma bde gshegs myur gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams
375b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang // las dge rnams la yi rang gang lags dang // sdig pa'i las rnams bshags pa gang lags dang / rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang rnams mthong gang dang //
375b7(mdo sde): bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci bgyis pa// lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ba'ang rung // bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid par 'gyur ba gang // thams cad skye dgu sman srad stsal bar
376a1(mdo sde): bgyi// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas// stsal ba legs par sprul cing legs rgyas pa// de bzhin bdag gis skye dgu smar slad stsal//
376a2(mdo sde): 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ bdag gi 'gro la stsal ba gang lags pa'i// bsod nams 'bras bu bla med ci mchis pa// theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/
376a3(mdo sde): bdag la byang chub 'bras bu 'grub par shog/ mtshungs pa ma mchis kun nas sgo mo rnams// 'gro ba'i don du bdag la mngon sum shog/ 'jam dpal gyi ni rjes su slob bgyid
376a4(mdo sde): cing / byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi// mi gcig tsam gyi ched du'ang mnar meng ba'i// tshor ba thams cad bdag gis myong 'gyur bar// bskal pa du mar bdag ni sngo
376a5(mdo sde): bar bgyi// 'gro ba thams cad mya ngan med par shog/ sems dmyal gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang // dud 'gro'i gnas rnams dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal dang // mi yi gnas
376a6(mdo sde): rnams mi yi sdug bsngal dang // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phung po mtha' yas dag/ bdag la bab gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog/ rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing ni rnam dag dang // sems can rnam
376a7(mdo sde): ngag ye shes rnam dag dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mtha' yas gang // smon lam de kun bdag la grub par shog/ bdag gi smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig/ bdag ni nams kyang //
376b1(mdo sde): skyo bar mi 'gyur shog/ byang chub mchog ni bdag gis thob bar du// bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar shog/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon las rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi
376b2(mdo sde): mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa/ @'phags pa bsam/
376b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad yongs sa su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu
376b4(mdo sde): brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ gang bdag
376b5(mdo sde): gi skye ba 'di 'am/ skye ba gzhan du khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung bas ji tsam du 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal nas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis shing bsags pa lus dang ngag dang
376b6(mdo sde): yid kyis bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyis pa la rjes su yi rang ba shes pa 'am/ mi shes pa 'am/ bsams pa 'am ma bsams pa 'am/ dran pa 'am
376b7(mdo sde): mi dran pa 'dod chags kyi dbang ngam/ zhe sdang gi dbang ngam/ gti mug gi dbang ngam/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma lags pa dang 'brel ba'i dbang ngam/ mi shes pa'i dbang
377a1(mdo sde): dam yul gyi dbang ngam dus su skyes pa'i dbang ngam yang dag par tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ sbyor bas tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am
377a2(mdo sde): dngos pos tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam gsum dang / ngag gi rnam bzhi dang nga yid kyi rnam gsum gyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun
377a3(mdo sde): dang pha ma dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon ram/ bral gzhan dag la nyes pa bgyis pa 'am sems can gyi khams lta ba log pa la btsud pa 'am/ sems
377a4(mdo sde): can yang dag sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pa 'am dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams log par bsngo bas yongs su bsngos pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag
377a5(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa smras pa 'am chos ma yin pa chos su bstan pa 'am/ chos chos ma yin par bstan pa 'am 'dul ba ma yin pa 'dul bar bstan pa 'am/ 'dul ba
377a6(mdo sde): 'dul ba ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ lam ma yin pa lam du bstan pa 'amalam lam ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nasabadag mi dge ba'i chos
377a7(mdo sde): mngon du 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i phyogs la sems yang dag par mi gnas pa 'am/ sgrib pa gzhan gyis bsgribs nas/ blo g.yeng bar 'gyur ba'i nongs pa gang lags pa de dag
377b1(mdo sde): thams cad nongs pa bshags par bgyi'o// ji ltar byis pa/ ji ltar brun pa/ ji ltar mi gsal ba ji ltar mi mkhas pa ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can
377b2(mdo sde): de ltar nongs pa nongs par bshags par bgyi'o// nongs pa nongs par bshags nas/ phyis sdom pa blangs shing yang de ltar mi bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis da ltar lan gsum
377b3(mdo sde): du'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ gang sangs rgyas thams cad sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa
377b4(mdo sde): drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
377b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ chos kyi dung kun nas bus/ chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs/ chos kyi sgrom ma 'bar bar mdzad/
377b6(mdo sde): chos dpa' thun par chos bsgrub pa dag la/ sems can gyi khams rab tu btsud/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu bstan cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams rang
377b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyan thos rnams nyan thos nyid rtogs par 'gyur zhing / rig pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug rtogs par
378a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mngon du 'gyur zhing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
378a2(mdo sde): dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems cad rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / ga shin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log/
378a3(mdo sde): par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang
378a4(mdo sde): mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
378a5(mdo sde): cad spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / tha ma phyag gcig 'tshal ba dang / thal mo gcig sbyor ba dang / me tog gcig 'bul ba dang / sems dang ba gcig
378a6(mdo sde): tsam bskyed pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yAM rang ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo // gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / rab dang
378a7(mdo sde): phul dang bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i lang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis
378b1(mdo sde): ba dang / nam mkha' ltar dag cing yongs su dge ba'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo // gang dag gis chos thams cad yang dag par thugs su chud nas/ chos la rigs/
378b2(mdo sde): pa dang / chos la nges pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang / yon thams cad yongs su sbyong zhing yongs su sngo ba dang //
378b3(mdo sde): chos kyi phung po stong phrag kun dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / dam bcas pa dang / smon
378b4(mdo sde): lam dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / ston pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes pa yang dag par thugs su chud nas kyang sems can gyi
378b5(mdo sde): khams bka' blo mi bde bar mkhyen nas thugs khral chung ngur thugs 'jog par mdzad cing / chos ston par mi mdzad pa de dag la bdag bskul ma 'debs te/ skye
378b6(mdo sde): kho mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i
378b7(mdo sde): slad du dam pa'i chos bshad du gsol chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsolachos kyi dung kun nas 'bung du gsol/ chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol/ chos kyi sgron ma
379a1(mdo sde): 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ chos dang 'thun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu dgod du gsol/ gang dag tshe la dbang ba/ sprul pa la
379a2(mdo sde): dbang ba byin gyi rlabs la dbang ba rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba/ sems can 'dul ba'i tshogs smin par mdzad pa dbang du gyur pa dang / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams la yongs su mya
379a3(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' bar thugs gzhol zhing sku tshe 'dor bar mdzad pa de dag la bdag gsol ba 'debs te/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig
379a4(mdo sde): rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du sku tshe'i 'du byed rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ gang bdag gis
379a5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing bsags pa lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la
379a6(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tha na sems
379a7(mdo sde): can gcig gi sems gcig gis sems dang ba gcig tsam bskyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba
379b1(mdo sde): 'dis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang
379b2(mdo sde): gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / rdzas dang / sngags dang / sman rnyed pa dang / dge ba'i
379b3(mdo sde): bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i chos grub pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
379b4(mdo sde): gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spongs pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung
379b5(mdo sde): ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob pa dang / lus las byung ba dang
379b6(mdo sde): sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad 'thob pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / rang sangs
379b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
380a1(mdo sde): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dang bag chags 'joms pa dang /
380a2(mdo sde): bsrel mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ye shes mi zad pa nyid dang / shes rab mi zad pa nyid
380a3(mdo sde): dang spobs pa mi zad pa nyid dang / bsod nams mi zad pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i mdzod nyid dang / lag na rin po che nyid dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
380a4(mdo sde): ye shes 'thob pa dang gzhan yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par grub
380a5(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ gang sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa de las bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod pa gang lags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
380a6(mdo sde): 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni
380a7(mdo sde): bsgral bar bgyi'o// ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol bar bgyi'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o// mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams mya ngan las bzla bar
380b1(mdo sde): bgyi'o// spar pa dang bde ba'i mtha'i gnas kyi gzhi la rab tu dgod par bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lam gsum du'o// 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su/
380b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so// / 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa
380b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
380b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags so// bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad la
380b5(mdo sde): gsol ba 'debs so// bsod nams thams cad sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o//
380b6(mdo sde): bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis bden pa gsung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag pa ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o//
380b7(mdo sde): bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des gang sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa mi dge ba nyes pa byas pa dang / log par smras pa dang / ngan du bsams pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i
381a1(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang las kyi sgrib pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing g.yogs
381a2(mdo sde): te kun nas dkris pa bdag nyid dang / gzhan dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang
381a3(mdo sde): dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma
381a4(mdo sde): tho ba med pa dang / bsten par bya ba dang / bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dang
381a5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa mi sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing g.yogs
381a6(mdo sde): te/ kun nas dkris pa rnams sems can 'dul ba dang / bdag 'dul ba dang / gzhan 'dul ba dang / gnyis ka 'dul ba dang / 'jam pos 'dul ba dang / khro bas
381a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba dang / btang snyoms kyis 'dul ba dang / bsdigs pas 'dul ba dang / bskrang pas 'dul ba dang / smad bas 'dul ba dang / bsten pa dang / bsnyen pa dang
381b1(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas pas 'dul ba dang chos bshad pas 'dul ba dang / 'dzum bstan pas 'dul ba dang nang du yang dag 'jog gis 'dul ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yod/
381b2(mdo sde): tan yo byad bsnyungs pas 'dul ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol
381b3(mdo sde): tu phyin pa spyod pas 'dul ba dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / sgom pas 'dul ba dang 'dul ba
381b4(mdo sde): gang dang gang gis/ sems can gyi khams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyu mi 'byung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu
381b5(mdo sde): rang dmigs pa'i rgyu dang / bsam gtan gyi rgyu dang / zhi gnas kyi rgyu dang / lhag mthong gi rgyu dang / mngon par shes pa'i rgyu dang / zag pa zad pa'irgyu
381b6(mdo sde): dang so so yang dag par rig pa'i rgyu rnams rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'ju
381b7(mdo sde): pa mngon du mi 'gyur ba dang / snang ba skyes shing skyes pa de dag nub par 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bsnyen bkur 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang /
382a1(mdo sde): 'khor 'dod pa'i sems 'byung ba dang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog
382a2(mdo sde): pa dang / mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / skye bo la rnam par rtog pa dang gnyen la rnam par rtog pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i
382a3(mdo sde): gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad la rnam par rtog pa'i sems la kun nas gnas pa dang / tshe thung ba dang gnod pa mang ba dang mdog ngan pa dang / gzugs ngan pa dang /
382a4(mdo sde): dbang chung ba dang / rigs dma' ba dang / longs spyod chung ba dang / shes rab 'chal pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
382a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang / ngan song ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang / lus las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang / sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba nyams su myong ba dang / smon lam
382a6(mdo sde): ldog pa la dga' ba dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam ma rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang sgrib pa gang dang gang gis bsgribs shing / kun nas dkris pa'i sems can rnams kyis rnam par
382a7(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bdag la smin nas/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol zhing / rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi khams ji tsam pa dang / chos kyi
382b1(mdo sde): khams ji tsam pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khams ji tsam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ji tsam pa dang / gnyis su med pa ji tsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid ji tsam pa dang mnyam
382b2(mdo sde): pa nyid ji tsam pa dang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi khams ji tsam pa dang / 'khor bar dogs pa dang / 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i ji tsam pa de tsam
382b3(mdo sde): du sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams gang yin pa de bdag la smin nas sems can
382b4(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par grol zhing / rnam par dag par gyur cig/ bdag gis ji tsam du sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing / bsags pa gang lags pa
382b5(mdo sde): de sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar dbyi'o// bdag ni 'dod chags la chags/ zhe sdang gis gdungs/ gti mug gis rmongs te/ nyon mongs pa dang
382b6(mdo sde): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan nas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal/ ma mthong
382b7(mdo sde): ma rig ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mkhyen cing gzigs la thugs su chud pas ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo bar
383a1(mdo sde): bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dang 'thun par yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar sems can 'dul ba dang ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa dang //
383a2(mdo sde): ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / ji ltar sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang / lam sgom pa dang bla na med
383a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / bag chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyel
383a4(mdo sde): pa mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa
383a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su bsngo ba dang / gnyis su med
383a6(mdo sde): pas yongs su bsngo ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o// sems
383a7(mdo sde): can gang zhig gang dang gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i sems rnam par rtog pa med pas/ bdag mthong bar 'gyur zhing / ji lta ji ltar sems can dag par 'gyur ba
383b1(mdo sde): de lta de ltar bdag gis lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las rtag tu 'jug par gyur cig/ dus ji lta ba dang / yul ji lta ba dang sems can rnams/
383b2(mdo sde): kyi 'dul ba ji lta ba de lta de ltar chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs pa med par ston par gyur cig/ 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba
383b3(mdo sde): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bar d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus
383b4(mdo sde): te gtan la phab pa// bod skad du/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
383b5(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten sman slad du// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dang da ltar gyi// rang byung thub dbang thugs rje ldan rnams la/ bdag gis
383b6(mdo sde): bdag kun btud nas phyag 'tshal lo// chags dang zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis ni// bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// srid pa nyam ngar sdig pa ci bsags pa/
383b7(mdo sde): sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsod nams mdzod gang dang // byang chub sems dpa' las byung bsod nams dang // gang yang nyan thos rkyen gyi
384a1(mdo sde): theg can dang // 'jig rten bsod nams de la yi rang ngo // byang chub snying por thog mar gang sangs rgyas/ pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan 'dra spyan mnga' gA
384a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zla med mtha' yas de dag la/ chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskul/ phung po ma lus mya ngan 'das dbyings su// gshegs par gang bzhed mi dang
384a3(mdo sde): lha yi lnga/ mgon po de dag ji snyed sman slad du// bzhugs dang sangs rgyas sku don mdzad par gsol// phyag 'tshal ba dang bshags pa'i bsod nams dang / bskul ba dang ni/
384a4(mdo sde): gsol ba btab pa dang // de bzhin yi rang bsod nams ci bsags pa/ byang chub dam pa mchog tu bsngo bar bgyi/ bdag gis bsod nams dam pa 'dis rtag tu/ byang chub
384a5(mdo sde): sems ni brjed par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dge ba'i bshes rnams mnyes par byed gyur cig/ mi khom gnod pa brgyad po spong bar shog
384a6(mdo sde): bzod dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lus brgyan dang / rtag tu skye dran sems ni mi rmongs dang // rab nges pha rol phyin pa brtson gyur cig/ dbang phyug mi brdzi chos kyi dbang phyug dang
384a7(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung gnas nyid ni 'gyur med shog/ g.yog 'khor mang po 'thun par ldan pa dang // bsam pa 'thun zhing rgya cher dag gyur cig/ bsod nams mi zad rnam dag
384b1(mdo sde): blo dang ldan/ cho ga yon tan dag la dga' bar shog bsam gtan mngon shes so so yang dag rig dbang bcu dag la bdag dbang byed gyur cig byang chub sems
384b2(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag lam rdzogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas go 'phang myur thob shog/ de la gang dag lam kun ma rdzogs pa// de dag tshogs kyis rnyed pa rnyed gyur cig/ sems can
384b3(mdo sde): thams cad bla na med pa yi// byang chub tu ni smon lam myur 'debs shog/ de la dam bcas pas ni brtan gyur cing // byang chub thob min don gzhan byed ma gyur/ lus kun
384b4(mdo sde): dbang po dag pas rab rgyas shing // nad med rims nad med cing mya ngan bral// tshe ring zhi dang sgra ni yid 'ong ldan// sdig las zlog cing dge la 'jug gyur cig/ ser sna
384b5(mdo sde): bral zhing zang zing med chos kyis// rtag tu phan tshun phan 'dogs byed par shog/ gzhan du snying rje che dang ldan gyur nas// 'dod pa mi mnga' bde bar gshegs gyur cig/ 'gro ba
384b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bying la phan bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na mdo mchog tu// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yongs bsngo rgyal po la// des ni rang gi bsod nams yongs su bsngo// bde gshegs
384b7(mdo sde): kun tu bzang dang mkhyen pa dag/ kun tu bzang po bsngo dge ji lta bar// de bzhin bdag kyang kun tu bzang spyod dang // rgyal ba dam pa kur tu bzang por shog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi
385a1(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ swas+thA ya na bA thA/ bod skad du/ bde legs su 'gyur ba'i
385a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha zhig nye bar 'ongs nas su// 'jig rten mgon la zhus byas te// gang gis kun tu bde legs 'gyur// bdag zhus
385a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan bka' stsal gsol// de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas// 'jig rten 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// gang gis kun tu bde legs 'gyur// de ni lha khyod legs par nyon// gang zhig/
385a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dang // g.yo ba med cing rab brtan dang // gang gis tshul khrims dge gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig pa dang ma dang bu// chung ma de bzhin
385a5(mdo sde): mngag gzhug la// rtag tu rim gro legs byas pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig rtag tu dgra bcom la// yon rnams shin tu brtan byas dang // lha rnams la yang bya bsgo ba/
385a6(mdo sde): de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni// yid kyis nyes pa byas med cing // gang zhig gnas gsum bsdams gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang
385a7(mdo sde): zhig 'byung po thams cad la// byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgoms shing // dpag tu meng la mi 'khrugs pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad spang ba'i phyir// bde/
385b1(mdo sde): ba 'thob byed 'phags pa'i lam// yan lag brgyad pa sus bsgoms pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad stong nyid du// gang gis rtag tu rab mthong zhing // der/
385b2(mdo sde): yang sems can gnas gyur pa// de la kun tu bde lags 'gyur// gang dag dri ma med chos rnams// lus kyis mngon sum byas nas spyod// dgra bcom rnam par grol sems rnams//
385b3(mdo sde): de dag rtag tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang // shes pa mi 'jigs skyes gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// lha dang
385b4(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgon// yang srid zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// gang la khong du chud mdzad pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
385b5(mdo sde): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
385b6(mdo sde): rgya gar skar du/ swasti gA tha/ bod skad du/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha zhig nye bar 'ongs nas su/
385b7(mdo sde): lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te// sangs rgyas chen po thub pa chen// ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur// lha yi tshig de gsan gyur nas// 'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa// gang gis rtag
386a1(mdo sde): tu rjod byed la// nga yi bde legs 'gyur de nyon// 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris na// rin chen rgya chen mchog na gang yod pa// de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la/
386a2(mdo sde): cis kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char mi phod// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa
386a3(mdo sde): 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ gzhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gya nom gang // shAkya thub pas mnyam gzhag thugs chung pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te// de mngon byas na phyin chad
386a4(mdo sde): mya ngan med// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyis rin chen 'jig rten mchogaji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs
386a5(mdo sde): shog/ rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa// de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste// sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin tu dkon// de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur// ngo mtshar
386a6(mdo sde): shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ dam pa gtso bo mchog
386a7(mdo sde): sbyin gya nom pa// 'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gis 'os// shes rab dam pa chos kyis dam pa mchog/ mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di na bcom ldan cig/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag
386b1(mdo sde): meng de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'dri de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad/
386b2(mdo sde): med pa gang // mtha' yas blo ldar de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa// ting 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa// ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med// ngo mtshar shin tu/
386b3(mdo sde): rmad byung dpag med de// ting nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ ji ltar sgo
386b4(mdo sde): gtan brtan zhing rab dam ste// stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa// de ltar mkhas pa gzhi mthong bden gnas pa'ang // 'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yos//
386b5(mdo sde): ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ thams
386b6(mdo sde): cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs rnams kun dang ldan// kun gyi dam pa 'jigs pa kun dang bral// bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan
386b7(mdo sde): cig/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde
387a1(mdo sde): sems s+ho// da pa 'gos kyang min mo 'gyur ba mas// rlon me 'gas du klun sa rgyu du rlo/ r+k+ka ra phyu
387a2(mdo sde): shin tu dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phogs// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/
387a3(mdo sde): bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i// 'dren rnams mthong ste gang dag bag yod cing // bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs
387a4(mdo sde): bral ba// de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden
387a5(mdo sde): mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ dam pa rnams kyi dam pa don dam mkhyen// mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam brtsegs// gzhan gyis/
387a6(mdo sde): mi 'phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs// shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyis dpung gnyen mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten
387a7(mdo sde): rin chen mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ 'dun pa skyes nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing // gau ta ma bstan la rtag brtson
387b1(mdo sde): rab grol zhing // gzhan gyis mi dkri ba dag zhi der reg/ 'di la der reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun gang zhig 'jig rten rin chen
387b2(mdo sde): mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bden pa mthong ba brjod pas brgya lam na// gal te sdig pa 'ba' zhig byas gyur cing //
387b3(mdo sde): de ni de chab pa yi 'os min te// chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de
387b4(mdo sde): bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na// sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa'ang mtshungs pa med// lha dang mi yi ston pa bla na//
387b5(mdo sde): med// ston pa ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na//
387b6(mdo sde): bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sos ka'i zla ba dang por thub pa yis// nags khrod chos kyi dam pa gang gsungs pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa'ang lhag pa med// 'di la der reg grangs
387b7(mdo sde): su phyin mi 'brang // ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/
388a1(mdo sde): sdig pa ring bang ga' du byas mengs/ nas dang med cing 'jigs med mya nga bul// sred pa 'gags pas rma ba mi skyed pa// bden pa mar ma bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur
388a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bde legs kyi
388a3(mdo sde): su bcad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ bany+tsata thA ga ta mang kA la ga tha/ da skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su /
388a4(mdo sde): pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis
388a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i bkra shis pa// dge mnyam bsam
388a6(mdo sde): sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ yon tan sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyar byis brgyan mdzad pa// yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi
388a7(mdo sde): bslu ba// rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs/
388b1(mdo sde): dpag med che ldan zhing / tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang / barba shis nges ni myi gu rnams la 'i byang shog/ sems can dro b+ha las lathugs ni sbyor mdzad cing // tho ba bu
388b2(mdo sde): 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa// thub mchog don yod grub kyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs
388b3(mdo sde): so// @dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan po brang ngam pa ru// mi lam mgon la rgyal tshab dam par dbang bskur zhing // 'dzam gling nyid du glang cher thal kar skar gshen
388b4(mdo sde): gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dam pa zas gtsang sras// bud med skyon bral g.yo sgra spangs pa lha mdzes yum// lhums su zla bcur blo gros ldan pa
388b5(mdo sde): shAkya'i rigs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ ldum pa'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams dga' blag sha yi// yal gnas bzung bltams gyur tshangs dang brgya byin 'dud// mkha'
388b6(mdo sde): la gshegs te phyogs bcur pad+ma 'byung 'gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhal med khang mdzes drang srong dam pa'i mdun bzhag nas// mtshan lhas shis pa brjod
388b7(mdo sde): de ston pa byung gyur pa// shAka rigs bud med 'khor ldan kun 'dus rgyan btags gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhon nu'i stobs ni sgyu rtsal yig rtsig 'phong las ni//
389a1(mdo sde): kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs kun pas mchog ka shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal phyir btsun mo'i 'khor// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ pho brang
389a2(mdo sde): nas byung rga nang 'chi ba las byung gzigs// mi rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lcags ngur smrig gos rnams phul// srid gsum dag las rgal phyir mthon mthing dbu skra bregs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang de /
389a3(mdo sde): 'dir bde legs shog/ lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lpags ngur smrig gos rnams phul// nai rany+dza ra'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs// thub pa bsam gtan nas bzhengs bkra shis 'o thug gsol// bkra
389a4(mdo sde): shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ pad+mo las byung khyu mchog byang chub shing drung du// skyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gis bdud btul nas// tho rangs bdud rtsi mi 'gyur phun tshogs sangs
389a5(mdo sde): rgyas pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ wA ra Na sir chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos bskor// kun shes la sogs bden bzhi lnga sde bzang la bstan// lha klu lha min la
389a6(mdo sde): sogs mi min bdud 'gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ nga rgyal bsnyems par ldan pa'i ston pa drug btul zhing // glang chen rab myos mi bzang lhas byin gyis rbad btul
389a7(mdo sde): drang srong mchog la spre'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsi mchod// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ pad+mo gzhon nu lta bu'i mtshan ldan shAkya'i rigs// zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs
389b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo sgyur rgyal bltams// bskams pa nas bzung sA la'i tshal du ma lus rdzogs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ byams pa'i stobs kyis 'gro ba ma lus sgrol mdzad cing /
389b2(mdo sde): sems can mtha' yas zhi ba de'i lam la rab bkod nas// grong khyer rtswa mchog dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ bcom ldan rnam par gzigs/
389b3(mdo sde): ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can// tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer nye ldan du// pa to la yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde legs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ bde gshegs
389b4(mdo sde): gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can// tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na ka na'i grong khyer du// shing mchog sin 'di'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs
389b5(mdo sde): gyur cig / rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa'i rgyal rigs blo gros can// tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du// shing mchog sA la'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs
389b6(mdo sde): bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni stobs ldan bram ze'i rigs// tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du// shi ri shi yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir
389b7(mdo sde): bde legs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs// tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du// u dum wa ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs/
390a1(mdo sde): rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs pakra shrIs dus sum tshogs gyur skye// skyob pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs tha ma son tan ca// mam mtha'i dus na grong khyer wA ra Na sirba/
390a2(mdo sde): n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'gro mgom shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can// tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i
390a3(mdo sde): grong khyer du// a shwat+tha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' dbang gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'jig rten gsum/
390a4(mdo sde): gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni skye dgu'i zhi byed dang po'o// de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'ji
390a5(mdo sde): rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod ba// chos mchog dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i ba
390a6(mdo sde): shes phyag/ mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi zhing // 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// che ba'i tshe mchog ston
390a7(mdo sde): mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i phyir rlabs kyis// bgegs dang bdud ris gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog blan
390b1(mdo sde): me dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin cher dpal
390b2(mdo sde): 'bar ba// rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyes pa'i skyon zhi dge tshogs rnam par 'phel// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srungs ma'i byin rlabs/
390b3(mdo sde): kyis kha phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang // tshe ring nad med bde skying ldan par shog/ @oM
390b4(mdo sde): swasti/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gtso la yon tan mchog mnga' zhing // che dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshogs 'dus// go 'phang ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs pa// bkra
390b5(mdo sde): shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' zhing // shin tu phan dang bde dang nges gsung ba// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan med 'thob pa'i//
390b6(mdo sde): bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge 'dun che la mthu rtsal rmad mnga' zhing // bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen
390b7(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun// bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te// bsod nams ye shes las byung ba/ dam
391a1(mdo sde): pa gnyis ni thob par shog/ sems can thams cad ma lus pa// sa rab dga' ba thob bar du// rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang // rab tu 'byung ba thob par shog/ bkra shis
391a2(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ @rgya gar skad du/ rat+na tra ya swasti ga thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon
391a3(mdo sde): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtso la yon tan mchog mnga' ba// che dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshogs 'dus// go 'phang mchog brnyes bstod pa'i char 'bab/
391a4(mdo sde): pa'i bkra shis dam pa des 'dir bde legs shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' ba// shin tu phan dang bde dang nges gsung ba// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob
391a5(mdo sde): pa'i bkra shis dam pa des 'drir bde legs shog/ dge 'dun che la mthu dpal rmad mnga' ba// bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don
391a6(mdo sde): chen bsgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa'i// bkra shis dam pa des 'dir bde legs shog/ lo brgya 'tsho zhing ston brgya mthong ba dang // tshe ring ba dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // theg pa
391a7(mdo sde): mchog gis nges par 'byung 'gyur ba// lnga po 'dis kyang bdag la srung gyur cig/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
